National Sentence Text: Diaphragm valves shall have no direct connections between the liquid and air sections that might permit leakage of the liquid past the packing into the air lines.
P/T Sentence Text: Diaphragm valves shall have no direct connections between the liquid and air sections that might permit leakage of the liquid past the packing into the air lines.

National Sentence Text: Systems referred to in Sentence 4.7.4.3.(1) shall be designed, installed and maintained to prevent leakage or spillage.
P/T Sentence Text: Systems referred to in Sentence 4.7.4.3.(1) shall be designed, installed and maintained to prevent leakage or spillage.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers provided in conformance with Sentence 4.8.6.1.(3) shall be in addition to those provided on board the marine vessels.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers provided in conformance with Sentence 4.8.6.1.(3) shall be in addition to those provided on board the marine vessels.

National Sentence Text: A sufficient number of supervisory staff shall be on duty in care, treatment and detention occupancies to perform the tasks outlined in the fire safety plan described in Clause 2.8.2.1.(1)(a).
P/T Sentence Text: A sufficient number of supervisory staff shall be on duty in care, treatment and detention occupancies to perform the tasks outlined in the fire safety plan described in Sentence 2.8.2.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: Access to windows and panels required to vent floor areas and vents to vestibules permitted to be manually openable shall be kept free of obstruction.
P/T Sentence Text: Access to windows and panels required to vent floor areas and vents to vestibules permitted to be manually openable shall be kept free of obstruction.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the procedures described in Article 7.2.3.1., all elevators in an elevator shaft that is designed for use as a smoke shaft shall be tested to ensure that on activation of the fire alarm system they will return to the street floor level and remain inoperative.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the procedures described in Article 7.2.3.1., all elevators in an elevator shaft that is designed for use as a smoke shaft shall be tested to ensure that on activation of the fire alarm system they will return to the street floor level and remain inoperative.

National Sentence Text: Aviation fuel and oil separators provided in the drainage system shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 7 days to ensure safe operation and shall be serviced when necessary.
P/T Sentence Text: Aviation fuel and oil separators provided in the drainage system shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 7 days to ensure safe operation and shall be serviced when necessary.

National Sentence Text: A leak detection method that monitors vapours in the soil or liquids on the groundwater shall conform to good engineering practice and meet the requirements of vapour monitoring or groundwater monitoring systems. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: A leak detection method that monitors vapours in the soil or liquids on the groundwater shall conform to good engineering practice and meet the requirements of vapour monitoring or groundwater monitoring systems. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(3).)

National Sentence Text: A clear space of not less than 6 m shall be maintained between the stored products and fuel dispensers.
P/T Sentence Text: A clear space of not less than 6 m shall be maintained between the stored products and fuel dispensers.

National Sentence Text: Self-contained emergency lighting unit equipment shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that the emergency lights will function upon failure of the primary power supply, and at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that the unit will provide emergency lighting for a duration equal to the design criterion under simulated power failure conditions.
P/T Sentence Text: Self-contained emergency lighting unit equipment shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that the emergency lights will function upon failure of the primary power supply, and at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that the unit will provide emergency lighting for a duration equal to the design criterion under simulated power failure conditions.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.10.8.1.(2), in maturing warehouses, at least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 4-A:30-B:C shall be located adjacent to each exit.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.10.8.1.(2), in maturing warehouses, at least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 4-A:30-B:C shall be located adjacent to each exit.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.10.8.2.(2), standpipe and hose systems shall be provided and installed in distilleries in conformance with Article 2.1.3.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.10.8.2.(2), standpipe and hose systems shall be provided and installed in distilleries in conformance with Article 2.1.3.1.

National Sentence Text: Work on ducts involving the use of heat-producing devices for cutting, welding or soldering shall not be undertaken before the system has been shut down, the duct has been cleaned of any accumulations of combustible deposits, and any combustible lining and covering material that could be ignited by such work has been removed.
P/T Sentence Text: Work on ducts involving the use of heat-producing devices for cutting, welding or soldering shall not be undertaken before the system has been shut down, the duct has been cleaned of any accumulations of combustible deposits, and any combustible lining and covering material that could be ignited by such work has been removed.

P/T Sentence Text: Where field test methods are included in the storage tank construction standards referred to in Articles 4.3.1.2.and 4.3.1.3., such tests shall be permitted for storage tanks conforming to those standards.

National Sentence Text: Attendants shall be trained on how to conduct their duties.
P/T Sentence Text: Attendants shall be trained on how to conduct their duties.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 3.1.1., this Subsection applies to the indoor storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 3., this Subsection applies to the indoor storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.

National Sentence Text: Warning signs shall be posted in a conspicuous location near every entrance to the premises being fumigated.

National Sentence Text: In a sprinkleredbuilding, the storage of combustible pallets is permitted to exceed the values stated in Sentence 3.2.2.4.(2) provided such storage conforms to NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems (See Note A-3.2.2.4.(3).)

National Sentence Text: Means of egress shall be maintained in good repair and free of obstructions.
P/T Sentence Text: Means of egress shall be maintained in good repair and free of obstructions.

National Sentence Text: Quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in excess of those permitted in Sentence 5.5.5.1.(1) shall be stored in cabinets conforming to Subsection 4.2.10. except that, in laboratories described in Clause 5.5.5.1.(1)(b), the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in such cabinets shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet, or a room conforming to Subsection 4.2.9.

P/T Sentence Text: Class I liquids shall not be dispensed into a metal container or storage tank unless it is electrically connected in conformance with Article 4.1.8.2.

National Sentence Text: Commercial cooking equipment that is certified shall be installed and maintained in conformance with its certification.

National Sentence Text: Piping shall be installed outdoors whenever possible and located so it will not create a hazard to buildings or equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping shall be installed outdoors whenever possible and located so it will not create a hazard to buildings or equipment.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks, wooden vats, barrels, drums or containers used for the storage or processing of distilled beverage alcohols shall be designed, fabricated and tested for the anticipated maximum working pressure, operating temperature, internal corrosion conditions and structural stresses to which they could be subjected. P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks, wooden vats, barrels, drums or containers used for the storage or processing of distilled beverage alcohols shall be designed, fabricated and tested for the anticipated maximum working pressure, operating temperature, internal corrosion conditions and structural stresses to which they could be subjected.

National Sentence Text: Where an exit door leading directly to the outside is subject to being obstructed by parked vehicles or storage because of its location, a visible sign or a physical barrier prohibiting such obstructions shall be installed on the exterior side of the door.
P/T Sentence Text: Where an exit door leading directly to the outside is subject to being obstructed by parked vehicles or storage because of its location, a visible sign or a physical barrier prohibiting such obstructions shall be installed on the exterior side of the door.

P/T Sentence Text: An outdoor area used for the container storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.

P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to hot works involving open flames or producing heat or sparks, including but not limited to, cutting, welding, soldering, brazing, grinding, adhesive bonding, roofing operations, thermal spraying and thawing pipes.

National Sentence Text: A tank vehicle is permitted to be left unattended by the vehicle operator outside a building for more than 1 h, but only in a parking space that is located not less than 15 m from a building, and where the tank vehicle is not exposed to undue hazard from accident or collision.
P/T Sentence Text: A tank vehicle is permitted to be left unattended by the vehicle operator outside a building for more than 1 h, but only in a parking space that is located not less than 15 m from a building, and where the tank vehicle is not exposed to undue hazard from accident or collision.

P/T Sentence Text: Battery-powered industrial trucks shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C583-14 Guide for the Investigation of Electric Battery Powered Industrial Trucks

P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.2.7.9., main aisles, access aisles and aisles defining individual storage areas shall be in conformance with Article 3.2.2.2.

National Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies, flaming meals or drinks shall be ignited only at the location of serving.
P/T Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies, flaming meals or drinks shall be ignited only at the location of serving.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in packages or containers made of materials that are compatible with the product they contain, and of durable construction and designed to resist damage from normal material handling activities.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in packages or containers made of materials that are compatible with the product they contain, and of durable construction and designed to resist damage from normal material handling activities.

P/T Sentence Text: Where vestibules or stairshafts are pressurized as a means of smoke control, all doors in the path of exit travel shall be tested to ensure that they can be operated as required in Article 2.7.2.1. when the entire smoke control system is being tested.

P/T Sentence Text: In cases where a compartmentalized tank is used, the entire tank shall be treated as one tank with the aggregate of all compartments totaling the total capacity of that tank.

P/T Sentence Text: It is permitted to dispense a Class II or IIIA liquid into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle while its engine is running provided it is dispensed not less than 6 m away from any Class I liquid dispenser. (See Note A-4.6.8.6.(2).)

P/T Sentence Text: The liquid used for the test shall exceed the elevation of the piping and other points of entry into the sump by at least 50 mm, and not be a flammable liquid or a combustible liquid.

P/T Sentence Text: The storage, handling and use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids other than distilled beverage alcohols in a distillery shall conform to part 4..

P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.8.2.(3), when Class I liquids are transferred into a storage tank through the top of the tank, the fill pipe shall terminate within 150 mm of the bottom of the tank.

National Sentence Text: Spilled or leaked flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be flushed to a location where they will not create a fire or explosion hazard, or any risk to public health or safety, or neutralized or absorbed and cleaned up with the aid of a product that is compatible and non-reactive with the liquid being cleaned up (see Note A-4.1.6.3.(3)(b)), and deposited in a receptacle conforming to Article 2.4.1.3., or disposed of in a manner that does not create a fire or explosion hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: Spilled or leaked flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be flushed to a location where they will not create a fire or explosion hazard, or any risk to public health or safety, or neutralized or absorbed and cleaned up with the aid of a product that is compatible and non-reactive with the liquid being cleaned up (see Note A-4.1.6.3.(3)(b)), and deposited in a receptacle conforming to Article 2.4.1.3., or disposed of in a manner that does not create a fire or explosion hazard.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure L is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that doors to vestibules and areas of refuge, if these are normally held open, will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (8) of Measure L, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (16) of Measure L will open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the air supply to the areas of refuge, vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (9), (10), (11) and (14) of Measure L, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically and remain open when the air is being injected into the stairshaft, and vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentence (13) of Measure L.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure L is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that doors to vestibules and areas of refuge, if these are normally held open, will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (8) of Measure L, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (16) of Measure L will open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the air supply to the areas of refuge, vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (9), (10), (11) and (14) of Measure L, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically and remain open when the air is being injected into the stairshaft, and vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentence (13) of Measure L.

National Sentence Text: Dispensing Class I liquids into the fuel tank of vehicles directly from a tank vehicle shall not be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensing Class I liquids into the fuel tank of vehicles directly from a tank vehicle shall not be permitted.

P/T Sentence Text: Tinting operations involving paint containers not exceeding 25 L in capacity may be carried out in mercantile occupancies outside of a storage room conforming to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Combustible liquids and flammable liquids shall be stored and used in conformance with Part 4.

National Sentence Text: Bolting materials for flanged connections in steel piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be of alloy steel equivalent to ASTM A 193/A 193M-16 Alloy-Steel and Stainless Steel Bolting for High Temperature or High Pressure Service and Other Special Purpose Applications Grade B-7.
P/T Sentence Text: Bolting materials for flanged connections in steel piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be of alloy steel equivalent to ASTM A 193/A 193M-16 Alloy-Steel and Stainless Steel Bolting for High Temperature or High Pressure Service and Other Special Purpose Applications Grade B-7.

National Sentence Text: Absorbent material to soak up liquid spillage shall be provided for use by attendants at fuel-dispensing stations in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Absorbent material to soak up liquid spillage shall be provided for use by attendants at fuel-dispensing stations in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3.

National Sentence Text: Separators shall be provided to prevent the entrance of foreign materials that may cause sparks in conveying equipment, dust collectors, dust-producing machines and any equipment located in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts.
P/T Sentence Text: Separators shall be provided to prevent the entrance of foreign materials that may cause sparks in conveying equipment, dust collectors, dust-producing machines and any equipment located in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts.

National Sentence Text: A product subject to spontaneous heating shall be permitted to be stored in silos or bins only if measures are taken to monitor the temperature of the stored product, and prevent overheating of the stored product from creating a fire or explosion hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: A product subject to spontaneous heating shall be permitted to be stored in silos or bins only if measures are taken to monitor the temperature of the stored product, and prevent overheating of the stored product from creating a fire or explosion hazard.

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials shall not be located within the required clearance space surrounding chimneys, flue pipes or appliances, or adjacent to ash pit or cleanout doors.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials shall not be located within the required clearance space surrounding chimneys, flue pipes or appliances, or adjacent to ash pit or cleanout doors.

National Sentence Text: When flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored with products covered by this Subsection, the liquids shall meet the requirements of the applicable provisions of Part 4.
P/T Sentence Text: When flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored with products covered by this Subsection, the liquids shall meet the requirements of the applicable provisions of Part 4.

National Sentence Text: If a precision leak detection test referred to in Sentence 4.4.2.1.(10) detects a leak rate exceeding 0.38 L/h on an underground storage tank, the tank shall be considered to be leaking.
P/T Sentence Text: If a precision leak detection test referred to in Sentence 4.4.2.1.(10) detects a leak rate exceeding 0.38 L/h on an underground storage tank, the tank shall be considered to be leaking.

National Sentence Text: Piping under concrete ceilings shall be suspended with the use of through bolts or expansion shields.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping under concrete ceilings shall be suspended with the use of through bolts or expansion shields.

National Sentence Text: At least 2 portable extinguishers, each having a rating of not less than 40-B:C, shall be provided at every fuel-dispensing station.
P/T Sentence Text: At least 2 portable extinguishers, each having a rating of not less than 40-B:C, shall be provided at every fuel-dispensing station.

National Sentence Text: Burnt-out spark arresters shall be repaired or replaced.
P/T Sentence Text: Burnt-out spark arresters shall be repaired or replaced.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure A is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that closures to vent openings in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentence (6)Sentence numbers refer to Sentences contained in Commentary C of the User's Guide – NBC 1995 (Part 3). of Measure A open automatically and remain open, and the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure A, closures in openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentence (6) of Measure A shall be tested to ensure that they will operate as required, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure A, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they will open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshaft.

National Sentence Text: Piping passing under railway tracks shall be installed in conformance with TC 2001 Standards Respecting Pipeline Crossings Under Railways
P/T Sentence Text: Piping passing under railway tracks shall be installed in conformance with TC 2001 Standards Respecting Pipeline Crossings Under Railways

National Sentence Text: The clearance between combustible materials and temporary heating equipment, including flues, shall be in conformance with Part 6 of Division B of the NBC or in conformance with the minimum clearances shown on certified heating equipment.

National Sentence Text: In buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC, the fire safety plan shall, in addition to the requirements of Sentence 2.8.2.1.(1), include the training of supervisory staff in the use of the voice communication system, the procedures for the use of elevators, the action to be taken by supervisory staff in initiating any smoke control or other fire emergency systems installed in a building in the event of fire until the fire department arrives, instructions to the supervisory staff and fire department for the operation of the systems referred to in Clause 2.8.2.4.(1)(c), and the procedures established to facilitate fire department access to the building and fire location within the building.

National Sentence Text: Heating equipment for piping systems containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed not to overheat or create an ignition source for the liquids being heated.
P/T Sentence Text: Heating equipment for piping systems containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed not to overheat or create an ignition source for the liquids being heated.

National Sentence Text: Storage cylinders and piping systems for dangerous goods classified as compressed gases used in a laboratory shall be firmly secured with a noncombustible attachment and protected against mechanical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage cylinders and piping systems for dangerous goods classified as compressed gases used in a laboratory shall be firmly secured with a noncombustible attachment and protected against mechanical damage.

National Sentence Text: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1) shall be arranged so that there is no water pressure on the system except when liquid is being discharged.
P/T Sentence Text: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1) shall be arranged so that there is no water pressure on the system except when liquid is being discharged.

National Sentence Text: At card- or key-activated self-service outlets, the emergency shut-off switch required in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(1) shall be readily accessible to the customer.
P/T Sentence Text: At card- or key-activated self-service outlets, the emergency shut-off switch required in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(1) shall be readily accessible to the customer.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks are permitted to be located in buildings on piers and wharves of solid-fill or noncombustible construction provided they conform to Subsections 4.3.13.to 4.3.15.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks are permitted to be located in buildings on piers and wharves of solid-fill or noncombustible construction provided they conform to Subsections 4.to 4.

National Sentence Text: Where it is not practicable to install cargo pumps as required in Sentence 4.8.9.2.(1), they are permitted to be installed on piers and wharves of combustible construction if located in pump houses conforming to Subsection 4.8.10., and located not less than 3 m from other buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: Where it is not practicable to install cargo pumps as required in Sentence 4.8.9.2.(1), they are permitted to be installed on piers and wharves of combustible construction if located in pump houses conforming to part 4., and located not less than 3 m from other buildings.

National Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be supported where it is not run on a solid foundation.
P/T Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be supported where it is not run on a solid foundation.

National Sentence Text: At least one portable fire extinguisher shall be provided in the hot work area.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one portable fire extinguisher shall be provided in the hot work area.

National Sentence Text: Where dispenser sumps, turbine sumps and transition sumps referred to in Article 4.3.9.1. are used in underground applications, they shall be provided with an electronic monitoring device to indicate the presence of liquid.
P/T Sentence Text: Where dispenser sumps, turbine sumps and transition sumps referred to in Article 4.3.9.1. are used in underground applications, they shall be provided with an electronic monitoring device to indicate the presence of liquid.

National Sentence Text: The frequency of the in-service monitoring referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be calculated from the date of the commissioning test.
P/T Sentence Text: The frequency of the in-service monitoring referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be calculated from the date of the commissioning test.

National Sentence Text: Buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(3) of Division B of the NBC, have ventilation in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.6.(4) of Division B of the NBC, and be designed to prevent the ammonium nitrate from coming into contact with building materials that may react with it as described in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(6) of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.1.5.8.(2) and in dwelling units as described in Article 4.2.4.5., and in mercantile occupancies as described in Sentence 4.2.5.3.(3), Class I liquids shall not be stored, handled or used in basements or pits.

National Sentence Text: Processing equipment where an explosion hazard is present shall be designed to withstand the explosion pressure without damage to the equipment, provided with explosion venting in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting or provided with an explosion prevention system in conformance with NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Processing equipment where an explosion hazard is present shall be designed to withstand the explosion pressure without damage to the equipment, provided with explosion venting in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting or provided with an explosion prevention system in conformance with NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to tank vehicles when located on a property covered in this Code.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to tank vehicles when located on a property covered in this Code.

National Sentence Text: Installations using Class I liquids as fuel supplies for stationary engines inside buildings shall conform to NFPA 37-2015 Installation and Use of Stationary Combustion Engines and Gas Turbines
P/T Sentence Text: Installations using Class I liquids as fuel supplies for stationary engines inside buildings shall conform to NFPA 37-2015 Installation and Use of Stationary Combustion Engines and Gas Turbines

National Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be located so that loads from building foundations and supports are not transmitted to the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be located so that loads from building foundations and supports are not transmitted to the tank.

National Sentence Text: When necessitated by possible contamination of the liquid to be stored or possible rapid corrosion of the tank, storage tanks need not conform to Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), provided that they are designed and built in conformance with good engineering practice for the material being used. (See Note A-4.3.1.2.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: When necessitated by possible contamination of the liquid to be stored or possible rapid corrosion of the tank, storage tanks need not conform to Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), provided that they are designed and built in conformance with good engineering practice for the material being used. (See Note A-4.3.1.2.(3).)

National Sentence Text: This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Every person dispensing flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall take precautions to prevent overflow or spillage of the liquid being dispensed, not knowingly overfill the fuel system, except as otherwise stated in Article 4.6.8.5., in the event of spillage, immediately apply an absorbent material to soak up the spillage in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3., not dispense Class I or II liquids in proximity to open sources of ignition, not use any object or device that is not an integral part of the hose nozzle valve assembly to maintain the flow of fuel, and not dispense the liquids into containers that are in a vehicle, watercraft or floatplane.
P/T Sentence Text: Every person dispensing flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall take precautions to prevent overflow or spillage of the liquid being dispensed, not knowingly overfill the fuel system, except as otherwise stated in Article 4.6.8.5., in the event of spillage, immediately apply an absorbent material to soak up the spillage in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3., not dispense Class I or II liquids in proximity to open sources of ignition, not use any object or device that is not an integral part of the hose nozzle valve assembly to maintain the flow of fuel, and not dispense the liquids into containers that are in a vehicle, watercraft or floatplane.

National Sentence Text: Bulk storage tanks, piping, pumps, valves and associated components shall be designed, installed and maintained to accommodate hydraulic pressure shock on the system.
P/T Sentence Text: Bulk storage tanks, piping, pumps, valves and associated components shall be designed, installed and maintained to accommodate hydraulic pressure shock on the system.

National Sentence Text: Natural or mechanical ventilation shall be provided for all areas where alcohol vapours are released from storage tanks or process equipment under normal operating conditions, to prevent the concentration of vapours from exceeding 25% of the lower explosive limit, measured 1.5 m from any equipment or from any opening subject to vapour release.
P/T Sentence Text: Natural or mechanical ventilation shall be provided for all areas where alcohol vapours are released from storage tanks or process equipment under normal operating conditions, to prevent the concentration of vapours from exceeding 25% of the lower explosive limit, measured 1.5 m from any equipment or from any opening subject to vapour release.

National Sentence Text: Access to exits within a covered mall shall be provided and maintained in conformance with Subsection 2.7.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Access to exits within a covered mall shall be provided and maintained in conformance with part 2.

National Sentence Text: Vent piping shall be installed so that any nominally horizontal run shall slope towards the storage tank, constructed without traps, adequately supported to prevent sagging, and where necessary, protected against mechanical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent piping shall be installed so that any nominally horizontal run shall slope towards the storage tank, constructed without traps, adequately supported to prevent sagging, and where necessary, protected against mechanical damage.

National Sentence Text: A pressure decline test using an inert gas is permitted to be used as a leak detection test for piping systems that are new or in use, and convey a volume of less than 1 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: A pressure decline test using an inert gas is permitted to be used as a leak detection test for piping systems that are new or in use, and convey a volume of less than 1 000 L.

National Sentence Text: When the collective individual storage area for dangerous goods exceeds 10 m2, buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1) shall be accessible to fire department vehicles from at least 2 sides for the purpose of firefighting. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: When the collective individual storage area for dangerous goods exceeds 10 m2, buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1) shall be accessible to fire department vehicles from at least 2 sides for the purpose of firefighting. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Not more than 30 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 10 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in each dwelling unit. (See Sentence 4.1.1.1.(3) for oil-burning appliances.)
P/T Sentence Text: Not more than 30 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 10 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in each dwelling unit. (See Sentence 4.1.1.1.(3) for oil-burning appliances.)

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.8.9.2.(2), cargo pumps shall be located on shore or on piers and wharves either of noncombustible construction or of the solid-fill type, and not less than 3 m from other buildings or structures.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.8.9.2.(2), cargo pumps shall be located on shore or on piers and wharves either of noncombustible construction or of the solid-fill type, and not less than 3 m from other buildings or structures.

National Sentence Text: Hose connections shall not project beyond the face of piers and wharves.
P/T Sentence Text: Hose connections shall not project beyond the face of piers and wharves.

National Sentence Text: When an aboveground storage tank will be out of service or unsupervised for a period not exceeding 180 days, the piping from the tank shall be capped or the valves that are necessary to achieve similar isolation of the tank shall be closed and securely locked.
P/T Sentence Text: When an aboveground storage tank will be out of service or unsupervised for a period not exceeding 180 days, the piping from the tank shall be capped or the valves that are necessary to achieve similar isolation of the tank shall be closed and securely locked.

National Sentence Text: Static liquid media leak detection testing of turbine, transition, dispenser and pump sumps shall conform to Sentences 4.4.3.5.(2)to 4.4.3.5.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: Static liquid media leak detection testing of turbine, transition, dispenser and pump sumps shall conform to Sentences 4.4.3.5.(2)to 4.4.3.5.(4).

National Sentence Text: A dust-collecting system required in Sentence 5.3.1.3.(1) shall be designed in conformance with good engineering practice, be made of noncombustible materials, and not create sparks upon physical contact in the fan assembly. (See Note A-5.3.1.3.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: A dust-collecting system required in Sentence 5.3.1.3.(1) shall be designed in conformance with good engineering practice, be made of noncombustible materials, and not create sparks upon physical contact in the fan assembly.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the provisions of Article 3.1.2.2., dangerous goods shall not be stored in areas where they may be subject to temperature extremes or atmospheric pressure that could cause their containers to become deformed or rupture, or physical impact or temperature extremes that could cause a chemical reaction or chemical instability such that a fire could occur.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the provisions of Article 3.1.2.2., dangerous goods shall not be stored in areas where they may be subject to temperature extremes or atmospheric pressure that could cause their containers to become deformed or rupture, or physical impact or temperature extremes that could cause a chemical reaction or chemical instability such that a fire could occur.

National Sentence Text: Flame-retardant treatments shall be renewed as often as is required to ensure that the material will pass the match flame test in NFPA 705-2013 Field Flame Test for Textiles and Films (See Note A-2.3.2.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Flame-retardant treatments shall be renewed as often as is required to ensure that the material will pass the match flame test in NFPA 705-2013 Field Flame Test for Textiles and Films (See Note A-2.3.2.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The requirements of Subsection 3.2.3. regarding Class II commodities shall also apply to bagged storage of ammonium nitrate. (See Note A-3.2.1.1.(1)(a).)
P/T Sentence Text: The requirements of part 3. regarding Class II commodities shall also apply to bagged storage of ammonium nitrate. (See Note A-3.2.1.1.(1)(a).)

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Subsection 4.2.8. and in Sentence 4.2.7.4.(2), the dispensing or transfer of Class I or II liquids shall be conducted in rooms conforming to Subsection 4.2.9.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in part 4. and in Sentence 4.2.7.4.(2), the dispensing or transfer of Class I or II liquids shall be conducted in rooms conforming to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Anchors of the expansion shield type used to suspend piping shall not be used to suspend piping from unsound or lightweight concrete or from gypsum assemblies.
P/T Sentence Text: Anchors of the expansion shield type used to suspend piping shall not be used to suspend piping from unsound or lightweight concrete or from gypsum assemblies.

National Sentence Text: Underground piping shall be located so it will not be damaged as a result of vibrations or settling of an adjacent building or structure.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground piping shall be located so it will not be damaged as a result of vibrations or settling of an adjacent building or structure.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in closed containers, in conformance with Article 4.7.2.4., or storage tanks, in conformance with Section 4.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in closed containers, in conformance with Article 4.7.2.4., or storage tanks, in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers having a rating of 40-B:C shall be provided in the vicinity of Class I liquid pumps and fuel dispensers.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers having a rating of 40-B:C shall be provided in the vicinity of Class I liquid pumps and fuel dispensers.

National Sentence Text: Hose stations are permitted to be installed in lieu of portable extinguishers at locations required in Sentence 4.10.8.1.(1), and spaced so that the travel distance to the nearest hose is not greater than 25 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Hose stations are permitted to be installed in lieu of portable extinguishers at locations required in Sentence 4.10.8.1.(1), and spaced so that the travel distance to the nearest hose is not greater than 25 m.

National Sentence Text: Reactive materials shall be stored based on their properties when classified as dangerous goods.
P/T Sentence Text: Reactive materials shall be stored based on their properties when classified as dangerous goods.

National Sentence Text: Where baled raw pulp is stored in a sprinkleredbuilding, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 1 000 m2, and the maximum height of storage shall be 6 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Where baled raw pulp is stored in a sprinkleredbuilding, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 1 000 m2, and the maximum height of storage shall be 6 m.

National Sentence Text: An access route not less than 6 m wide constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m of any part of a pile.

National Sentence Text: Voice communication systems that are integrated with a required fire alarm system shall be tested in conformance with Article 6.3.1.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Voice communication systems that are integrated with a required fire alarm system shall be tested in conformance with Article 6.3.1.2.

National Sentence Text: In areas of a building where construction, alteration or demolition operations are taking place, at least one exit shall be accessible and usable at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: In areas of a building where construction, alteration or demolition operations are taking place, at least one exit shall be accessible and usable at all times.

National Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred by water pressure as a result of displacement, such system shall not be used for liquids that are miscible in water.
P/T Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred by water pressure as a result of displacement, such system shall not be used for liquids that are miscible in water.

National Sentence Text: Uncertified commercial cooking equipment shall be installed and maintained so as not to create a fire hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: Uncertified commercial cooking equipment shall be installed and maintained so as not to create a fire hazard.

National Sentence Text: Emergency service features of elevators shall be tested to ensure that they operate in conformance with appropriate provincial, territorial or municipal requirements or, in the absence of such requirements, as provided in Sentence 7.2.2.1.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency service features of elevators shall be tested to ensure that they operate in conformance with appropriate provincial, territorial or municipal requirements or, in the absence of such requirements, as provided in Sentence 7.2.2.1.(2).

National Sentence Text: This Part shall not apply to facilities operated by manufacturers or distributors at whichdangerous goods classified as compressed gases are manufactured, or containers are filled or distributed, provided that storage and handling is in conformance with good engineering practice (see Note A-3.1.1.4.(1)(a)), and the storage and dispensing of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations covered in Section 4.6.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part shall not apply to facilities operated by manufacturers or distributors at whichdangerous goods classified as compressed gases are manufactured, or containers are filled or distributed, provided that storage and handling is in conformance with good engineering practice (see Note A-3.1.1.4.(1)(a)), and the storage and dispensing of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations covered in part 4.

National Sentence Text: The piping system shall be considered to be leaking if any pressure decline is detected within the time periods stated.
P/T Sentence Text: The piping system shall be considered to be leaking if any pressure decline is detected within the time periods stated.

National Sentence Text: The distances required in Sentence 3.3.5.3.(1) need not apply where the building opening leads into a room conforming to Subsection 3.2.8. that is used for storing dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.
P/T Sentence Text: The distances required in Sentence 3.3.5.3.(1) need not apply where the building opening leads into a room conforming to part 3. that is used for storing dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.

National Sentence Text: When flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored in solid pile or rack storage configurations or a combination of both in a single fire compartment, the maximum quantity permitted for each class of liquid shall be calculated as follows: qIAQ IA+qIBQIB +qICQIC+qII QII+qIIIA QIIIARack +qIAQIA+qIBQIB +qICQIC+ qIIQII+qIII AQIIIASolidPile 1where qIA, IB or IC= the actual quantity of Class IA, IB or IC liquids present in a rack or solid pile, qII= the actual quantity of Class II liquids present in a rack or solid pile, qIIIA= the actual quantity of Class IIIA liquids present in a rack or solid pile, QIA, IB, IC= the maximum quantity of Class IA, IB or IC liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement, QII= the maximum quantity of Class II liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement, QIIIA= the maximum quantity of Class IIIA liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement.
P/T Sentence Text: When flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored in solid pile or rack storage configurations or a combination of both in a single fire compartment, the maximum quantity permitted for each class of liquid shall be calculated as follows: qIAQ IA+qIBQIB +qICQIC+qII QII+qIIIA QIIIARack +qIAQIA+qIBQIB +qICQIC+ qIIQII+qIII AQIIIASolidPile 1where qIA, IB or IC= the actual quantity of Class IA, IB or IC liquids present in a rack or solid pile, qII= the actual quantity of Class II liquids present in a rack or solid pile, qIIIA= the actual quantity of Class IIIA liquids present in a rack or solid pile, QIA, IB, IC= the maximum quantity of Class IA, IB or IC liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement, QII= the maximum quantity of Class II liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement, QIIIA= the maximum quantity of Class IIIA liquids permitted in Table 4.2.7.5.-A or Table 4.2.7.5.-B for the arrangement.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.5.5.(2), emergency planning measures conforming to Section 2.8. shall be provided for all buildings, parts of buildings and open areas described in Article 4.1.1.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.5.5.(2), emergency planning measures conforming to part 2. shall be provided for all buildings, parts of buildings and open areas described in Article 4.1.1.1.

National Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying Table 3.2.7.6., Class IIIA and B3 liquids shall be treated as dangerous goods classified as flammable liquids. (See Note A-4.2.2.3.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying Table 3.2.7.6., Class IIIA and B3 liquids shall be treated as dangerous goods classified as flammable liquids. (See Note A-4.2.2.3.(2).)

National Sentence Text: When a single class of flammable liquid or combustible liquid is stored in a fire compartment with a fire-resistance rating of at least 1 h, the total quantity of liquid shall not exceed 30 L of Class I liquids, 150 L of Class II liquids, or 600 L of Class IIIA liquids.

National Sentence Text: When hot work is to be carried out near piping containing dangerous goods classified as flammable gases, the piping shall conform to Sentence 5.2.3.4.(1), or be protected by a thermal barrier against the passage of heat.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as toxic or oxidizing gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC, is located on an exterior wall, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC, and is provided with ventilation to the outdoors.

National Sentence Text: Valves on cylinders for dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be closed when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Valves on cylinders for dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be closed when not in use.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquid and combustible liquid piping is permitted to be heated by steam lines provided the minimum steam temperature and pressure to make the liquid fluid are used and Sentences 4.5.8.2.(2)and 4.5.8.2.(3) are complied with.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquid and combustible liquid piping is permitted to be heated by steam lines provided the minimum steam temperature and pressure to make the liquid fluid are used and Sentences 4.5.8.2.(2)and 4.5.8.2.(3) are complied with.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 4.8.3.1.(2)and 4.8.3.1.(3), storage tanks shall be installed on shore in conformance with Subsections 4.3.2.to 4.3.7.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 4.8.3.1.(2)and 4.8.3.1.(3), storage tanks shall be installed on shore in conformance with Subsections 4.to 4.

National Sentence Text: Dispensing Class II or IIIA liquids into the fuel tank of vehicles directly from a tank vehicle having a capacity greater than 3 000 L shall be permitted only if the vehicles are located outdoors on a property where they are not less than 6 m away from any building, and not exposed to undue hazard from accident or collision, at least 2 portable extinguishers having a minimum rating of 80-B:C are provided on the tank vehicle, the delivery hoses and automatically closing hose nozzle valves used for the fuel-dispensing operations conform to Subsection 4.6.5., the tank vehicle operator is given training and equipment for controlling any spillage that may occur during the fuel-dispensing operations, and in cases where fuel-dispensing operations are carried out at a site not conforming to Subsection 4.1.6., measures are in place to control a spill of not less than 1 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensing Class II or IIIA liquids into the fuel tank of vehicles directly from a tank vehicle having a capacity greater than 3 000 L shall be permitted only if the vehicles are located outdoors on a property where they are not less than 6 m away from any building, and not exposed to undue hazard from accident or collision, at least 2 portable extinguishers having a minimum rating of 80-B:C are provided on the tank vehicle, the delivery hoses and automatically closing hose nozzle valves used for the fuel-dispensing operations conform to part 4., the tank vehicle operator is given training and equipment for controlling any spillage that may occur during the fuel-dispensing operations, and in cases where fuel-dispensing operations are carried out at a site not conforming to part 4., measures are in place to control a spill of not less than 1 000 L.

National Sentence Text: Electric hot work equipment shall be de-energized when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Electric hot work equipment shall be de-energized when not in use.

National Sentence Text: Ventilation shafts shall be used only for ventilating purposes.
P/T Sentence Text: Ventilation shafts shall be used only for ventilating purposes.

National Sentence Text: The minimum duration of the test shall be 1 h with no visual or measured evidence of leakage. (See Note A-4.4.4.1.)
P/T Sentence Text: The minimum duration of the test shall be 1 h with no visual or measured evidence of leakage.

National Sentence Text: The power-ventilated enclosure required by Sentence 5.5.5.5.(1) as well as its exhaust duct system shall be washed after each use to prevent the possible accumulation of highly reactive or unstable deposits. (See Note A-5.5.5.5.(2).) (See Note A-5.5.5.6.)

National Sentence Text: Where there is a conflict between the requirements of this Section and other requirements in Part 4., this Section shall govern.
P/T Sentence Text: Where there is a conflict between the requirements of this Section and other requirements in part 4., this Section shall govern.

National Sentence Text: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

(See Note A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Precautions shall be taken, where necessary, to ensure that there is no damage to fuel supply piping or equipment that would result in fuel leakage or a fire hazard during renovations or excavation.
P/T Sentence Text: Precautions shall be taken, where necessary, to ensure that there is no damage to fuel supply piping or equipment that would result in fuel leakage or a fire hazard during renovations or excavation.

National Sentence Text: Where the clearance below the base of the tank exceeds 300 mm, tank supports shall have a minimum fire-resistance rating of 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the clearance below the base of the tank exceeds 300 mm, tank supports shall have a minimum fire-resistance rating of 2 h.

National Sentence Text: Outdoor storage receptacles, such as dumpsters, used for combustible materials shall be located so that they do not create an undue fire hazard to surrounding buildings. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(6).)
P/T Sentence Text: Outdoor storage receptacles, such as dumpsters, used for combustible materials shall be located so that they do not create an undue fire hazard to surrounding buildings. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(6).)

National Sentence Text: Not more than 50 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 30 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in individual self-service storage units.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Not more than 50 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 30 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in individual self-service storage units.

P/T Sentence Text: Electrical service rooms may be used for storage purposes in conformance with the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Electrical service rooms may be used for storage purposes in conformance with the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation.

National Sentence Text: Loudspeakers operated from the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure they can be heard in all parts of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Loudspeakers operated from the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure they can be heard in all parts of the building.

National Sentence Text: The service company whose service connections will be affected shall be notified before any action mentioned in Sentence 5.6.2.1.(1) is taken and, if it is necessary to maintain any service, it shall be relocated as necessary, and protected from damage.
P/T Sentence Text: The service company whose service connections will be affected shall be notified before any action mentioned in Sentence 5.6.2.1.(1) is taken and, if it is necessary to maintain any service, it shall be relocated as necessary, and protected from damage.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.6.4.(2), 3.2.6.4.(3)and 3.2.6.4.(4), baled combustible fibres shall be stored so that no individual storage area exceeds 250 m2, the height of storage in an individual storage area does not exceed 4.5 m, subsidiary aisles within individual storage areas are not less than 1 m wide, and the clearance between piles and building walls is not less than 1 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.6.4.(2), 3.2.6.4.(3)and 3.2.6.4.(4), baled combustible fibres shall be stored so that no individual storage area exceeds 250 m2, the height of storage in an individual storage area does not exceed 4.5 m, subsidiary aisles within individual storage areas are not less than 1 m wide, and the clearance between piles and building walls is not less than 1 m.

National Sentence Text: Every storage tank, piping system and sump, including those at fuel-dispensing stations, shall be tested and monitored for leaks in conformance with Tables 4.4.1.2.-Ato 4.4.1.2.-E, which establish the minimum requirements regarding the frequency and methods to be used for commissioning testing, subsequent in-service monitoring, and testing when a leak is suspected. (See Note A-4.4.1.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to baking and drying processes shall conform to NFPA 86-2015 Ovens and Furnaces
P/T Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to baking and drying processes shall conform to NFPA 86-2015 Ovens and Furnaces

National Sentence Text: This Section shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings where combustible dusts are produced in quantities or concentrations that create an explosion or fire hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings where combustible dusts are produced in quantities or concentrations that create an explosion or fire hazard.

National Sentence Text: The number of occupants permitted to enter a room shall not exceed the maximum occupant load calculated in conformance with Sentence 2.7.1.3.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: The number of occupants permitted to enter a room shall not exceed the maximum occupant load calculated in conformance with Sentence 2.7.1.3.(1).

National Sentence Text: When unstable liquids are stored, the effects of heat or gas resulting from polymerization, decomposition, condensation or self-reactivity shall be allowed for in the determination of the total venting capacity.
P/T Sentence Text: When unstable liquids are stored, the effects of heat or gas resulting from polymerization, decomposition, condensation or self-reactivity shall be allowed for in the determination of the total venting capacity.

National Sentence Text: Where a storage tank containing stable liquids or unstable liquids has a working pressure greater than 17 kPa (gauge), the distances from a property line or a building on the same property shall be those specified in Sentences 4.3.2.1.(2)and 4.3.2.1.(3) multiplied by 1.5, but shall be not less than 7.5 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a storage tank containing stable liquids or unstable liquids has a working pressure greater than 17 kPa (gauge), the distances from a property line or a building on the same property shall be those specified in Sentences 4.3.2.1.(2)and 4.3.2.1.(3) multiplied by 1.5, but shall be not less than 7.5 m.

National Sentence Text: The minimum distance required in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) from a storage tank containing only Class II or IIIA liquids to a building on the same property is permitted to be reduced to 1.5 m provided the tank capacity is not more than 50 000 L, or zero provided the tank capacity is not more than 2 500 L.

National Sentence Text: Where the collective individual storage areas for dangerous goods exceed 10 m2 in a fire compartment, means shall be provided for manual or automatic venting of smoke and toxic gases from the storage area under fire conditions. (See Note A-3.2.7.10.(1).)

P/T Sentence Text: All pressure vessels for hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1) shall be constructed, installed and tested in conformance with ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code

National Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be of adequate length to allow for movement of the marine vessel.
P/T Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be of adequate length to allow for movement of the marine vessel.

National Sentence Text: Measures to accommodate possible leakage or spillage from hose couplings shall be provided in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Measures to accommodate possible leakage or spillage from hose couplings shall be provided in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: A chimney, flue, or flue pipe shall be replaced or repaired to eliminate any structural deficiency or decay (see Note A-2.6.1.4.(3)(a)), and all abandoned or unused openings that are not effectively sealed in a manner that would prevent the passage of fire or smoke.

National Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted within a fire compartment used for the storage of dangerous goods and signs shall be posted in conformance with Article 2.4.2.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted within a fire compartment used for the storage of dangerous goods and signs shall be posted in conformance with Article 2.4.2.2.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored on exterior balconies.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored on exterior balconies.

National Sentence Text: Written records shall be maintained as required in CSA C282-15 Emergency Electrical Power Supply for Buildings
P/T Sentence Text: Written records shall be maintained as required in CSA C282-15 Emergency Electrical Power Supply for Buildings

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(2), every fuel-dispensing station shall have at least one attendant referred to in Article 4.6.8.5. on duty when the station is open for business.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(2), every fuel-dispensing station shall have at least one attendant referred to in Article 4.6.8.5. on duty when the station is open for business.

National Sentence Text: Attendants on duty at fuel-dispensing stations shall supervise the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after the customer at the unit is ready to activate the nozzle, prevent the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids into containers that do not conform to Article 4.2.3.1., or are in a vehicle, take appropriate measures to prevent sources of ignition from creating a hazard at the dispensers, take appropriate action in the event of a spill to reduce the risk of fire, shut off the power to all dispensers in the event of a spill or fire, and perform routine visual inspections in accordance with Article 4.5.10.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Attendants on duty at fuel-dispensing stations shall supervise the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after the customer at the unit is ready to activate the nozzle, prevent the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids into containers that do not conform to Article 4.2.3.1., or are in a vehicle, take appropriate measures to prevent sources of ignition from creating a hazard at the dispensers, take appropriate action in the event of a spill to reduce the risk of fire, shut off the power to all dispensers in the event of a spill or fire, and perform routine visual inspections in accordance with Article 4.5.10.5.

National Sentence Text: The width of main access aisles referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.2.(5) need not exceed 2.4 m where the products are stored in racks and the building is sprinklered.
P/T Sentence Text: The width of main access aisles referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.2.(5) need not exceed 2.4 m where the products are stored in racks and the building is sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.7.3.(3), a secondary containment for a single storage tank shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than 110% of the capacity of the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.7.3.(3), a secondary containment for a single storage tank shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than 110% of the capacity of the tank.

National Sentence Text: Piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.9.(1) shall not be installed under combustible flooring.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.9.(1) shall not be installed under combustible flooring.

National Sentence Text: Central stations, including their fire protection signalling systems, shall be maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S561-13 Installation and Services for Fire Signal Receiving Centres and Systems (See Note A-6.3.1.3.(1).) (See Note A-6.3.1.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Central stations, including their fire protection signalling systems, shall be maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S561-13 Installation and Services for Fire Signal Receiving Centres and Systems (See Note A-6.3.1.3.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Vent piping for an underground storage tank containing a Class I liquid shall not be connected to the vent piping for a storage tank containing a Class II or IIIA liquid unless an effective method is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquid storage tank from entering the other tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent piping for an underground storage tank containing a Class I liquid shall not be connected to the vent piping for a storage tank containing a Class II or IIIA liquid unless an effective method is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquid storage tank from entering the other tank.

National Sentence Text: Buildings described in Sentence 3.2.7.9.(1) need not be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system, provided that storage consists only of dangerous goods classified as non-flammable, non-toxic gases with no subsidiary class of oxidizing substances.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings described in Sentence 3.2.7.9.(1) need not be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system, provided that storage consists only of dangerous goods classified as non-flammable, non-toxic gases with no subsidiary class of oxidizing substances.

National Sentence Text: Pumps for flammable liquid or combustible liquid piping systems installed aboveground and outside of buildings shall be located not less than 3 m from the property line, and 1.5 m from building openings.
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps for flammable liquid or combustible liquid piping systems installed aboveground and outside of buildings shall be located not less than 3 m from the property line, and 1.5 m from building openings.

National Sentence Text: To ensure proper operation, frequent inspections and tests shall be made of all safety shut-off valves and other fire safety devices, with particular attention directed to normally open, fusible-link-operated valves, float valves and automatic controls.
P/T Sentence Text: To ensure proper operation, frequent inspections and tests shall be made of all safety shut-off valves and other fire safety devices, with particular attention directed to normally open, fusible-link-operated valves, float valves and automatic controls.

National Sentence Text: When a hose nozzle valve with a hold-open device is used at an attended self-service outlet, a break-away coupling conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S644-16 Emergency Breakaway Fittings for Flammable and Combustible Liquids shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Insulating joints shall be placed in all rails where entering upon the pier or wharf.
P/T Sentence Text: Insulating joints shall be placed in all rails where entering upon the pier or wharf.

National Sentence Text: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., a fire safety plan conforming to this Section shall be prepared in cooperation with the fire department and other applicable regulatory authorities and shall include the emergency procedures to be used in case of fire, including sounding the fire alarm (see Note A-2.8.2.1.(1)(a)(i)), notifying the fire department, instructing occupants on procedures to be followed when the fire alarm sounds, evacuating occupants, including special provisions for persons requiring assistance (see Note A-2.8.2.1.(1)(a)(iv)), confining, controlling and extinguishing the fire, the appointment and organization of designated supervisory staff to carry out fire safety duties, the training of supervisory staff and other occupants in their responsibilities for fire safety, documents, including diagrams, showing the type, location and operation of the building fire emergency systems, the holding of fire drills, the control of fire hazards in the building, and the inspection and maintenance of building facilities provided for the safety of occupants.
P/T Sentence Text: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., a fire safety plan conforming to this Section shall be prepared in cooperation with the fire department and other applicable regulatory authorities and shall include the emergency procedures to be used in case of fire, including sounding the fire alarm (see Note A-2.8.2.1.(1)(a)(i)), notifying the fire department, instructing occupants on procedures to be followed when the fire alarm sounds, evacuating occupants, including special provisions for persons requiring assistance (see Note A-2.8.2.1.(1)(a)(iv)), confining, controlling and extinguishing the fire, the appointment and organization of designated supervisory staff to carry out fire safety duties, the training of supervisory staff and other occupants in their responsibilities for fire safety, documents, including diagrams, showing the type, location and operation of the building fire emergency systems, the holding of fire drills, the control of fire hazards in the building, and the inspection and maintenance of building facilities provided for the safety of occupants.

National Sentence Text: Cabinets for container storage shall be labelled in conspicuous lettering to indicate that the cabinet contains flammable materials and that open flames must be kept away.
P/T Sentence Text: Cabinets for container storage shall be labelled in conspicuous lettering to indicate that the cabinet contains flammable materials and that open flames must be kept away.

National Sentence Text: When transfer operations are completed, the valves on the hose connections shall be closed, and unless the cargo hose is equipped with a device that automatically prevents liquid from draining from the hose upon its disconnection, the hose shall be drained so as not to create a fire or explosion hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: When transfer operations are completed, the valves on the hose connections shall be closed, and unless the cargo hose is equipped with a device that automatically prevents liquid from draining from the hose upon its disconnection, the hose shall be drained so as not to create a fire or explosion hazard.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.3.3.2.(3)and 3.3.3.2.(4), a clear space of not less than 15 m shall be maintained between stored products and a building on the same property to reduce the risk of fire spreading from the outdoor storage area to the building.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.1.6.1.(3), a spill of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be prevented from flowing outside the spill area and from reaching waterways, sewer systems and potable water sources by constructing a noncombustible barrier capable of containing the spill, or grading the site or sloping the floor to divert the spill to a drainage system conforming to Article 4.1.6.2. (See Note A-4.1.6.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Doors to vestibules that are normally held open by a hold-open device connected to the building fire alarm system shall be tested to ensure that they will close on a signal from the central alarm and control facility.
P/T Sentence Text: Doors to vestibules that are normally held open by a hold-open device connected to the building fire alarm system shall be tested to ensure that they will close on a signal from the central alarm and control facility.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 2.12.1.1.(2), covered malls designed for ornamental and pedestrian oriented uses only shall not be used for merchandising or public activities.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 2.12.1.1.(2), covered malls designed for ornamental and pedestrian oriented uses only shall not be used for merchandising or public activities.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Part 4. or otherwise specified in this Code, this Subsection applies to the outdoor storage of dangerous goods in packages or containers.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 4. or otherwise specified in this Code, this Subsection applies to the outdoor storage of dangerous goods in packages or containers.

National Sentence Text: This Section applies only to those areas or buildings in distilleries where distilled beverage alcohols are concentrated, blended, mixed, stored or packaged. (See Note A-4.10.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies only to those areas or buildings in distilleries where distilled beverage alcohols are concentrated, blended, mixed, stored or packaged. (See Note A-4.10.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Hot works performed on or in close proximity to a tank vehicle shall conform to Section 5.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot works performed on or in close proximity to a tank vehicle shall conform to part 5.

National Sentence Text: Where it is not possible to effectively remove the dust by vacuum, it is permitted to use compressed air or other means that will cause the dust to become suspended in the air during removal if, in the dust removal area, all sources of ignition are eliminated, and all machinery and equipment is de-energized, unless such machinery or equipment is suitable for use in atmospheres containing combustible dusts, in conformance with CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
