National Sentence Text: Merchandising or public activities in a sprinklered covered mall described in Article 2.12.1.1. shall not be permitted where such activity will create a hazard exceeding the design criteria for which the sprinkler system was designed.
P/T Sentence Text: Merchandising or public activities in a sprinklered covered mall described in Article 2.12.1.1. shall not be permitted where such activity will create a hazard exceeding the design criteria for which the sprinkler system was designed.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.13.10.(2), normal and emergency vents for storage tanks in buildings shall be provided in conformance with Subsections 4.3.4.and 4.3.5. (See Note A-4.3.13.10.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.13.10.(2), normal and emergency vents for storage tanks in buildings shall be provided in conformance with Subsections 4.and 4. (See Note A-4.3.13.10.(1).)

National Sentence Text: A mechanical ventilation system is deemed to comply with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(3) if it is capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h/m2 of room area, but not less than 250 m3/h.
P/T Sentence Text: A mechanical ventilation system is deemed to comply with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(3) if it is capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h/m2 of room area, but not less than 250 m3/h.

National Sentence Text: Where storage tanks at a marine fuel-dispensing station are elevated above the dispenser, an automatically operated valve that is designed to open only when the dispenser is being operated, so as to prevent gravity draining of the tank in the event of a rupture of the supply line to the dispenser, shall be provided at the storage tank outlet, positioned adjacent to and outside the valve specified in Article 4.3.6.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Where storage tanks at a marine fuel-dispensing station are elevated above the dispenser, an automatically operated valve that is designed to open only when the dispenser is being operated, so as to prevent gravity draining of the tank in the event of a rupture of the supply line to the dispenser, shall be provided at the storage tank outlet, positioned adjacent to and outside the valve specified in Article 4.3.6.1.

National Sentence Text: Exposed pipe risers shall be protected against mechanical damage by installing such risers adjacent to walls or pilasters, between flanges of steel columns, or within securely anchored larger perforated pipe, and providing mechanical guards where the risers are exposed to mobile equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Exposed pipe risers shall be protected against mechanical damage by installing such risers adjacent to walls or pilasters, between flanges of steel columns, or within securely anchored larger perforated pipe, and providing mechanical guards where the risers are exposed to mobile equipment.

National Sentence Text: When any portion of a fire protection system is temporarily shut down, alternative measures shall be taken to ensure that protection is maintained. (See Note A-6.1.1.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: When any portion of a fire protection system is temporarily shut down, alternative measures shall be taken to ensure that protection is maintained. (See Note A-6.1.1.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 80-B:C shall be provided in the vicinity of pumps and ancillary equipment used for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 80-B:C shall be provided in the vicinity of pumps and ancillary equipment used for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Where a building is sprinklered in conformance with Sentence 2.1.3.1.(1), small hose (38 stations are permitted to be supplied from interior sprinkler piping.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a building is sprinklered in conformance with Sentence 2.1.3.1.(1), small hose (38 stations are permitted to be supplied from interior sprinkler piping.

National Sentence Text: Connections for all openings in storage tanks in buildings shall be liquid- and vapour-tight.
P/T Sentence Text: Connections for all openings in storage tanks in buildings shall be liquid- and vapour-tight.

National Sentence Text: Where tests, repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including sprinkler and standpipe systems, a procedure of notification shall be established. (See Note A-6.1.1.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where tests, repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including sprinkler and standpipe systems, a procedure of notification shall be established. (See Note A-6.1.1.3.(1).)

National Sentence Text: In the case of underground storage tanks or piping, the test referred to in Sentence 4.4.3.2.(2) shall be conducted prior to covering the tank or piping system.
P/T Sentence Text: In the case of underground storage tanks or piping, the test referred to in Sentence 4.4.3.2.(2) shall be conducted prior to covering the tank or piping system.

National Sentence Text: Where protection is required by this Code, storage areas for flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 30-2012 Flammable and Combustible Liquids Code or protected by an automatic fire suppression system. (See Note A-4.2.7.6.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where protection is required by this Code, storage areas for flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 30-2012 Flammable and Combustible Liquids Code or protected by an automatic fire suppression system.

National Sentence Text: Provision shall be made for the safe drainage and containment of waste oils or dangerous goods emptied or escaping from stored products under normal storage conditions or in a fire situation, in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Provision shall be made for the safe drainage and containment of waste oils or dangerous goods emptied or escaping from stored products under normal storage conditions or in a fire situation, in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: In sprinkleredmercantile occupancies, the maximum quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted to be stored in a single suite shall be the lesser of 24 L/m2 of the total area of the suite, provided that not more than 6 L/m2 are Class I liquids, of which not more than 1 L/m2 shall be Class IA, Class IB, or any combination of these 2 classes, or 24 000 L, provided that not more than 6 000 L are Class I liquids, of which not more than 1 000 L shall be Class IA, Class IB, or any combination of these 2 classes.
P/T Sentence Text: In sprinkleredmercantile occupancies, the maximum quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted to be stored in a single suite shall be the lesser of 24 L/m2 of the total area of the suite, provided that not more than 6 L/m2 are Class I liquids, of which not more than 1 L/m2 shall be Class IA, Class IB, or any combination of these 2 classes, or 24 000 L, provided that not more than 6 000 L are Class I liquids, of which not more than 1 000 L shall be Class IA, Class IB, or any combination of these 2 classes.

National Sentence Text: When a single class of liquid is stored, the total quantity in a single fire compartment shall be not more than 2 500 L of Class IB and IC liquids, 5 000 L of Class II liquids, or 10 000 L of Class IIIA liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: When a single class of liquid is stored, the total quantity in a single fire compartment shall be not more than 2 500 L of Class IB and IC liquids, 5 000 L of Class II liquids, or 10 000 L of Class IIIA liquids.

National Sentence Text: Every identification tag shall be kept clean so that its colour and inscription are easily recognizable.
P/T Sentence Text: Every identification tag shall be kept clean so that its colour and inscription are easily recognizable.

National Sentence Text: Gaskets in flanged connections shall be of a material resistant to the liquid being carried and capable of withstanding temperatures of at least 650°C without damage that would impair their function. (See Note A-4.5.5.6.)
P/T Sentence Text: Gaskets in flanged connections shall be of a material resistant to the liquid being carried and capable of withstanding temperatures of at least 650°C without damage that would impair their function.

National Sentence Text: Thermal electrical conduction heating conforming to Sentence 4.5.8.4.(2) is permitted to be used by passing a low-voltage alternating current through the pipe.
P/T Sentence Text: Thermal electrical conduction heating conforming to Sentence 4.5.8.4.(2) is permitted to be used by passing a low-voltage alternating current through the pipe.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted at self-service outlets, a qualified attendant shall be in constant control of the dispensing of Class I and II liquids into the fuel tanks of motor vehicles, watercraft or floatplanes, or into containers.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted at self-service outlets, a qualified attendant shall be in constant control of the dispensing of Class I and II liquids into the fuel tanks of motor vehicles, watercraft or floatplanes, or into containers.

National Sentence Text: Conveying equipment bearings shall be accessible for inspection and maintenance, lubricated to prevent overheating, and kept free of accumulation of combustible dusts.
P/T Sentence Text: Conveying equipment bearings shall be accessible for inspection and maintenance, lubricated to prevent overheating, and kept free of accumulation of combustible dusts.

National Sentence Text: Wastes from dangerous goods shall be identified to prevent accidental mixing of incompatible chemicals, and included in the quantities specified in Article 5.5.5.1. (See Note A-5.6.1.1.)
P/T Sentence Text: Wastes from dangerous goods shall be identified to prevent accidental mixing of incompatible chemicals, and included in the quantities specified in Article 5.5.5.1.

National Sentence Text: Steel shut-off valves shall be provided at connecting outlets on aboveground storage tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Steel shut-off valves shall be provided at connecting outlets on aboveground storage tanks.

National Sentence Text: A covered mall referred to in Sentence 2.12.1.1.(1) is permitted to be used for merchandising or public activities on a temporary basis provided it conforms to Articles 2.12.1.2.to 2.12.1.9., and the fire safety plan required in Section 2.8. includes additional provisions to offset any hazard that may be created by such activity.
P/T Sentence Text: A covered mall referred to in Sentence 2.12.1.1.(1) is permitted to be used for merchandising or public activities on a temporary basis provided it conforms to Articles 2.12.1.2.to 2.12.1.9., and the fire safety plan required in part 2. includes additional provisions to offset any hazard that may be created by such activity.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(2), the base and walls of a secondary containment shall be made of noncombustible materials, and shall be designed, constructed and maintained to withstand full hydrostatic head, and provide a permeability of not more than 10-6 cm/s to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids contained in the storage tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(2), the base and walls of a secondary containment shall be made of noncombustible materials, and shall be designed, constructed and maintained to withstand full hydrostatic head, and provide a permeability of not more than 10-6 cm/s to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids contained in the storage tanks.

National Sentence Text: Underground piping systems shall include piping in tank sumps, transition sumps and dispenser sumps.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground piping systems shall include piping in tank sumps, transition sumps and dispenser sumps.

National Sentence Text: Operating personnel shall be trained on how to summon the nearest fire department in the event of fire.
P/T Sentence Text: Operating personnel shall be trained on how to summon the nearest fire department in the event of fire.

National Sentence Text: Oil or grease shall not be used with equipment for oxygen.
P/T Sentence Text: Oil or grease shall not be used with equipment for oxygen.

National Sentence Text: The design, fabrication, assembly and inspection of piping and pumping systems containing distilled beverage alcohols shall be suitable for the anticipated maximum working pressures, operating temperatures, internal corrosion conditions and structural stresses to which they could be subjected. (See Note A-4.10.5.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: When nonfixed seats are provided at tables arranged in rows, the spacing between the nearest edges of tables in 2 successive rows shall be not less than 1 400 mm where seating is arranged on both sides of tables (back to back), or 1 000 mm where seating is on one side only.
P/T Sentence Text: When nonfixed seats are provided at tables arranged in rows, the spacing between the nearest edges of tables in 2 successive rows shall be not less than 1 400 mm where seating is arranged on both sides of tables (back to back), or 1 000 mm where seating is on one side only.

National Sentence Text: Exit lighting and exit signs shall be illuminated during times when the building is occupied.
P/T Sentence Text: Exit lighting and exit signs shall be illuminated during times when the building is occupied.

National Sentence Text: Where smoking is permitted on a construction, alteration, or demolition site, it shall only be permitted in designated smoking areas, which shall be located not less than 3 m away from the building or part of the building under construction, demolition, or alteration, be identified with appropriate signage, be provided with safe receptacles for the disposal of smoking materials, and have a clearance of not less than 3 m from any combustible storage or combustible refuse maintained at all times. (See Note A-5.6.3.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where smoking is permitted on a construction, alteration, or demolition site, it shall only be permitted in designated smoking areas, which shall be located not less than 3 m away from the building or part of the building under construction, demolition, or alteration, be identified with appropriate signage, be provided with safe receptacles for the disposal of smoking materials, and have a clearance of not less than 3 m from any combustible storage or combustible refuse maintained at all times.

National Sentence Text: Where firefighting access to storage tanks containing Class I or II liquids is not provided, fire extinguishing measures conforming to Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2) shall be provided. (See Note A-4.3.2.5.)
P/T Sentence Text: Where firefighting access to storage tanks containing Class I or II liquids is not provided, fire extinguishing measures conforming to Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2) shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials in excess of those permitted in Sentence 5.5.3.2.(1) shall be stored outside of the laboratory in conformance with Section 3.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials in excess of those permitted in Sentence 5.5.3.2.(1) shall be stored outside of the laboratory in conformance with part 3.

National Sentence Text: Flanged joints for piping shall be provided in welded systems at intervals that will facilitate dismantling and avoid subsequent in-place cutting and welding operations.
P/T Sentence Text: Flanged joints for piping shall be provided in welded systems at intervals that will facilitate dismantling and avoid subsequent in-place cutting and welding operations.

P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the indoor storage of packaged aerosol products as classified in Article 3.2.5.2. (See Note A-3.2.5.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Exterior passageways and exterior exit stairs serving occupied buildings shall be maintained free of snow and ice accumulations.

National Sentence Text: Liquid media leak detection testing of piping systems shall conform to Sentences 4.4.3.4.(2)to 4.4.3.4.(9).

P/T Sentence Text: Where closures are damaged so as to affect the integrity of their fire-protection rating, they shall be repaired so that their integrity is maintained in conformance with Article 2.2.2.1.

P/T Sentence Text: Where practicable, overhead piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.11.(1) shall be supported from building framing members.

P/T Sentence Text: A clear space of not less than 2.4 m shall be maintained between the oxidizing substances identified in Sentence 3.2.7.18.(2) and any other dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.1.2.6.)

National Sentence Text: This Part shall not apply to the transportation of flammable liquids or combustible liquids under TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) appliances and their ancillary equipment within the scope of CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment (see Note A-4.1.1.1.(3)(b)), the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids on farms for individual farm use and on isolated construction projects, or the storage of aerosol products covered under Subsection 3.2.5.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part shall not apply to the transportation of flammable liquids or combustible liquids under TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) appliances and their ancillary equipment within the scope of CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment (see Note A-4.1.1.1.(3)(b)), the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids on farms for individual farm use and on isolated construction projects, or the storage of aerosol products covered under part 3.

National Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified herein, the documents referenced in this Code shall include all amendments, revisions, reaffirmations, reapprovals, addenda and supplements effective to 30 June 2017.
P/T Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified herein, the documents referenced in this Code shall include all amendments, revisions, reaffirmations, reapprovals, addenda and supplements effective to 30 June 2017.

National Sentence Text: No storage tank at a marine fuel-dispensing station shall be located closer than 4.5 m horizontally from the normal annual high-water mark.
P/T Sentence Text: No storage tank at a marine fuel-dispensing station shall be located closer than 4.5 m horizontally from the normal annual high-water mark.

National Sentence Text: A 2-way communication system between the control console and each pump island shall be provided at self-service outlets.
P/T Sentence Text: A 2-way communication system between the control console and each pump island shall be provided at self-service outlets.

National Sentence Text: Where a Type B dedicated storage area is required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), it shall be separated from the remainder of the building by partitions having not less than a 1 hfire-resistance rating, capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans, and extending to the underside of the roof or to a ceiling of construction equivalent to the partitions.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a Type B dedicated storage area is required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), it shall be separated from the remainder of the building by partitions having not less than a 1 hfire-resistance rating, capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans, and extending to the underside of the roof or to a ceiling of construction equivalent to the partitions.

National Sentence Text: Vent pipe outlets from underground storage tanks for Class I liquids shall be located outside buildings higher than the fill pipe openings but not less than 3.5 m above the adjacent ground level, 1.5 m from any building opening, and 7.5 m from any dispenser, and shall discharge so that flammable vapours will not enter building openings or be trapped near any part of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent pipe outlets from underground storage tanks for Class I liquids shall be located outside buildings higher than the fill pipe openings but not less than 3.5 m above the adjacent ground level, 1.5 m from any building opening, and 7.5 m from any dispenser, and shall discharge so that flammable vapours will not enter building openings or be trapped near any part of the building.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable, lighter-than-air gases are permitted to be stored outside of a room described in Sentence 3.2.8.2.(1), provided the aggregate capacity per fire compartment of expanded gas outside of the room is not more than 60 m3 in an unsprinklered building of combustible construction, and 170 m3 in a sprinkleredbuilding or in a building of noncombustible construction. (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable, lighter-than-air gases are permitted to be stored outside of a room described in Sentence 3.2.8.2.(1), provided the aggregate capacity per fire compartment of expanded gas outside of the room is not more than 60 m3 in an unsprinklered building of combustible construction, and 170 m3 in a sprinkleredbuilding or in a building of noncombustible construction.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 4.5.9., the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids by means of pressure applied to a container or storage tank shall not be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 4., the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids by means of pressure applied to a container or storage tank shall not be permitted.

National Sentence Text: Where Class I liquids are required to be kept in individual storage or dispensing containers having a capacity greater than 5 L in a laboratory, such containers shall be safety containers conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers and have a capacity of not more than 25 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Class I liquids are required to be kept in individual storage or dispensing containers having a capacity greater than 5 L in a laboratory, such containers shall be safety containers conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers and have a capacity of not more than 25 L.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.10.7.(6), maintenance shall not be carried out on piping systems while they are under pressure.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.10.7.(6), maintenance shall not be carried out on piping systems while they are under pressure.

National Sentence Text: Bonding, grounding and isolation components for protection against static charges during the loading or unloading of tank vehicles or tank cars shall be provided when transferring flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Bonding, grounding and isolation components for protection against static charges during the loading or unloading of tank vehicles or tank cars shall be provided when transferring flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall not be parked inside a building unless the building is specifically designed for that purpose, there is sufficient space in the tank vehicle compartment to accommodate the thermal expansion of the flammable liquid or combustible liquid, and the tank vehicle has no leaks of flammable liquid or combustible liquid.
P/T Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall not be parked inside a building unless the building is specifically designed for that purpose, there is sufficient space in the tank vehicle compartment to accommodate the thermal expansion of the flammable liquid or combustible liquid, and the tank vehicle has no leaks of flammable liquid or combustible liquid.

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall be reviewed at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that it takes account of changes in the use and other characteristics of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall be reviewed at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that it takes account of changes in the use and other characteristics of the building.

National Sentence Text: The closures in vent openings into smoke shafts from each floor area shall be tested in conformance with Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will open as required in Chapter 3, Sentence (5) of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)
P/T Sentence Text: The closures in vent openings into smoke shafts from each floor area shall be tested in conformance with Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will open as required in Chapter 3, Sentence (5) of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)

National Sentence Text: Underground steel storage tanks shall be installed in conformance with Appendix A of ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Underground steel storage tanks shall be installed in conformance with Appendix A of ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Where larger quantities than those permitted by Sentence 4.2.8.2.(2) are required, such quantities shall be in storage tanks installed in conformance with Sentence 4.3.13.4.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Where larger quantities than those permitted by Sentence 4.2.8.2.(2) are required, such quantities shall be in storage tanks installed in conformance with Sentence 4.3.13.4.(2).

National Sentence Text: Class I and II liquids shall not be dispensed at a fuel-dispensing station into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle while any part of the motor vehicle or any vehicle attached to it is on a street.
P/T Sentence Text: Class I and II liquids shall not be dispensed at a fuel-dispensing station into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle while any part of the motor vehicle or any vehicle attached to it is on a street.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.3.2.(2), the size of individual storage areas shall not exceed the limits shown in Table 3.2.3.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.3.2.(2), the size of individual storage areas shall not exceed the limits shown in Table 3.2.3.2.

National Sentence Text: Main access aisles shall be accessible from at least 2 fire department access points, which shall be located such that, in the event one becomes unusable due to fire, the other will still allow emergency responders to access the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Main access aisles shall be accessible from at least 2 fire department access points, which shall be located such that, in the event one becomes unusable due to fire, the other will still allow emergency responders to access the building.

National Sentence Text: At least one copy of the fire emergency procedures shall be prominently posted on each floor area.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one copy of the fire emergency procedures shall be prominently posted on each floor area.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.3.(2), the size limits and clearances for individual storage areas shall conform to Subsections 3.3.3.and 3.3.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.3.(2), the size limits and clearances for individual storage areas shall conform to Subsections 3.and 3.

National Sentence Text: Where equipment for handling flammable liquids or combustible liquids has to be repaired, it shall be removed and taken to maintenance areas when possible.
P/T Sentence Text: Where equipment for handling flammable liquids or combustible liquids has to be repaired, it shall be removed and taken to maintenance areas when possible.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall conform to Part 3..
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall conform to part 3..

National Sentence Text: ASTM D 3278-96 Flash Point of Liquids by Small Scale Closed-Cup Apparatus is permitted to be used for paints, enamels, lacquers, varnishes and related products and their components having flash points between 0°C and 110°C, and having a kinematic viscosity less than 150 St at 25°C.
P/T Sentence Text: ASTM D 3278-96 Flash Point of Liquids by Small Scale Closed-Cup Apparatus is permitted to be used for paints, enamels, lacquers, varnishes and related products and their components having flash points between 0°C and 110°C, and having a kinematic viscosity less than 150 St at 25°C.

National Sentence Text: Any combustible and flammable material, dust or residue shall be removed from the area where hot work is carried out, or except as provided in Sentence 5.2.3.2.(2), protected against ignition by the use of noncombustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Any combustible and flammable material, dust or residue shall be removed from the area where hot work is carried out, or except as provided in Sentence 5.2.3.2.(2), protected against ignition by the use of noncombustible materials.

National Sentence Text: An area where smoking is not permitted in Sentence 2.4.2.1.(1) shall be identified by signs conforming to Article 2.4.2.2.
P/T Sentence Text: An area where smoking is not permitted in Sentence 2.4.2.1.(1) shall be identified by signs conforming to Article 2.4.2.2.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of rubber tires.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of rubber tires.

National Sentence Text: Where handicapped children are being cared for in a centre, sufficient staff shall be present to escort the children to safety during the period they are in the centre.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where handicapped children are being cared for in a centre, sufficient staff shall be present to escort the children to safety during the period they are in the centre.

P/T Sentence Text: Community care facilities shall be staffed in accordance with the Community Care and Assisted Living Act and its regulations.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Community care facilities shall be staffed in accordance with the Community Care and Assisted Living Act and its regulations.

National Sentence Text: Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the British Columbia Building Code..
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the British Columbia Building Code..

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to laboratories where dangerous goods, including flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are used. (See Note A-5.5.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to laboratories where dangerous goods, including flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are used. (See Note A-5.5.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Unobstructed access to fire hydrants, portable extinguishers and to fire department connections for standpipe and sprinkler systems shall be maintained.
P/T Sentence Text: Unobstructed access to fire hydrants, portable extinguishers and to fire department connections for standpipe and sprinkler systems shall be maintained.

National Sentence Text: Piping between the shore and piers or wharves shall be provided with swing joints or flexible connections designed in conformance with good engineering practice to permit the independent movement of the pier or wharf and shore piping without strain on the pipe.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping between the shore and piers or wharves shall be provided with swing joints or flexible connections designed in conformance with good engineering practice to permit the independent movement of the pier or wharf and shore piping without strain on the pipe.

National Sentence Text: When there is a possibility of sparks or open flames reaching combustible materials in areas adjacent to the area where hot work is carried out, openings in walls, floors or ceilings shall be covered or closed to prevent the passage of sparks or open flames to such adjacent areas, or Sentence 5.2.3.1.(2) shall apply to such adjacent areas.
P/T Sentence Text: When there is a possibility of sparks or open flames reaching combustible materials in areas adjacent to the area where hot work is carried out, openings in walls, floors or ceilings shall be covered or closed to prevent the passage of sparks or open flames to such adjacent areas, or Sentence 5.2.3.1.(2) shall apply to such adjacent areas.

National Sentence Text: When an aboveground storage tank will be out of service or unsupervised for a period exceeding 180 days, all liquid and vapours shall be removed from the storage tank and its connected piping.
P/T Sentence Text: When an aboveground storage tank will be out of service or unsupervised for a period exceeding 180 days, all liquid and vapours shall be removed from the storage tank and its connected piping.

National Sentence Text: Stored dangerous goods other than compressed gases shall be kept not less than 100 mm above the floor level.
P/T Sentence Text: Stored dangerous goods other than compressed gases shall be kept not less than 100 mm above the floor level.

National Sentence Text: This Section does not apply to distilleries covered in Section 4.10.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section does not apply to distilleries covered in part 4.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.3.1.4.(2), a dust collector having a capacity greater than 2.36 m3/s shall be located outside of a building, and be equipped with explosion venting to the outdoors of not less than 0.1 m2 of vent area for each cubic metre of dust collector enclosure volume.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.3.1.4.(2), a dust collector having a capacity greater than 2.36 m3/s shall be located outside of a building, and be equipped with explosion venting to the outdoors of not less than 0.1 m2 of vent area for each cubic metre of dust collector enclosure volume.

National Sentence Text: Except for fires used for cooking in fireplaces, grills or barbecues, open air fires shall not be set unless appropriate measures are taken to limit their spread. (See Note A-2.4.5.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except for fires used for cooking in fireplaces, grills or barbecues, open air fires shall not be set unless appropriate measures are taken to limit their spread. (See Note A-2.4.5.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Where a Type A dedicated storage area is required to accommodate the storage limits stated in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), it shall be separated from the remainder of the building by chain link fencing or a noncombustible partition that is capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans and that extends to the underside of the roof deck or to the ceiling which must also be capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a Type A dedicated storage area is required to accommodate the storage limits stated in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), it shall be separated from the remainder of the building by chain link fencing or a noncombustible partition that is capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans and that extends to the underside of the roof deck or to the ceiling which must also be capable of withstanding the impact of rocketing cans.

National Sentence Text: Except where otherwise stated in this Part, this Section shall not apply to the following: tubing or casings and piping for oil or gas wells, transmission pipelines, piping for vehicles, aircraft, watercraft and portable or stationary engines, piping systems in fuel-dispensing stations and distilleries, and piping that falls within the scope of the applicable provincial or territorial codes regulating boilers and pressure vessels.
P/T Sentence Text: Except where otherwise stated in this Part, this Section shall not apply to the following: tubing or casings and piping for oil or gas wells, transmission pipelines, piping for vehicles, aircraft, watercraft and portable or stationary engines, piping systems in fuel-dispensing stations and distilleries, and piping that falls within the scope of the applicable provincial or territorial codes regulating boilers and pressure vessels.

National Sentence Text: At least one stairway conforming to Sentence 5.6.3.7.(1) shall be extended upward as each floor is installed in new construction, or maintained for each floor still remaining during demolition. (See also Article 8.2.1.3. of Division B of the NBC.)
P/T Sentence Text: At least one stairway conforming to Sentence 5.6.3.7.(1) shall be extended upward as each floor is installed in new construction, or maintained for each floor still remaining during demolition.

National Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted in an outdoor storage area. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted in an outdoor storage area. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Closed containers of Class I and II liquids shall not be stacked more than 1.5 m high on floors, or 1 m high on individual fixed shelves.
P/T Sentence Text: Closed containers of Class I and II liquids shall not be stacked more than 1.5 m high on floors, or 1 m high on individual fixed shelves.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 5.5.5.3.(7), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases of pyrophoric materials shall be located in a gas storage cabinet that is continuously mechanically ventilated, and sprinklered.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 5.5.5.3.(7), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases of pyrophoric materials shall be located in a gas storage cabinet that is continuously mechanically ventilated, and sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: Smoke alarms shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S552-14 Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Smoke Alarms
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke alarms shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S552-14 Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Smoke Alarms

National Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements in Sentence 4.6.8.5.(1), attendants on duty at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after all ports and hatches on the watercraft have been closed, and ensure that containers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are not filled beyond their safe filling level, and are filled only after they have been removed from the watercraft or floatplane.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements in Sentence 4.6.8.5.(1), attendants on duty at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after all ports and hatches on the watercraft have been closed, and ensure that containers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are not filled beyond their safe filling level, and are filled only after they have been removed from the watercraft or floatplane.

National Sentence Text: Facilities to control possible spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be provided at loading and unloading points, in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Facilities to control possible spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be provided at loading and unloading points, in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Normal vent pipe outlets for storage tanks of Class II or IIIA liquids shall discharge outside buildings not less than 2 m above the adjacent ground level, and 1.5 m from any building opening.
P/T Sentence Text: Normal vent pipe outlets for storage tanks of Class II or IIIA liquids shall discharge outside buildings not less than 2 m above the adjacent ground level, and 1.5 m from any building opening.

National Sentence Text: Tank supports shall be installed on firm foundations designed to minimize uneven settling of the tank and to minimize corrosion of the part of the tank resting on the foundation.
P/T Sentence Text: Tank supports shall be installed on firm foundations designed to minimize uneven settling of the tank and to minimize corrosion of the part of the tank resting on the foundation.

National Sentence Text: In sprinkleredbuildings, the clearance between the top of storage and ceiling sprinkler deflectors shall conform to the standard used to design the sprinkler system.
P/T Sentence Text: In sprinkleredbuildings, the clearance between the top of storage and ceiling sprinkler deflectors shall conform to the standard used to design the sprinkler system.

National Sentence Text: Portable electrical systems shall be inspected for fire hazards and defects shall be corrected before the tent or air-supported structure is occupied by the public.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable electrical systems shall be inspected for fire hazards and defects shall be corrected before the tent or air-supported structure is occupied by the public.

National Sentence Text: Broken packages or containers of dangerous goods shall be moved to a safe location and the product repackaged and labelled as soon as possible.
P/T Sentence Text: Broken packages or containers of dangerous goods shall be moved to a safe location and the product repackaged and labelled as soon as possible.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.2.3.1.(2), hot work shall be carried out in an area free of combustible and flammable contents, with walls, ceilings and floors of noncombustible construction or lined with noncombustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.2.3.1.(2), hot work shall be carried out in an area free of combustible and flammable contents, with walls, ceilings and floors of noncombustible construction or lined with noncombustible materials.

National Sentence Text: Protective guarding devices shall be provided where necessary to prevent damage to the mechanical components of doors in fire separations, and installed so as not to interfere with the proper operation of the doors.
P/T Sentence Text: Protective guarding devices shall be provided where necessary to prevent damage to the mechanical components of doors in fire separations, and installed so as not to interfere with the proper operation of the doors.

National Sentence Text: Defects that interfere with the operation of closures in fire separations shall be corrected, and such closures shall be maintained to ensure that they are operable at all times by keeping fusible links and other heat-actuated devices undamaged and free of paint and dirt, keeping guides, bearings and stay rolls clean and lubricated, making necessary adjustments and repairs to door hardware and accessories to ensure proper closing and latching, and repairing or replacing inoperative parts of hold-open devices and automatic releasing devices.
P/T Sentence Text: Defects that interfere with the operation of closures in fire separations shall be corrected, and such closures shall be maintained to ensure that they are operable at all times by keeping fusible links and other heat-actuated devices undamaged and free of paint and dirt, keeping guides, bearings and stay rolls clean and lubricated, making necessary adjustments and repairs to door hardware and accessories to ensure proper closing and latching, and repairing or replacing inoperative parts of hold-open devices and automatic releasing devices.

National Sentence Text: Mattresses, bed linen, window drapes and cubicle curtains need not comply with Sentences 2.3.2.3.(1)and 2.3.2.3.(2) if used in suites in a building of care occupancy, or care occupancies with not more than 10 residents. (See also Sections 3.2. and 3.3.)
P/T Sentence Text: Mattresses, bed linen, window drapes and cubicle curtains need not comply with Sentences 2.3.2.3.(1)and 2.3.2.3.(2) if used in suites in a building of care occupancy, or care occupancies with not more than 10 residents.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to process plants where ethanol is produced for fuel purposes.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to process plants where ethanol is produced for fuel purposes.

National Sentence Text: Where a building being demolished floor by floor is equipped with a standpipe system, the system, together with fire department connections and valves, shall be maintained in operable condition on all storeys below the one being demolished, except for the storey immediately below it.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a building being demolished floor by floor is equipped with a standpipe system, the system, together with fire department connections and valves, shall be maintained in operable condition on all storeys below the one being demolished, except for the storey immediately below it.

National Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs at a demolition site that contain combustible liquids or flammable liquids or that are likely to contain flammable vapours shall be drained and, except as permitted by Sentence 5.6.1.11.(3), removed prior to the demolition of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs at a demolition site that contain combustible liquids or flammable liquids or that are likely to contain flammable vapours shall be drained and, except as permitted by Sentence 5.6.1.11.(3), removed prior to the demolition of the building.

National Sentence Text: Existing gas, electrical, water, steam and other services are permitted to be left within the area of the excavation provided that before work begins, the service company concerned has approved the proposed method of operation, the location of the services is determined before excavation commences, a suitable method of excavation is adopted that will ensure that the services are not damaged, and the services are provided with suitable temporary supports.
P/T Sentence Text: Existing gas, electrical, water, steam and other services are permitted to be left within the area of the excavation provided that before work begins, the service company concerned has approved the proposed method of operation, the location of the services is determined before excavation commences, a suitable method of excavation is adopted that will ensure that the services are not damaged, and the services are provided with suitable temporary supports.

National Sentence Text: Vents to vestibules permitted to be manually openable shall be maintained in an operable condition.
P/T Sentence Text: Vents to vestibules permitted to be manually openable shall be maintained in an operable condition.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in refrigerated areas where such refrigeration is necessary to stabilize the substances.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in refrigerated areas where such refrigeration is necessary to stabilize the substances.

National Sentence Text: Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Except for designated safe smoking areas conforming to Subsection 2.4.2., smoking shall not be permitted in areas described in Article 4.1.1.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Except for designated safe smoking areas conforming to part 2., smoking shall not be permitted in areas described in Article 4.1.1.1.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure B is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (7) of Measure B, and closures to vent openings in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentences (5) and (6) of Measure B open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure B, closures in openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentence (5) of Measure B shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshaft as required by Sentence (3) of Measure B.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure B is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (7) of Measure B, and closures to vent openings in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentences (5) and (6) of Measure B open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure B, closures in openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces that are required by Sentence (5) of Measure B shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshaft as required by Sentence (3) of Measure B.

National Sentence Text: The use of open flames as a heat source shall not be permitted for heating piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: The use of open flames as a heat source shall not be permitted for heating piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: The area underneath any storage tank greater than 1.2 m in diameter shall be protected by an automatic fire suppression system.
P/T Sentence Text: The area underneath any storage tank greater than 1.2 m in diameter shall be protected by an automatic fire suppression system.

National Sentence Text: The occupants of any premises adjacent to that in which fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging is to take place shall be given prior notice.
P/T Sentence Text: The occupants of any premises adjacent to that in which fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging is to take place shall be given prior notice.

National Sentence Text: Where tents and air-supported structures are designed to accommodate more than 1 000 persons, a fire alarm and emergency communication system shall be provided. (See Note A-2.9.3.5.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where tents and air-supported structures are designed to accommodate more than 1 000 persons, a fire alarm and emergency communication system shall be provided. (See Note A-2.9.3.5.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The minimum separation between a flammable liquid or combustible liquidstorage tank and a liquefied petroleum gas cylinder or tank shall be 6 m.
P/T Sentence Text: The minimum separation between a flammable liquid or combustible liquidstorage tank and a liquefied petroleum gas cylinder or tank shall be 6 m.

National Sentence Text: The quantity of dangerous goods kept in a laboratory shall be minimized and shall not exceed the lesser of the supply necessary for normal operation, or when located in a Group A, Division 2 educational or a Group D major occupancy, 300 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 50 L shall be Class I liquids, or a Group B major occupancy, the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted in Sentence 4.2.6.3.(1). (See Note A-5.5.5.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The quantity of dangerous goods kept in a laboratory shall be minimized and shall not exceed the lesser of the supply necessary for normal operation, or when located in a Group A, Division 2 educational or a Group D major occupancy, 300 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 50 L shall be Class I liquids, or a Group B major occupancy, the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted in Sentence 4.2.6.3.(1).

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in conformance with Part 3.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in conformance with Part 3.

National Sentence Text: Rooms for storage tanks inside buildings, referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), shall be separated from the rest of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h, designed to contain a spill equal to at least 100% of the volume of the largest storage tank, or to drain away spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids, made liquid-tight where the walls join the floor, and used for no other purposes than the storage and handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Rooms for storage tanks inside buildings, referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), shall be separated from the rest of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h, designed to contain a spill equal to at least 100% of the volume of the largest storage tank, or to drain away spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids, made liquid-tight where the walls join the floor, and used for no other purposes than the storage and handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: A fire safety plan conforming to Section 2.8. and Sentences 3.3.2.9.(2)and 3.3.2.9.(3) shall be prepared.
P/T Sentence Text: A fire safety plan conforming to part 2. and Sentences 3.3.2.9.(2)and 3.3.2.9.(3) shall be prepared.

National Sentence Text: The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the NBC. (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the NBC. (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code. (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code. (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: A means shall be provided to alert site personnel of a fire and such means shall be capable of being heard throughout the building or facility.
P/T Sentence Text: A means shall be provided to alert site personnel of a fire and such means shall be capable of being heard throughout the building or facility.

National Sentence Text: Electrical installations shall be used and maintained so as not to constitute an undue fire hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical installations shall be used and maintained so as not to constitute an undue fire hazard.

National Sentence Text: Up to 3 m3 of loose combustible fibres are permitted to be kept in a fire compartment provided they are stored in metal-lined bins equipped with self-closing metal-lined covers.
P/T Sentence Text: Up to 3 m3 of loose combustible fibres are permitted to be kept in a fire compartment provided they are stored in metal-lined bins equipped with self-closing metal-lined covers.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks with an individual capacity exceeding 2 500 L but not exceeding 20 000 L that are used in conformance with Table 4.3.13.4.-B shall be of double-walled construction in conformance with Clause 4.3.1.2.(1)(e) or a minimum of 300 deg. secondarily contained construction, and monitored for leakage in conformance with Sentence 4.4.2.1.(7).
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks with an individual capacity exceeding 2 500 L but not exceeding 20 000 L that are used in conformance with Table 4.3.13.4.-B shall be of double-walled construction in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1) or a minimum of 300 deg. secondarily contained construction, and monitored for leakage in conformance with Sentence 4.4.2.1.(7).

National Sentence Text: Products classified as dangerous goods shall display appropriate identifying labels from the time they enter a facility until they are issued as finished products or waste material. (See Note A-3.2.7.13.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Products classified as dangerous goods shall display appropriate identifying labels from the time they enter a facility until they are issued as finished products or waste material. (See Note A-3.2.7.13.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Spark arresters installed in conformance with Articles 2.6.2.1.and 2.6.2.2. shall be inspected and cleaned at intervals not greater than 12 months or more frequently where accumulations of debris will adversely affect operations.
P/T Sentence Text: Spark arresters installed in conformance with Articles 2.6.2.1.and 2.6.2.2. shall be inspected and cleaned at intervals not greater than 12 months or more frequently where accumulations of debris will adversely affect operations.

National Sentence Text: Records of tests required in Sentences 2.7.2.1.(2), 2.7.2.1.(3)and 2.7.2.1.(4) shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
P/T Sentence Text: Records of tests required in Sentences 2.7.2.1.(2), 2.7.2.1.(3)and 2.7.2.1.(4) shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials, such as artwork and teaching materials, that are attached to walls shall not exceed 20% of the area of such walls.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Combustible materials, such as artwork and teaching materials, that are attached to walls shall not exceed 20% of the area of such walls.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials, such as artwork and teaching materials, that are attached to walls shall not cover more than 20% of the area of each wall.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Combustible materials, such as artwork and teaching materials, that are attached to walls shall not cover more than 20% of the area of each wall.

National Sentence Text: Helicopter refuelling, repair and maintenance operations shall not be carried out on helicopter landing areas on roofs except in an emergency.
P/T Sentence Text: Helicopter refuelling, repair and maintenance operations shall not be carried out on helicopter landing areas on roofs except in an emergency.

National Sentence Text: Connections for filling or emptying storage tanks shall be kept closed to prevent leakage when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Connections for filling or emptying storage tanks shall be kept closed to prevent leakage when not in use.

National Sentence Text: In the automotive shops or industrial arts area of an educational facility, storage of up to 75 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, including not more than 25 L of Class I liquids, shall be permitted outside of a cabinet or storage room as required in Article 4.2.6.2.
P/T Sentence Text: In the automotive shops or industrial arts area of an educational facility, storage of up to 75 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, including not more than 25 L of Class I liquids, shall be permitted outside of a cabinet or storage room as required in Article 4.2.6.2.

National Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be located in service tunnels that are used for pedestrian traffic other than maintenance personnel.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be located in service tunnels that are used for pedestrian traffic other than maintenance personnel.

National Sentence Text: Pipelines for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be marked with the contents of the line, and these markings shall be maintained in a clearly legible form.
P/T Sentence Text: Pipelines for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be marked with the contents of the line, and these markings shall be maintained in a clearly legible form.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.5.3.(2), flanged joints for piping shall be made with forged or cast steel flanges designed, constructed and installed in conformance with ASME B16.5-2017 Pipe Flanges and Flanged Fittings: NPS ½ Through NPS 24 Metric/Inch Standard
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.5.3.(2), flanged joints for piping shall be made with forged or cast steel flanges designed, constructed and installed in conformance with ASME B16.5-2017 Pipe Flanges and Flanged Fittings: NPS ½ Through NPS 24 Metric/Inch Standard

National Sentence Text: Pump houses and pump rooms shall not be used for any purpose other than to serve the pumping equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Pump houses and pump rooms shall not be used for any purpose other than to serve the pumping equipment.

National Sentence Text: Operation of card- or key-activated dispensers shall be restricted to persons authorized by the supply agent to possess a card or key to operate the dispensers.
P/T Sentence Text: Operation of card- or key-activated dispensers shall be restricted to persons authorized by the supply agent to possess a card or key to operate the dispensers.

National Sentence Text: Buildings for the shelter of personnel or pumps shall be considered a part of the loading or unloading facility.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings for the shelter of personnel or pumps shall be considered a part of the loading or unloading facility.

National Sentence Text: In every hotel and motel bedroom, the fire safety rules for occupants shall be posted showing the locations of exits and the paths of travel to exits.
P/T Sentence Text: In every hotel and motel bedroom, the fire safety rules for occupants shall be posted showing the locations of exits and the paths of travel to exits.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.7.3.(3), a secondary containment for more than one storage tank shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the sum of the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space, and 10% of the greater of the capacity specified in Clause 4.3.7.3.(2)(a), or the aggregate capacity of all other storage tanks located in the contained space.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.7.3.(3), a secondary containment for more than one storage tank shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the sum of the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space, and 10% of the greater of the capacity specified in Sentence 4.3.7.3.(2), or the aggregate capacity of all other storage tanks located in the contained space.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 4.3.8.3.(3), storage tanks subjected to vehicular traffic shall be installed not less than 1 m below finished ground level.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 4.3.8.3.(3), storage tanks subjected to vehicular traffic shall be installed not less than 1 m below finished ground level.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 5.5.5.6., the heating of dangerously reactive materials above normal ambient temperature or as specified in the Safety Data Sheet shall be carried out in a separate power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 5.5.4.2.to 5.5.4.4., and displaying conspicuously posted instructions specifying that the enclosure is to be used for this application only.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 5.5.5.6., the heating of dangerously reactive materials above normal ambient temperature or as specified in the Safety Data Sheet shall be carried out in a separate power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 5.5.4.2.to 5.5.4.4., and displaying conspicuously posted instructions specifying that the enclosure is to be used for this application only.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Articles 6.5.1.2.to 6.5.1.5., emergency power systems shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with CSA C282-15 Emergency Electrical Power Supply for Buildings
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Articles 6.5.1.2.to 6.5.1.5., emergency power systems shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with CSA C282-15 Emergency Electrical Power Supply for Buildings

National Sentence Text: Before a tank vehicle is unloaded, the volume of liquid in the receiving tank shall be measured to ensure that the tank can accept the volume to be unloaded.
P/T Sentence Text: Before a tank vehicle is unloaded, the volume of liquid in the receiving tank shall be measured to ensure that the tank can accept the volume to be unloaded.

National Sentence Text: Where continuous leak detection is provided on an underground piping system, it shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping
P/T Sentence Text: Where continuous leak detection is provided on an underground piping system, it shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping

National Sentence Text: Movable partitions or screens, including acoustical screens, shall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the area in which they are located.
P/T Sentence Text: Movable partitions or screens, including acoustical screens, shall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the area in which they are located.

National Sentence Text: Perchloric acid shall not be heated with an open flame or in a hot oil bath.
P/T Sentence Text: Perchloric acid shall not be heated with an open flame or in a hot oil bath.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Storage tank supports having less than a 2 h fire-resistance rating shall be protected by an automatic fire suppression system.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tank supports having less than a 2 h fire-resistance rating shall be protected by an automatic fire suppression system.

National Sentence Text: Underground piping systems shall comply with Sentence 4.5.6.1.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Underground piping systems shall comply with Sentence 4.5.6.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(2) of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(2) of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(2) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(2) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be painted red.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be painted red.

National Sentence Text: Devices having open flames shall be securely supported in noncombustible holders and shall be located or protected so as to prevent accidental contact of the flame with combustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Devices having open flames shall be securely supported in noncombustible holders and shall be located or protected so as to prevent accidental contact of the flame with combustible materials.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the indoor storage of Class I to IV commodities, Group A, B or C plastics, and closed containers of distilled beverage alcohol, in solid piles, on pallets, on shelves or in bin boxes or racks.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the indoor storage of Class I to IV commodities, Group A, B or C plastics, and closed containers of distilled beverage alcohol, in solid piles, on pallets, on shelves or in bin boxes or racks.

National Sentence Text: Vent pipe outlets from underground storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids shall be located outside buildings at a height that is above the fill pipe opening but not less than 2 m above finished ground level.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent pipe outlets from underground storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids shall be located outside buildings at a height that is above the fill pipe opening but not less than 2 m above finished ground level.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.7.9.(2)and 3.2.7.9.(3) and in Part 4., buildings used for the storage of dangerous goods regulated by this Subsection shall be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system, designed in conformance with Part 2. and good engineering practice with respect to specific dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.2.7.9.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.7.9.(2)and 3.2.7.9.(3) and in part 4., buildings used for the storage of dangerous goods regulated by this Subsection shall be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system, designed in conformance with part 2. and good engineering practice with respect to specific dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.2.7.9.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids that are in containers conforming to Clauses 4.2.3.1.(1)(a)to 4.2.3.1.(1)(d) having an individual capacity of not more than 230 L, portable tanks conforming to Clause 4.2.3.1.(1)(e) having an individual capacity of not more than 2 500 L, or intermediate bulk containers conforming to Clause 4.2.3.1.(1)(a) having an individual capacity of not more than 3 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids that are in containers conforming to Clauses 4.2.3.1.(1)to 4.2.3.1.(1) having an individual capacity of not more than 230 L, portable tanks conforming to Sentence 4.2.3.1.(1) having an individual capacity of not more than 2 500 L, or intermediate bulk containers conforming to Sentence 4.2.3.1.(1) having an individual capacity of not more than 3 000 L.

National Sentence Text: Water-miscible effluent from spills and firefighting operations is permitted to be directed into a sewer system provided it does not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety.
P/T Sentence Text: Water-miscible effluent from spills and firefighting operations is permitted to be directed into a sewer system provided it does not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety.

National Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall be supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration and stress on equipment connected to it.
P/T Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall be supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration and stress on equipment connected to it.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 5.6.1.13.(2), where a fire protection system is provided, it shall remain operational throughout the construction, alteration or demolition area where reasonably practical.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 5.6.1.13.(2), where a fire protection system is provided, it shall remain operational throughout the construction, alteration or demolition area where reasonably practical.

National Sentence Text: All employees concerned with transfer operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the procedures referred to in Article 4.5.10.1., the importance of constant attendance during all loading or unloading operations, extinguishing procedures for fires involving flammable liquids and combustible liquids, and the flammable liquid and combustible liquid colour coding and identification system required in Article 4.5.7.6.
P/T Sentence Text: All employees concerned with transfer operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the procedures referred to in Article 4.5.10.1., the importance of constant attendance during all loading or unloading operations, extinguishing procedures for fires involving flammable liquids and combustible liquids, and the flammable liquid and combustible liquid colour coding and identification system required in Article 4.5.7.6.

National Sentence Text: A visual inspection routine for the prompt detection of obviously abnormal conditions shall be established and shall be performed at least once each shift.
P/T Sentence Text: A visual inspection routine for the prompt detection of obviously abnormal conditions shall be established and shall be performed at least once each shift.

National Sentence Text: Coal and wood bins shall be located not less than 1.2 m from the appliance served.
P/T Sentence Text: Coal and wood bins shall be located not less than 1.2 m from the appliance served.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with Part 4..
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with part 4..

National Sentence Text: The storage site shall be level, and solid ground or paved with asphalt, concrete or other hard surface material.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage site shall be level, and solid ground or paved with asphalt, concrete or other hard surface material.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.3.2.(2) and Article 4.2.3.1., containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be distinctly marked or labelled in easily legible type that is in contrast to any other printed matter on the label with a warning to indicate that the material in the container is flammable, it should be kept away from heat, sparks and open flames, and it should be kept closed when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.3.2.(2) and Article 4.2.3.1., containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be distinctly marked or labelled in easily legible type that is in contrast to any other printed matter on the label with a warning to indicate that the material in the container is flammable, it should be kept away from heat, sparks and open flames, and it should be kept closed when not in use.
