National Sentence Text: Pumps installed aboveground and outside buildings shall be located not less than 3 m from any property line, and 1.5 m from any building opening.
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps installed aboveground and outside buildings shall be located not less than 3 m from any property line, and 1.5 m from any building opening.

National Sentence Text: Transfer operations shall be carried out only under the continuous supervision of a person qualified to supervise such operations.
P/T Sentence Text: Transfer operations shall be carried out only under the continuous supervision of a person qualified to supervise such operations.

National Sentence Text: Unless otherwise stated in this Subsection, the loading and unloading of tank vehicles shall be conducted in conformance with the applicable provisions in Subsection 4.7.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Unless otherwise stated in this Subsection, the loading and unloading of tank vehicles shall be conducted in conformance with the applicable provisions in part 4.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the information required in Section 2.8., the fire safety plan shall include the location and identification of storage and use areas for specific products, in conformance with Article 3.2.2.5., and the names, addresses and telephone numbers of persons to be contacted in case of fire during non-operating hours.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the information required in part 2., the fire safety plan shall include the location and identification of storage and use areas for specific products, in conformance with Article 3.2.2.5., and the names, addresses and telephone numbers of persons to be contacted in case of fire during non-operating hours.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.11.2.4.(2), a tank vehicle is permitted to be left unattended by the vehicle operator outside a building for not more than 1 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.11.2.4.(2), a tank vehicle is permitted to be left unattended by the vehicle operator outside a building for not more than 1 h.

National Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of more than one class of products, a placard for each individual class, or the "Danger" placard shown in TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) shall be posted at the entrance to the storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of more than one class of products, a placard for each individual class, or the "Danger" placard shown in TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) shall be posted at the entrance to the storage area.

National Sentence Text: Ventilation required in Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1) shall be sufficient to ensure that flammable vapour concentrations outside the zone identified as Class I, Zone 0 or 1 in conformance with Article 4.1.4.1., do not exceed 25% of the lower explosive limit of the flammable vapour. (See Note A-4.1.7.2.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Ventilation required in Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1) shall be sufficient to ensure that flammable vapour concentrations outside the zone identified as Class I, Zone 0 or 1 in conformance with Article 4.1.4.1., do not exceed 25% of the lower explosive limit of the flammable vapour. (See Note A-4.1.7.2.(3).)

National Sentence Text: A person shall be employed to watch for fires when a tent or air-supported structure is occupied by more than 1 000 persons.
P/T Sentence Text: A person shall be employed to watch for fires when a tent or air-supported structure is occupied by more than 1 000 persons.

National Sentence Text: All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: The maximum quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in a cabinet shall be 500 L.
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in a cabinet shall be 500 L.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure H is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors or into smoke shafts on each floor will open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentence (6) of Measure H, dampers in return air and exhaust ducts will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (5) of Measure H, return air and exhaust fans are stopped and supply fans will provide air to all floor areas and stairshafts as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure H, and closures in all openings in external walls and roofs will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure H.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure H is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors or into smoke shafts on each floor will open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentence (6) of Measure H, dampers in return air and exhaust ducts will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (5) of Measure H, return air and exhaust fans are stopped and supply fans will provide air to all floor areas and stairshafts as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure H, and closures in all openings in external walls and roofs will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure H.

National Sentence Text: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in portions of a building under construction or alteration that are not occupied, the following shall apply: a permanent or temporary standpipe system is permitted in accordance with Clauses 5.6.1.6.(2)(b)and 5.6.1.6.(2)(c), the standpipe system shall be provided with conspicuously marked and readily accessible fire department connections on the outside of the building at street level and shall have at least one hose outlet at each floor, the pipe size, hose valves and water supply shall conform to Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC, the standpipe system shall, as a minimum, be securely supported and restrained on alternate floors, at least one hose valve for attaching fire department hose shall be provided at each intermediate landing or floor level in the exit stairway, valves shall be kept closed at all times and guarded against mechanical damage, the standpipe shall be not more than one floor below the highest forms, staging, and similar combustible elements at all times, and temporary standpipe systems shall remain in service until the permanent standpipe installation is complete.

National Sentence Text: Emergency instructions, including the telephone number of the local fire department, shall be conspicuously posted to advise the user, in the event of a spill or accident, to use the emergency shut-off switch required in Article 4.6.4.2., and to call the fire department.
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency instructions, including the telephone number of the local fire department, shall be conspicuously posted to advise the user, in the event of a spill or accident, to use the emergency shut-off switch required in Article 4.6.4.2., and to call the fire department.

National Sentence Text: The risks of fire and explosion at process plants shall be evaluated based on material properties, material quantities, operating conditions, arrangement of stored materials, transportation of materials, process design, and operating and maintenance procedures.
P/T Sentence Text: The risks of fire and explosion at process plants shall be evaluated based on material properties, material quantities, operating conditions, arrangement of stored materials, transportation of materials, process design, and operating and maintenance procedures.

National Sentence Text: An internal combustion engine shall not be permitted to remain unattended in a building where ammonium nitrate is stored, unless the engine is located in an area that will prevent the spread of a fire originating in the engine.
P/T Sentence Text: An internal combustion engine shall not be permitted to remain unattended in a building where ammonium nitrate is stored, unless the engine is located in an area that will prevent the spread of a fire originating in the engine.

National Sentence Text: Except for the distance between a building and cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases, a clear space of not less than 6 m shall be provided around each individual storage area for dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.3.3.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except for the distance between a building and cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases, a clear space of not less than 6 m shall be provided around each individual storage area for dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.3.3.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Openings referred to in Sentence 4.3.15.2.(1) shall be protected against overflow and vapour pressure by means of a spring-loaded check valve.
P/T Sentence Text: Openings referred to in Sentence 4.3.15.2.(1) shall be protected against overflow and vapour pressure by means of a spring-loaded check valve.

National Sentence Text: Except at distilleries covered in Section 4.10., vent piping materials and construction shall conform to Subsections 4.5.2., 4.5.3. and 4.5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Except at distilleries covered in part 4., vent piping materials and construction shall conform to Subsections 4., 4. and 4.

National Sentence Text: Inventory reconciliation referred to in this Section shall for the time period designated, determine product loss or gain based on the reconciliation of change in physical inventory, inventory additions (deliveries), inventory removals (sales), and miscellaneous inventory alterations, and determine the level of water in the tank. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Inventory reconciliation referred to in this Section shall for the time period designated, determine product loss or gain based on the reconciliation of change in physical inventory, inventory additions (deliveries), inventory removals (sales), and miscellaneous inventory alterations, and determine the level of water in the tank.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.7.5.(2), the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in storage areas specified in Clause 4.2.7.2.(1)(d) shall conform to Table 4.2.7.5.-A where it consists of palletized or solid piled storage, or where stored in racks in buildings not protected in conformance with Article 4.2.7.6., or conform to Table 4.2.7.5.-B where stored in racks in buildings protected in conformance with Article 4.2.7.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.7.5.(2), the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in storage areas specified in Sentence 4.2.7.2.(1) shall conform to Table 4.2.7.5.-A where it consists of palletized or solid piled storage, or where stored in racks in buildings not protected in conformance with Article 4.2.7.6., or conform to Table 4.2.7.5.-B where stored in racks in buildings protected in conformance with Article 4.2.7.6.

National Sentence Text: Bitumen kettles shall not be located on roofs, be provided with adequate metal covers that are close-fitting and constructed of steel having a thickness of not less than No. 14 sheet metal gauge thickness, be under constant supervision when in operation, and be maintained free of excessive residue.
P/T Sentence Text: Bitumen kettles shall not be located on roofs, be provided with adequate metal covers that are close-fitting and constructed of steel having a thickness of not less than No. 14 sheet metal gauge thickness, be under constant supervision when in operation, and be maintained free of excessive residue.

National Sentence Text: A portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 5-B:C shall be located on the serving cart or table where flaming meals and drinks referred to in Sentences 2.4.3.2.(2)and 2.4.3.2.(3) are served.
P/T Sentence Text: A portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 5-B:C shall be located on the serving cart or table where flaming meals and drinks referred to in Sentences 2.4.3.2.(2)and 2.4.3.2.(3) are served.

National Sentence Text: Chimneys, flues and flue pipes shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them free from dangerous accumulations of combustible deposits. (See Note A-2.6.1.4.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Chimneys, flues and flue pipes shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them free from dangerous accumulations of combustible deposits. (See Note A-2.6.1.4.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Piping shall be supported and backfilled in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping shall be supported and backfilled in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.

National Sentence Text: Fire alarm systems shall be inspected and tested in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Fire alarm systems shall be inspected and tested in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems

National Sentence Text: Where a retracting mechanism is used, a maximum extended length of 6 m shall be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a retracting mechanism is used, a maximum extended length of 6 m shall be permitted.

National Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be designed to accommodate accidental spillage in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be designed to accommodate accidental spillage in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of the following products: Class I, II, III and IV commodities, and Group A, B and C plastics, as defined in NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(1)(a)), rubber tires and combustible fibres, packaged Level 1, 2 and 3 aerosols, as described in Subsection 3.2.5., dangerous goods in packages or containers, as covered in Subsection 3.2.7., or closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols. (See Note A-3.2.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of the following products: Class I, II, III and IV commodities, and Group A, B and C plastics, as defined in NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(1)(a)), rubber tires and combustible fibres, packaged Level 1, 2 and 3 aerosols, as described in part 3., dangerous goods in packages or containers, as covered in part 3., or closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 2.3.2.3.(3), mattresses and mattress sets shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S137-07 Fire Growth of Mattresses (Open Flame if used in a Group B occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 2.3.2.3.(3), mattresses and mattress sets shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S137-07 Fire Growth of Mattresses (Open Flame if used in a Group B occupancy.

National Sentence Text: For the purpose of this Section, unstable liquids shall meet the requirements for Class IA liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: For the purpose of this Section, unstable liquids shall meet the requirements for Class IA liquids.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.6.3.(3), all reasonable steps shall be taken to recover escaped liquid and to remove or treat contaminated soil.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.6.3.(3), all reasonable steps shall be taken to recover escaped liquid and to remove or treat contaminated soil.

National Sentence Text: Requirements of this Section that pertain to the location of dispensers, storage tanks, pumps, piping and their ancillary equipment inside buildings shall not apply to a canopy that is open on not less than 75% of its perimeter.
P/T Sentence Text: Requirements of this Section that pertain to the location of dispensers, storage tanks, pumps, piping and their ancillary equipment inside buildings shall not apply to a canopy that is open on not less than 75% of its perimeter.

National Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies with occupant loads exceeding 60 persons, the occupant load shall be posted in conspicuous locations near the principal entrances to the room or floor area.
P/T Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies with occupant loads exceeding 60 persons, the occupant load shall be posted in conspicuous locations near the principal entrances to the room or floor area.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 3.2.7.6.(3)and 3.2.7.6.(4), Clause 3.2.8.2.(1)(g) and Sentence 3.2.8.3.(2), dangerous goods shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Table 3.2.7.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 3.2.7.6.(3)and 3.2.7.6.(4), Sentence 3.2.8.2.(1) and Sentence 3.2.8.3.(2), dangerous goods shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Table 3.2.7.6.

National Sentence Text: Areas described in Article 4.1.1.1. shall be kept clean and free of ground vegetation and accumulations of combustible materials not essential to operations.
P/T Sentence Text: Areas described in Article 4.1.1.1. shall be kept clean and free of ground vegetation and accumulations of combustible materials not essential to operations.

National Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to dipping and coating processes shall conform to NFPA 34-2015 Dipping, Coating, and Printing Processes Using Flammable or Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to dipping and coating processes shall conform to NFPA 34-2015 Dipping, Coating, and Printing Processes Using Flammable or Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: A means shall be provided to allow firefighters to perform their duties on all levels of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: A means shall be provided to allow firefighters to perform their duties on all levels of the building.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the separation requirements in Sentence 3.2.7.6.(1), dangerous goods shall be stored in conformance with the information provided in the Safety Data Sheet for the specific dangerous good. (See Note A-3.2.7.6.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the separation requirements in Sentence 3.2.7.6.(1), dangerous goods shall be stored in conformance with the information provided in the Safety Data Sheet for the specific dangerous good. (See Note A-3.2.7.6.(3).)

National Sentence Text: At marine fuel-dispensing stations, a readily accessible valve shall be provided in each pipeline at or within 7.5 m of the pier to shut off the supply from shore.
P/T Sentence Text: At marine fuel-dispensing stations, a readily accessible valve shall be provided in each pipeline at or within 7.5 m of the pier to shut off the supply from shore.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.3.13.2., storage tanks inside buildings shall conform to Subsections 4.3.13.to 4.3.15., be permitted in industrial occupancies, and be permitted in all occupancies where combustible liquids are stored and used as fuel for oil-burning equipment, emergency generators and fire pumps.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.3.13.2., storage tanks inside buildings shall conform to Subsections 4.to 4., be permitted in industrial occupancies, and be permitted in all occupancies where combustible liquids are stored and used as fuel for oil-burning equipment, emergency generators and fire pumps.

National Sentence Text: The maximum permitted height of any individual storage area shall be determined to ensure the physical stability of the stored products under normal circumstances as well as under fire conditions, be determined according to its base area and shape, and the type of packaging, combustibility and chemical reactivity of the stored products, and not exceed the limits specified in Subsections 3.3.3. and 3.3.4.
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum permitted height of any individual storage area shall be determined to ensure the physical stability of the stored products under normal circumstances as well as under fire conditions, be determined according to its base area and shape, and the type of packaging, combustibility and chemical reactivity of the stored products, and not exceed the limits specified in Subsections 3. and 3.

National Sentence Text: Except within a dwelling unit, the dispensing and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be permitted within self-service storage buildings.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except within a dwelling unit, the dispensing and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be permitted within self-service storage buildings.

P/T Sentence Text: All buildings served by one or more elevators shall have, at each elevator entrance on each floor level, a permanently mounted fire safety sign or symbol indicating that the elevator is not to be used in case of fire.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): All buildings served by one or more elevators shall have, at each elevator entrance on each floor level, a permanently mounted fire safety sign or symbol indicating that the elevator is not to be used in case of fire.

National Sentence Text: Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Where problems of corrosion, contamination, or sanitation or standards of purity require special materials, it is permitted to use non-metallic materials for piping, valves and fittings in conformance with Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b).
P/T Sentence Text: Where problems of corrosion, contamination, or sanitation or standards of purity require special materials, it is permitted to use non-metallic materials for piping, valves and fittings in conformance with Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: If a fill piping system has an offset component from the fill point on the storage tank, all fill pipes shall be double-walled, sloped to the storage tank, and electronically monitored for leak detection in conformance with Section 4.4. (See Note A-4.3.12.3.(6).)
P/T Sentence Text: If a fill piping system has an offset component from the fill point on the storage tank, all fill pipes shall be double-walled, sloped to the storage tank, and electronically monitored for leak detection in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: The minimum requirements referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall not preclude the appropriate use of alternative solutions, innovative new technologies, or methods capable of achieving the same objectives. (See Note A-4.4.1.2.(7).)
P/T Sentence Text: The minimum requirements referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall not preclude the appropriate use of alternative solutions, innovative new technologies, or methods capable of achieving the same objectives. (See Note A-4.4.1.2.(7).)

National Sentence Text: Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Atmospheric storage tanks shall not be used for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids at temperatures at or above their boiling points.
P/T Sentence Text: Atmospheric storage tanks shall not be used for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids at temperatures at or above their boiling points.

National Sentence Text: Where acceptable solutions are referred to in Division B, they shall be the provisions stated in Parts 2 to 7.
P/T Sentence Text: Where acceptable solutions are referred to in Division B, they shall be the provisions stated in Parts 2 to 7.

National Sentence Text: A visual inspection shall be made at least once during each day of operation of all aboveground piping systems, pumps and other ancillary equipment, to detect leakage, and any leakage shall be repaired as quickly as practicable.
P/T Sentence Text: A visual inspection shall be made at least once during each day of operation of all aboveground piping systems, pumps and other ancillary equipment, to detect leakage, and any leakage shall be repaired as quickly as practicable.

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall identify the product classifications, as described in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1), for each part of the building where products of different classification are stored, the method of storage, including aisle widths for rack storage, the maximum permitted height of storage for the building or part of the building, if different, the maximum permitted size of individual storage areas, and in sprinkleredbuildings, the sprinkler system design criteria, inside and outside hose allowances, and results of the benchmark sprinkler system main drain and water flow tests.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall identify the product classifications, as described in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1), for each part of the building where products of different classification are stored, the method of storage, including aisle widths for rack storage, the maximum permitted height of storage for the building or part of the building, if different, the maximum permitted size of individual storage areas, and in sprinkleredbuildings, the sprinkler system design criteria, inside and outside hose allowances, and results of the benchmark sprinkler system main drain and water flow tests.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Article 4.2.3.3., containers and portable tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be built in conformance with the following: TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) CSA B376-M1980 Portable Containers for Gasoline and Other Petroleum Fuels CSA B306-M1977 Portable Fuel Tanks for Marine Use ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers or CSA B620-14 Highway Tanks and TC Portable Tanks for the Transportation of Dangerous Goods
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Article 4.2.3.3., containers and portable tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be built in conformance with the following: TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) CSA B376-M1980 Portable Containers for Gasoline and Other Petroleum Fuels CSA B306-M1977 Portable Fuel Tanks for Marine Use ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers or CSA B620-14 Highway Tanks and TC Portable Tanks for the Transportation of Dangerous Goods

National Sentence Text: Words and phrases used in Division B that are not included in the list of definitions in Article 1.4.1.2. shall have the meanings that are commonly assigned to them in the context in which they are used, taking into account the specialized use of terms by the various trades and professions to which the terminology applies.
P/T Sentence Text: Words and phrases used in Division B that are not included in the list of definitions in Article 1.4.1.2. shall have the meanings that are commonly assigned to them in the context in which they are used, taking into account the specialized use of terms by the various trades and professions to which the terminology applies.

National Sentence Text: Railway tracks on piers and wharves shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with TC SOR/82-1015 Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations
P/T Sentence Text: Railway tracks on piers and wharves shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with TC SOR/82-1015 Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations

National Sentence Text: A storage room or area that is greater than 100 m2 shall be provided with at least one main aisle conforming to Sentences 3.2.2.2.(5)to 3.2.2.2.(8).
P/T Sentence Text: A storage room or area that is greater than 100 m2 shall be provided with at least one main aisle conforming to Sentences 3.2.2.2.(5)to 3.2.2.2.(8).

National Sentence Text: In Group A, Division 1 assembly occupancies containing more than 60 occupants, there shall be at least one supervisory staff member on duty in the building to perform the tasks outlined in the fire safety plan in Clause 2.8.2.1.(1)(a) whenever the building is open to the public.
P/T Sentence Text: In Group A, Division 1 assembly occupancies containing more than 60 occupants, there shall be at least one supervisory staff member on duty in the building to perform the tasks outlined in the fire safety plan in Sentence 2.8.2.1.(1) whenever the building is open to the public.

National Sentence Text: The storage cabinets referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall not be located above or below the first storey.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage cabinets referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall not be located above or below the first storey.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks located on shore and supplying marine fuel-dispensing stations are permitted to be located aboveground where rock or a high water table make underground tanks impracticable.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks located on shore and supplying marine fuel-dispensing stations are permitted to be located aboveground where rock or a high water table make underground tanks impracticable.

National Sentence Text: Buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols shall be classified as medium-hazard industrial occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings or parts of buildings used for the storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols shall be classified as medium-hazard industrial occupancies.

National Sentence Text: The individual storage areas for loose combustible fibres described in Sentence 3.2.6.3.(4) shall not exceed 250 m2.
P/T Sentence Text: The individual storage areas for loose combustible fibres described in Sentence 3.2.6.3.(4) shall not exceed 250 m2.

National Sentence Text: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground piping system shall be in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground piping system shall be in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The methods referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall conform to Subsections 4.4.2.to 4.4.4.
P/T Sentence Text: The methods referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall conform to Subsections 4.to 4.

National Sentence Text: Immediate action shall be taken when a leak is suspected and the leak detection testing referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be performed if a loss of liquid or a gain of water is indicated by any of the leak detection measures described in this Section, or the level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank exceeds 50 mm.
P/T Sentence Text: Immediate action shall be taken when a leak is suspected and the leak detection testing referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be performed if a loss of liquid or a gain of water is indicated by any of the leak detection measures described in this Section, or the level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank exceeds 50 mm.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored with other dangerous goods unless in conformance with Article 4.2.2.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored with other dangerous goods unless in conformance with Article 4.2.2.3.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be stored in or adjacent to exits, elevators or principal routes that provide access to exits.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be stored in or adjacent to exits, elevators or principal routes that provide access to exits.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Where aboveground piping crosses roadways or railway sidings, ample overhead clearance and warning signs indicating the clearance height shall be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Where aboveground piping crosses roadways or railway sidings, ample overhead clearance and warning signs indicating the clearance height shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 5.6.1.3.(2), prior to the commencement of construction, alteration or demolition operations, a fire safety plan shall be prepared for the site and shall include the designation and organization of site personnel to carry out fire safety duties, including a fire watch service if applicable, the emergency procedures to be followed in the event of a fire, including initiating a fire warning, notifying the fire department, instructing site personnel on the procedures to be followed once the warning has been initiated, and confining, controlling and extinguishing the fire, measures for controlling fire hazards in and around the building (see Note A-5.6.1.3.(1)(c)), and a maintenance procedure for firefighting measures required in Section 5.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 5.6.1.3.(2), prior to the commencement of construction, alteration or demolition operations, a fire safety plan shall be prepared for the site and shall include the designation and organization of site personnel to carry out fire safety duties, including a fire watch service if applicable, the emergency procedures to be followed in the event of a fire, including initiating a fire warning, notifying the fire department, instructing site personnel on the procedures to be followed once the warning has been initiated, and confining, controlling and extinguishing the fire, measures for controlling fire hazards in and around the building (see Note A-5.6.1.3.(1)(c)), and a maintenance procedure for firefighting measures required in part 5.

National Sentence Text: All employees involved in the storage and handling of dangerous goods shall be trained in safe handling procedures and correct responses to an emergency situation.
P/T Sentence Text: All employees involved in the storage and handling of dangerous goods shall be trained in safe handling procedures and correct responses to an emergency situation.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure F is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures to vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces, elevator shafts and below gradefloor areas that are required by Sentences (6) and (10) of Measure F open automatically and remain open, and dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (12) of Measure F, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to stairshafts and elevator shafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2), (3) and (4) of Measure F, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces or elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (12) of Measure F shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when the mechanical air supply to the stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) of Measure F.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure F is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures to vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces, elevator shafts and below gradefloor areas that are required by Sentences (6) and (10) of Measure F open automatically and remain open, and dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (12) of Measure F, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to stairshafts and elevator shafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2), (3) and (4) of Measure F, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces or elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (12) of Measure F shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when the mechanical air supply to the stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) of Measure F.

National Sentence Text: Emergency lighting and exit signs shall be maintained in operating condition, in conformance with Section 6.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency lighting and exit signs shall be maintained in operating condition, in conformance with part 6.

National Sentence Text: Where a sign, notice, placard or information is required to be posted, it shall be clearly legible, and except as provided in Sentence 2.1.4.1.(2), permanently mounted in a conspicuous or prominent location in proximity to the situation to which it refers.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a sign, notice, placard or information is required to be posted, it shall be clearly legible, and except as provided in Sentence 2.1.4.1.(2), permanently mounted in a conspicuous or prominent location in proximity to the situation to which it refers.

National Sentence Text: A storage tank and its filling and emptying connections shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification
P/T Sentence Text: A storage tank and its filling and emptying connections shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification

National Sentence Text: Bronze flanges for 50 mm diameter or smaller size piping referred to in Article 4.5.5.2. are permitted to be used where copper and brass piping is permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Bronze flanges for 50 mm diameter or smaller size piping referred to in Article 4.5.5.2. are permitted to be used where copper and brass piping is permitted.

National Sentence Text: Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Systems permitted in Sentence 4.5.8.4.(1) shall be installed and tested as complete units and shall conform to the following: unheated sections of piping shall be isolated from heated sections by means of nonconductive fittings, thermostatic controls, high temperature limit controls and fuses shall have the lowest practical rating to ensure satisfactory operation, all parts of the piping and fittings shall be enclosed by insulating coverings of a type that will prevent accidental grounding of the systems, and switches, transformers, contactors and other spark-producing equipment shall be located in an area not subject to flammable vapours.
P/T Sentence Text: Systems permitted in Sentence 4.5.8.4.(1) shall be installed and tested as complete units and shall conform to the following: unheated sections of piping shall be isolated from heated sections by means of nonconductive fittings, thermostatic controls, high temperature limit controls and fuses shall have the lowest practical rating to ensure satisfactory operation, all parts of the piping and fittings shall be enclosed by insulating coverings of a type that will prevent accidental grounding of the systems, and switches, transformers, contactors and other spark-producing equipment shall be located in an area not subject to flammable vapours.

National Sentence Text: Dry cleaning plants shall conform to NFPA 32-2016 Drycleaning Plants
P/T Sentence Text: Dry cleaning plants shall conform to NFPA 32-2016 Drycleaning Plants

National Sentence Text: Where storage of packaged aerosol products is mixed, protection shall be provided for the most hazardous classification present.
P/T Sentence Text: Where storage of packaged aerosol products is mixed, protection shall be provided for the most hazardous classification present.

National Sentence Text: Adequate access for firefighting purposes shall be provided and maintained to all portions of the storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: Adequate access for firefighting purposes shall be provided and maintained to all portions of the storage area.

National Sentence Text: When doors are equipped with electromagnetic locks, these locks shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.
P/T Sentence Text: When doors are equipped with electromagnetic locks, these locks shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.

National Sentence Text: Where overheating of unattended equipment using heat can cause a fire or an explosion, such equipment shall be equipped with a high temperature limit switch fitted to sound an alarm, and shut off the heat.
P/T Sentence Text: Where overheating of unattended equipment using heat can cause a fire or an explosion, such equipment shall be equipped with a high temperature limit switch fitted to sound an alarm, and shut off the heat.

National Sentence Text: An ignition source that is an integral part of an operation involving flammable vapours shall be permitted provided the supply of flammable liquids or combustible liquids for this operation is controlled and kept to a strict minimum, flammable vapours and combustion fumes are exhausted in conformance with Article 5.5.4.2., there is no other source of ignition capable of igniting the flammable vapours in an uncontrolled manner, and there is no combustible material in the immediate vicinity of this operation.
P/T Sentence Text: An ignition source that is an integral part of an operation involving flammable vapours shall be permitted provided the supply of flammable liquids or combustible liquids for this operation is controlled and kept to a strict minimum, flammable vapours and combustion fumes are exhausted in conformance with Article 5.5.4.2., there is no other source of ignition capable of igniting the flammable vapours in an uncontrolled manner, and there is no combustible material in the immediate vicinity of this operation.

National Sentence Text: Outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations shall be provided with physical protection against collision damage, measures to prevent unauthorized access to the storage tank and its ancillary equipment, measures to contain accidental spillage in conformance with Subsection 4.3.7., an overfill protection device in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.8.(2), where a tight-filled connection is provided, and where the piping is connected to the storage tank at a point that is lower than the maximum fill level, an external valve to prevent gravity discharge in the event the piping is severed.
P/T Sentence Text: Outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations shall be provided with physical protection against collision damage, measures to prevent unauthorized access to the storage tank and its ancillary equipment, measures to contain accidental spillage in conformance with part 4., an overfill protection device in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.8.(2), where a tight-filled connection is provided, and where the piping is connected to the storage tank at a point that is lower than the maximum fill level, an external valve to prevent gravity discharge in the event the piping is severed.

National Sentence Text: Hot work equipment shall be maintained in good operating condition.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot work equipment shall be maintained in good operating condition.

National Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Electrical equipment vaults shall be kept locked so that unauthorized persons will not have access to them.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Electrical equipment vaults shall be kept locked so that unauthorized persons will not have access to them.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical equipment vaults and electrical service rooms shall be kept locked so that unauthorized persons will not have access to them.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Electrical equipment vaults and electrical service rooms shall be kept locked so that unauthorized persons will not have access to them.

National Sentence Text: Staff members of daycare centres in which more than 10 children are cared for shall conduct fire prevention inspections in conformance with the fire safety plan at intervals not greater than one month.
P/T Sentence Text: Staff members of daycare centres in which more than 10 children are cared for shall conduct fire prevention inspections in conformance with the fire safety plan at intervals not greater than one month.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.11.4.(2), where vent piping connects 2 or more storage tanks, pipe sizes shall be designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected underground storage tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks when being filled simultaneously.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.3.11.4.(2), where vent piping connects 2 or more storage tanks, pipe sizes shall be designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected underground storage tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks when being filled simultaneously.

National Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are present, electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Notes A-4.1.4.1.(1)and A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: In industrial occupancies, quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids greater than those specified in Sentence 4.2.10.3.(1) are permitted in a single fire compartment if the total quantity stored in a group of cabinets is not more than the quantity permitted for 3 cabinets, and the distance between groups of cabinets described in Clause 4.2.10.3.(2)(a) is not less than 30 m.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure J is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in openings in the walls and roofs of the central core and in shafts within the core will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure J, and return-air fans are stopped and supply fans will provide air to the central core as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure J.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be classified, stored and handled in conformance with Part 4..
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be classified, stored and handled in conformance with part 4..

National Sentence Text: Underground steel storage tanks and integral fittings subject to corrosion shall be protected in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or protected by impressed current in conformance with NACE SP0285-2011 External Corrosion Control of Underground Storage Tank Systems by Cathodic Protection
P/T Sentence Text: Underground steel storage tanks and integral fittings subject to corrosion shall be protected in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or protected by impressed current in conformance with NACE SP0285-2011 External Corrosion Control of Underground Storage Tank Systems by Cathodic Protection

National Sentence Text: Connections for all openings in underground storage tanks shall be liquid- and vapour-tight.
P/T Sentence Text: Connections for all openings in underground storage tanks shall be liquid- and vapour-tight.

National Sentence Text: The level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than 7 days, except that at fuel-dispensing stations the measurements shall be taken each day the station is in operation.
P/T Sentence Text: The level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than 7 days, except that at fuel-dispensing stations the measurements shall be taken each day the station is in operation.

National Sentence Text: The occupancy classification of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(1) of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: The symbols and other abbreviations in Division B shall have the meanings assigned to them in Article 1.4.2.1. and Article 1.3.2.1.
P/T Sentence Text: The symbols and other abbreviations in Division B shall have the meanings assigned to them in Article 1.4.2.1. and Article 1.3.2.1.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.4.3.(2), the ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. shall conform to Article 6.3.4.3. of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: When an emergency power system or any part thereof is shut down, the supervisory staff shall be notified in conformance with Section 2.8.
P/T Sentence Text: When an emergency power system or any part thereof is shut down, the supervisory staff shall be notified in conformance with part 2.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 5.6.2.2., before excavation begins, building services shall be shut off, terminated and labelled so as to be easily identifiable outside the limits of the excavation. (See also Sentence 5.6.1.9.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Vacant buildings shall be secured against unauthorized entry. (See Note A-2.4.6.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Vacant buildings shall be secured against unauthorized entry. (See Note A-2.4.6.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: When quantities greater than those permitted for incidental use in Subsection 4.2.8. are required for special process operations, storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are permitted to be located outside of a storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), provided that total quantities per fire compartment are not more than one-half the quantities permitted in Table 4.3.13.4.-A, they are located on the first storey, and the installation conforms to Articles 4.3.13.9.to 4.3.13.12. and Article 4.3.14.4.
P/T Sentence Text: When quantities greater than those permitted for incidental use in part 4. are required for special process operations, storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are permitted to be located outside of a storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), provided that total quantities per fire compartment are not more than one-half the quantities permitted in Table 4.3.13.4.-A, they are located on the first storey, and the installation conforms to Articles 4.3.13.9.to 4.3.13.12. and Article 4.3.14.4.

National Sentence Text: Fencing, boarding and barricades shall be constructed and maintained in a manner that does not restrict access to the construction or demolition site for firefighting purposes or to fire protection equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Fencing, boarding and barricades shall be constructed and maintained in a manner that does not restrict access to the construction or demolition site for firefighting purposes or to fire protection equipment.

National Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be surrounded by a firmly anchored fence that is substantially constructed to discourage climbing and unauthorized entry, not less than 1.8 m high, and provided with gates that shall be locked when the storage area is not staffed.
P/T Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be surrounded by a firmly anchored fence that is substantially constructed to discourage climbing and unauthorized entry, not less than 1.8 m high, and provided with gates that shall be locked when the storage area is not staffed.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids shall be Class I liquids, and shall be subdivided into: Class IA liquids, which shall include those having a flash point below 22.8°C and a boiling point below 37.8°C, Class IB liquids, which shall include those having a flash point below 22.8°C and a boiling point at or above 37.8°C, and Class IC liquids, which shall include those having a flash point at or above 22.8°C and below 37.8°C.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids shall be Class I liquids, and shall be subdivided into: Class IA liquids, which shall include those having a flash point below 22.8°C and a boiling point below 37.8°C, Class IB liquids, which shall include those having a flash point below 22.8°C and a boiling point at or above 37.8°C, and Class IC liquids, which shall include those having a flash point at or above 22.8°C and below 37.8°C.

National Sentence Text: Fixed dispensers for Class II or IIIA liquids are permitted to be installed inside a building when the building is not open to the public, the dispensers are located on the first storey, drainage is provided, and ventilation is provided in conformance with Subsection 4.1.7. and with the requirements for storage garages in Subsection 6.3.1. of Division B of the NBC.

P/T Sentence Text: Fixed dispensers for Class II or IIIA liquids are permitted to be installed inside a building when the building is not open to the public, the dispensers are located on the first storey, drainage is provided, and ventilation is provided in conformance with part 4. and with the requirements for storage garages in Subsection 6.3.1. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Fixed dispensers for Class II or IIIA liquids are permitted to be installed inside a building when the building is not open to the public, the dispensers are located on the first storey, drainage is provided, and ventilation is provided in conformance with part 4. and with the requirements for storage garages in Subsection 6.3.1. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Hot work shall not be performed on metal objects that are in contact with combustible materials unless safety precautions are taken to prevent their ignition by conduction.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot work shall not be performed on metal objects that are in contact with combustible materials unless safety precautions are taken to prevent their ignition by conduction.

National Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C558-14 Guide for the Investigation of Internal Combustion Engine-Powered Industrial Trucks
P/T Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C558-14 Guide for the Investigation of Internal Combustion Engine-Powered Industrial Trucks

National Sentence Text: Piping systems shall be tested for leakage in conformance with Section 4.4. before being put into service and before reactivation when used on a seasonal basis.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping systems shall be tested for leakage in conformance with part 4. before being put into service and before reactivation when used on a seasonal basis.

National Sentence Text: Bonding required in Sentence 4.7.4.5.(1) shall consist of a metallic bond wire connected to the fill stem or to some part of the loading or unloading structure that is in electrical contact with the fill stem in conformance with Subsection 4.1.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Bonding required in Sentence 4.7.4.5.(1) shall consist of a metallic bond wire connected to the fill stem or to some part of the loading or unloading structure that is in electrical contact with the fill stem in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: The use of cam-locking connections up to 100 mm in size shall be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: The use of cam-locking connections up to 100 mm in size shall be permitted.

National Sentence Text: Joints in piping systems shall comply with Subsection 4.5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Joints in piping systems shall comply with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Signs required in Sentences 2.7.1.4.(1)and 2.7.1.4.(2) shall have lettering not less than 50 mm high with a 12 mm stroke.
P/T Sentence Text: Signs required in Sentences 2.7.1.4.(1)and 2.7.1.4.(2) shall have lettering not less than 50 mm high with a 12 mm stroke.

National Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted on helicopter landing areas on roofs, and signs conforming to Article 2.4.2.2. shall be placed at the exits from the rooftop and in the vicinity of the landing area.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted on helicopter landing areas on roofs, and signs conforming to Article 2.4.2.2. shall be placed at the exits from the rooftop and in the vicinity of the landing area.

National Sentence Text: Dispenser sumps shall conform to the construction and performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C107.21-1992 Under-Dispenser Sumps
P/T Sentence Text: Dispenser sumps shall conform to the construction and performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C107.21-1992 Under-Dispenser Sumps

National Sentence Text: The extinguishers required by Sentence 5.6.1.5.(1) shall have a minimum rating of 3-A:20-B:C on moveable equipment (see Note A-5.6.1.5.(2)(a)), and 4-A:40-B:C in all other locations. (See Note A-5.6.1.6.)
P/T Sentence Text: The extinguishers required by Sentence 5.6.1.5.(1) shall have a minimum rating of 3-A:20-B:C on moveable equipment (see Note A-5.6.1.5.(2)(a)), and 4-A:40-B:C in all other locations.

National Sentence Text: At a loading or unloading facility for tank vehicles or tank cars, the horizontal distance from the fill stem to an aboveground storage tank, a building or a property line shall be not less than 7.5 m for Class I liquids, and 4.5 m for Class II and IIIA liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: At a loading or unloading facility for tank vehicles or tank cars, the horizontal distance from the fill stem to an aboveground storage tank, a building or a property line shall be not less than 7.5 m for Class I liquids, and 4.5 m for Class II and IIIA liquids.

National Sentence Text: When 2 or more classes of liquids are stored in a single storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), the total quantity permitted for each class of liquid shall be calculated as follows: qIQI+q II+IIIAQII +IIIA 1
P/T Sentence Text: When 2 or more classes of liquids are stored in a single storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.13.4.(1), the total quantity permitted for each class of liquid shall be calculated as follows: qIQI+q II+IIIAQII +IIIA 1

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.4.3.2.(1), pneumatic leak detection tests using compressed air or an inert gas shall include the application of soap and water to the storage tank and piping surface, fittings, joints and connections to help in the detection of leaks.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.4.3.2.(1), pneumatic leak detection tests using compressed air or an inert gas shall include the application of soap and water to the storage tank and piping surface, fittings, joints and connections to help in the detection of leaks.

National Sentence Text: Valves and controls for a special fire suppression system shall be clearly marked to indicate their function and shall be accessible at all times. (See Note A-2.1.3.6.)
P/T Sentence Text: Valves and controls for a special fire suppression system shall be clearly marked to indicate their function and shall be accessible at all times.

National Sentence Text: The laboratory shall be clearly designated as an area containing dangerous goods in conformance with Article 3.2.7.14.
P/T Sentence Text: The laboratory shall be clearly designated as an area containing dangerous goods in conformance with Article 3.2.7.14.

National Sentence Text: Fire protection installations shall be maintained in operating condition. (See Note A-6.1.1.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Fire protection installations shall be maintained in operating condition. (See Note A-6.1.1.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: A special fire suppression system that meets the description given in any one of the standards referenced in Article 2.1.3.5. shall be tested, inspected and maintained in conformance with the appropriate requirements of that standard.
P/T Sentence Text: A special fire suppression system that meets the description given in any one of the standards referenced in Article 2.1.3.5. shall be tested, inspected and maintained in conformance with the appropriate requirements of that standard.

National Sentence Text: A portable extinguisher shall be provided within 7.5 m of any machine producing wood dust, particles or shavings.
P/T Sentence Text: A portable extinguisher shall be provided within 7.5 m of any machine producing wood dust, particles or shavings.

National Sentence Text: The electrical system in a tent or air-supported structure shall be maintained and operated in a safe manner.
P/T Sentence Text: The electrical system in a tent or air-supported structure shall be maintained and operated in a safe manner.

National Sentence Text: Areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be kept free of waste packaging materials, debris of any kind, or any spilled product.
P/T Sentence Text: Areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be kept free of waste packaging materials, debris of any kind, or any spilled product.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.12.(2), the dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tank of a vehicle shall conform to Section 4.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.12.(2), the dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tank of a vehicle shall conform to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Where shore locations would result in excessively long supply lines to the dispenser, storage tanks are permitted to be installed on a pier provided that the applicable portions of Subsection 4.3.7. relating to spacing, secondary containment and piping are complied with, and the quantity stored does not exceed 5 000 L aggregate capacity.
P/T Sentence Text: Where shore locations would result in excessively long supply lines to the dispenser, storage tanks are permitted to be installed on a pier provided that the applicable portions of part 4. relating to spacing, secondary containment and piping are complied with, and the quantity stored does not exceed 5 000 L aggregate capacity.

National Sentence Text: Leaks or defects found in hot work equipment shall be repaired prior to use.
P/T Sentence Text: Leaks or defects found in hot work equipment shall be repaired prior to use.

National Sentence Text: Either a 150 mm reinforced concrete slab or a 200 mm unreinforced concrete slab over not less than 450 mm of sand is permitted in lieu of the protection described in Sentence 4.3.8.3.(2) provided the slab extends at least 300 mm beyond the storage tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Either a 150 mm reinforced concrete slab or a 200 mm unreinforced concrete slab over not less than 450 mm of sand is permitted in lieu of the protection described in Sentence 4.3.8.3.(2) provided the slab extends at least 300 mm beyond the storage tank.

National Sentence Text: The commissioning testing referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be performed at the time of installation once backfill and surfacing have been completed but before being put into service, in the case of an underground storage tank or underground piping system, before being put into service, in the case of an aboveground storage tank or exposed piping system, and once the final surface materials have been installed but before being put into service, in the case of a sump.
P/T Sentence Text: The commissioning testing referred to in Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1) shall be performed at the time of installation once backfill and surfacing have been completed but before being put into service, in the case of an underground storage tank or underground piping system, before being put into service, in the case of an aboveground storage tank or exposed piping system, and once the final surface materials have been installed but before being put into service, in the case of a sump.

National Sentence Text: Equipment used in a building and the ventilation of the building shall be designed so as to limit flammable vapour-air mixtures under normal operating conditions to the interior of equipment, and to not more than 1.5 m from such equipment. (See Note A-4.9.3.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Equipment used in a building and the ventilation of the building shall be designed so as to limit flammable vapour-air mixtures under normal operating conditions to the interior of equipment, and to not more than 1.5 m from such equipment. (See Note A-4.9.3.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials or building surfaces that cannot be removed or protected against ignition as required in Clause 5.2.3.2.(1)(b) shall be thoroughly wetted where hot work is carried out.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials or building surfaces that cannot be removed or protected against ignition as required in Sentence 5.2.3.2.(1) shall be thoroughly wetted where hot work is carried out.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as radioactive materials shall be stored in conformance with CNSC SOR/2000-209 Nuclear Safety and Control Act (S.C. 1997, c.9)
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as radioactive materials shall be stored in conformance with CNSC SOR/2000-209 Nuclear Safety and Control Act (S.C. 1997, c.9)

National Sentence Text: Where individual containers with a capacity of more than 5 L are required for storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a building, safety containers of not more than 25 L capacity conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers shall be used.
P/T Sentence Text: Where individual containers with a capacity of more than 5 L are required for storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a building, safety containers of not more than 25 L capacity conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers shall be used.

National Sentence Text: Where vehicular, watercraft or floatplane impact or physical damage is possible, protective guarding devices shall be provided for aboveground outdoor piping.
P/T Sentence Text: Where vehicular, watercraft or floatplane impact or physical damage is possible, protective guarding devices shall be provided for aboveground outdoor piping.

National Sentence Text: Where smoking is permitted, an adequate number of ash trays shall be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Where smoking is permitted, an adequate number of ash trays shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall not be stored in areas where the ambient temperature may cause them to become unstable or susceptible to undesirable reactions.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall not be stored in areas where the ambient temperature may cause them to become unstable or susceptible to undesirable reactions.

National Sentence Text: Test pressures shall be the greater of 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, and not exceed the piping manufacturer's test specifications.
P/T Sentence Text: Test pressures shall be the greater of 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, and not exceed the piping manufacturer's test specifications.

National Sentence Text: Combustible contents in interconnected floor spaces in which the ceiling is more than 8 m above the floor, shall not exceed the limit specified in Subsection 3.2.8. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible contents in interconnected floor spaces in which the ceiling is more than 8 m above the floor, shall not exceed the limit specified in Subsection 3.2.8. of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the vestibules to adjacent floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the vestibules to adjacent floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: The ventilation system described in Sentence 5.5.4.3.(1) shall not be interlocked with a fire detection, fire alarm or make-up air system.
P/T Sentence Text: The ventilation system described in Sentence 5.5.4.3.(1) shall not be interlocked with a fire detection, fire alarm or make-up air system.

National Sentence Text: When a compartment of a tank vehicle has been used to carry a Class I liquid, the compartment, piping and accessory delivery equipment shall be drained of liquid before a Class II or IIIA liquid is loaded.
P/T Sentence Text: When a compartment of a tank vehicle has been used to carry a Class I liquid, the compartment, piping and accessory delivery equipment shall be drained of liquid before a Class II or IIIA liquid is loaded.

National Sentence Text: The handling and discharge of fireworks shall conform to NRCan 2010 Display Fireworks Manual
P/T Sentence Text: The handling and discharge of fireworks shall conform to NRCan 2010 Display Fireworks Manual

National Sentence Text: Every chimney, flue and flue pipe shall be inspected to identify any dangerous condition at intervals not greater than 12 months, at the time of addition of any appliance, and after any chimney fire. (See Note A-2.6.1.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Every chimney, flue and flue pipe shall be inspected to identify any dangerous condition at intervals not greater than 12 months, at the time of addition of any appliance, and after any chimney fire.

National Sentence Text: Where inventory reconciliation is required by this Section, the liquid level in any storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than 7 days in conformance with Sentences 4.4.4.1.(2) to 4.4.4.1.(4), except that at fuel-dispensing stations the measurements shall be taken each day the station is in operation.
P/T Sentence Text: Where inventory reconciliation is required by this Section, the liquid level in any storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than 7 days in conformance with Sentences 4.4.4.1.(2) to 4.4.4.1.(4), except that at fuel-dispensing stations the measurements shall be taken each day the station is in operation.

National Sentence Text: Where it is not practicable to locate bulk transfer stations on separate piers and wharves, such stations are permitted to be located on general purpose piers and wharves provided that guards or fences are installed around valves or pumping equipment to prevent entry of unauthorized personnel.
P/T Sentence Text: Where it is not practicable to locate bulk transfer stations on separate piers and wharves, such stations are permitted to be located on general purpose piers and wharves provided that guards or fences are installed around valves or pumping equipment to prevent entry of unauthorized personnel.

National Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) shall indicate that smoking is not permitted in the vicinity of the dispenser and that the ignition must be turned off while the vehicle is being refuelled. (See Note A-4.6.8.8.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) shall indicate that smoking is not permitted in the vicinity of the dispenser and that the ignition must be turned off while the vehicle is being refuelled. (See Note A-4.6.8.8.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Based on the evaluation required in Sentence 4.9.4.3.(1), measures to minimize the occurrence of fires and explosions and to mitigate their effects shall be identified.
P/T Sentence Text: Based on the evaluation required in Sentence 4.9.4.3.(1), measures to minimize the occurrence of fires and explosions and to mitigate their effects shall be identified.

National Sentence Text: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separations delimiting each fire compartment shall be determined in accordance with the applicable requirements of the Code. (See Note A-3.2.7.6.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separations delimiting each fire compartment shall be determined in accordance with the applicable requirements of the Code. (See Note A-3.2.7.6.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Drapes, curtains and other decorative materials including textiles and films used in buildings shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S109-14 Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films when such drapes, curtains and other decorative materials are used in any assembly occupancy or Group B, Division 1 detention occupancy, any lobby or exit, or any open floor areas exceeding 500 m2 in any business and personal services, mercantile or industrial occupancy, except where the floor area is divided into fire compartments not exceeding 500 m2 in area and separated from the remainder of the floor area by fire separations having at least a 1 hfire-resistance rating.
P/T Sentence Text: Drapes, curtains and other decorative materials including textiles and films used in buildings shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S109-14 Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films when such drapes, curtains and other decorative materials are used in any assembly occupancy or Group B, Division 1 detention occupancy, any lobby or exit, or any open floor areas exceeding 500 m2 in any business and personal services, mercantile or industrial occupancy, except where the floor area is divided into fire compartments not exceeding 500 m2 in area and separated from the remainder of the floor area by fire separations having at least a 1 hfire-resistance rating.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.5.3.(7), where cylinders of dangerous goods classified as toxic gases are used in a laboratory, they shall be located in a continuously mechanically ventilated gas storage cabinet, all exhaust shall be directed to a treatment system designed to process the accidental release of gas (see Note A-5.5.5.3.(5)(b) and (7)(b)), and the gas levels in the air shall be monitored by a gas detection system designed to emit an audible and visual signal within the laboratory and at a central station when gas levels exceed the exposure limit values established by provincial or territorial regulations or municipal by-laws or, in the absence of such regulations or bylaws, when they exceed the exposure limit values stated in the Safety Data Sheet.
