P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.5.3.(7), where cylinders of dangerous goods classified as toxic gases are used in a laboratory, they shall be located in a continuously mechanically ventilated gas storage cabinet, all exhaust shall be directed to a treatment system designed to process the accidental release of gas (see Note A-5.5.5.3.(5)(b)), and the gas levels in the air shall be monitored by a gas detection system designed to emit an audible and visual signal within the laboratory and at a central station when gas levels exceed the exposure limit values established by provincial regulations or, in the absence of such regulations or bylaws, when they exceed the exposure limit values stated in the Safety Data Sheet.

National Sentence Text: The exposed areas described in Sentences 5.2.3.1.(2)and 5.2.3.1.(3) shall be continuously examined for ignition of combustible materials by personnel equipped with and trained in the use of fire extinguishing equipment. (See Note A-5.2.3.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The exposed areas described in Sentences 5.2.3.1.(2)and 5.2.3.1.(3) shall be continuously examined for ignition of combustible materials by personnel equipped with and trained in the use of fire extinguishing equipment. (See Note A-5.2.3.3.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Activities that create a hazard and that are not allowed for in the original design shall not be carried out in a building unless provisions are made to control the hazard in conformance with this Code. (See Note A-2.1.2.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Activities that create a hazard and that are not allowed for in the original design shall not be carried out in a building unless provisions are made to control the hazard in conformance with this Code. (See Note A-2.1.2.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Unalloyed copper piping shall not be used for acetylene gas.
P/T Sentence Text: Unalloyed copper piping shall not be used for acetylene gas.

National Sentence Text: Secondary containments for flammable liquid and combustible liquidstorage tanks shall not contain any liquefied petroleum gas cylinder or tank, and the centre line of the secondary containment wall shall be not less than 3 m away from a liquefied petroleum gas cylinder, and 6 m away from a liquefied petroleum gas tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Secondary containments for flammable liquid and combustible liquidstorage tanks shall not contain any liquefied petroleum gas cylinder or tank, and the centre line of the secondary containment wall shall be not less than 3 m away from a liquefied petroleum gas cylinder, and 6 m away from a liquefied petroleum gas tank.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of gases described in Sentence 3.2.8.3.(1) shall not be stored in a room containing combustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders of gases described in Sentence 3.2.8.3.(1) shall not be stored in a room containing combustible materials.

National Sentence Text: When in a fire department access route, the gates required in Clause 3.3.2.6.(1)(c) shall be of adequate width and design, and in a location that readily permits the entry of fire department vehicles, in conformance with Article 3.3.2.5. (See Note A-3.3.2.6.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: When in a fire department access route, the gates required in Sentence 3.3.2.6.(1) shall be of adequate width and design, and in a location that readily permits the entry of fire department vehicles, in conformance with Article 3.3.2.5. (See Note A-3.3.2.6.(2).)

National Sentence Text: In industrial occupancies, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with Subsection 4.2.8., in cabinets conforming to Subsection 4.2.10., in rooms conforming to Subsection 4.2.9., or in storage areas conforming to Article 4.2.7.5.
P/T Sentence Text: In industrial occupancies, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with part 4., in cabinets conforming to part 4., in rooms conforming to part 4., or in storage areas conforming to Article 4.2.7.5.

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids, combustible liquids and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids, combustible liquids and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations.

National Sentence Text: Hoods, grease removal devices, fans, ducts, and other appurtenances shall be cleaned at frequent intervals to prevent surfaces from becoming heavily contaminated with grease or other residues. (See Note A-2.6.1.9.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Hoods, grease removal devices, fans, ducts, and other appurtenances shall be cleaned at frequent intervals to prevent surfaces from becoming heavily contaminated with grease or other residues. (See Note A-2.6.1.9.(3).)

National Sentence Text: Sliding doors that are required to swing on their vertical axes in the direction of egress when pressure is applied shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.
P/T Sentence Text: Sliding doors that are required to swing on their vertical axes in the direction of egress when pressure is applied shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 3.1.3. and in Section 5.2., open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used in an area where dangerous goods are stored. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 3. and in part 5., open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used in an area where dangerous goods are stored. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Interior finish materials, floors, fixed furniture and equipment shall be chemically resistant to dangerous goods being used in a laboratory to minimize their deterioration, in conformance with Articles 3.2.7.7.and 3.2.7.8.
P/T Sentence Text: Interior finish materials, floors, fixed furniture and equipment shall be chemically resistant to dangerous goods being used in a laboratory to minimize their deterioration, in conformance with Articles 3.2.7.7.and 3.2.7.8.

National Sentence Text: Where construction, alteration or demolition operations occur in an existing building that is required to have a fire safety plan conforming to Section 2.8., the fire safety plan shall take into account the changes occurring to the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Where construction, alteration or demolition operations occur in an existing building that is required to have a fire safety plan conforming to part 2., the fire safety plan shall take into account the changes occurring to the building.

National Sentence Text: Signs indicating the location of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves shall be posted in conspicuous locations.
P/T Sentence Text: Signs indicating the location of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves shall be posted in conspicuous locations.

National Sentence Text: Hot work equipment shall be examined for leakage or defects prior to each use.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot work equipment shall be examined for leakage or defects prior to each use.

National Sentence Text: The maximum permitted height of storage in any individual storage area shall be determined according to its base area and shape, and the stability of the stored products, and the height limitations otherwise set in this Section.
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum permitted height of storage in any individual storage area shall be determined according to its base area and shape, and the stability of the stored products, and the height limitations otherwise set in this Section.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases that are in storage shall be protected against valve damage (see Note A-3.1.2.5.(2)(a)), and firmly secured in a position that will not interfere with the operation of the cylinder valve assembly.
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases that are in storage shall be protected against valve damage (see Note A-3.1.2.5.(2)(a)), and firmly secured in a position that will not interfere with the operation of the cylinder valve assembly.

National Sentence Text: Fire dampers, smoke dampers, combination smoke/fire dampers and fire stop flaps shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that they are in place and not obviously damaged or obstructed, and tested in accordance with NFPA 80-2013 Fire Doors and Other Opening Protectives
P/T Sentence Text: Fire dampers, smoke dampers, combination smoke/fire dampers and fire stop flaps shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that they are in place and not obviously damaged or obstructed, and tested in accordance with NFPA 80-2013 Fire Doors and Other Opening Protectives

National Sentence Text: In the design of piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, provision shall be made for the expansion and contraction of the piping system and of the product it conveys.
P/T Sentence Text: In the design of piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, provision shall be made for the expansion and contraction of the piping system and of the product it conveys.

National Sentence Text: The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.
P/T Sentence Text: The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.

National Sentence Text: Static electricity shall be prevented from accumulating on machines or equipment subject to static electricity buildup by appropriate bonding, grounding and static eliminating devices.
P/T Sentence Text: Static electricity shall be prevented from accumulating on machines or equipment subject to static electricity buildup by appropriate bonding, grounding and static eliminating devices.

National Sentence Text: Conveying equipment belts shall be made of static conductive materials to prevent buildup of static charges. (See Note A-5.3.3.2.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Conveying equipment belts shall be made of static conductive materials to prevent buildup of static charges. (See Note A-5.3.3.2.(2).)

National Sentence Text: If the top of storage in piles, on shelves, in bin boxes or on racks is above the lower chords of floor or roof structural framing members, a clear space of not less than 300 mm shall be maintained between the storage and the structural members.
P/T Sentence Text: If the top of storage in piles, on shelves, in bin boxes or on racks is above the lower chords of floor or roof structural framing members, a clear space of not less than 300 mm shall be maintained between the storage and the structural members.

National Sentence Text: Where the package or container for a specific type of dangerous goods is subject to a standard established by a transportation regulatory authority, such package or container shall conform with the applicable standard. (See Note A-3.1.2.3.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where the package or container for a specific type of dangerous goods is subject to a standard established by a transportation regulatory authority, such package or container shall conform with the applicable standard. (See Note A-3.1.2.3.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Decorative materials on walls or ceilings shall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.
P/T Sentence Text: Decorative materials on walls or ceilings shall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 3.1.1., this Subsection applies to the outdoor storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 3., this Subsection applies to the outdoor storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.9.1.(2)and 4.2.9.1.(3), where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored in a room required in this Part, the storage densities averaged over the total room area and the total quantities of such liquids shall conform to Table 4.2.9.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.9.1.(2)and 4.2.9.1.(3), where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored in a room required in this Part, the storage densities averaged over the total room area and the total quantities of such liquids shall conform to Table 4.2.9.1.

National Sentence Text: The maximum quantities and densities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shown in Table 4.2.9.1. are permitted to be doubled provided the storage room is protected by an automatic fire suppression system conforming to Article 4.2.7.6.
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum quantities and densities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shown in Table 4.2.9.1. are permitted to be doubled provided the storage room is protected by an automatic fire suppression system conforming to Article 4.2.7.6.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 5.1.5.1.(2)and 5.1.5.1.(3), a fire safety plan conforming to Section 2.8. shall be prepared for areas where processes and operations described in Article 5.1.1.1. take place.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 5.1.5.1.(2)and 5.1.5.1.(3), a fire safety plan conforming to part 2. shall be prepared for areas where processes and operations described in Article 5.1.1.1. take place.

National Sentence Text: Signs prohibiting smoking shall have black lettering not less than 50 mm high with a 12 mm stroke on a yellow background, except that symbols of not less than 150 mm by 150 mm are permitted to be used in lieu of lettering.
P/T Sentence Text: Signs prohibiting smoking shall have black lettering not less than 50 mm high with a 12 mm stroke on a yellow background, except that symbols of not less than 150 mm by 150 mm are permitted to be used in lieu of lettering.

National Sentence Text: Metallic piping systems are permitted to be used for underground installations, provided they conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S667-11 Metallic Underground Piping for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Metallic piping systems are permitted to be used for underground installations, provided they conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S667-11 Metallic Underground Piping for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.2.1.(4), outdoor processing equipment having emergency relief venting and a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from property lines and buildings on the same property by distances equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1. for stable liquids, and 2.5 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for unstable liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.2.1.(4), outdoor processing equipment having emergency relief venting and a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from property lines and buildings on the same property by distances equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1. for stable liquids, and 2.5 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for unstable liquids.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.10.2.1.(2), buildings or parts of buildings in which distilled beverage alcohol is distilled, processed or stored in bulk shall be classified as high-hazard industrial occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.10.2.1.(2), buildings or parts of buildings in which distilled beverage alcohol is distilled, processed or stored in bulk shall be classified as high-hazard industrial occupancies.

National Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall not be parked on a street, shoulder or sidewalk while unloading at a fuel-dispensing station.
P/T Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall not be parked on a street, shoulder or sidewalk while unloading at a fuel-dispensing station.

National Sentence Text: Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
P/T Sentence Text: Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation.

National Sentence Text: Wall clearances of not less than 600 mm shall be maintained where stored products may swell or expand with the absorption of water.
P/T Sentence Text: Wall clearances of not less than 600 mm shall be maintained where stored products may swell or expand with the absorption of water.

National Sentence Text: Rooms or parts of buildings used for the storage of dangerous goods shall be dry and cool, and where the products being stored are capable of releasing flammable or toxic gases or vapours under normal ambient conditions, shall be provided with a ventilation system to exhaust such gases or vapours outdoors to an area where they will not return to the building (see Note A-3.2.7.3.(1)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: Rooms or parts of buildings used for the storage of dangerous goods shall be dry and cool, and where the products being stored are capable of releasing flammable or toxic gases or vapours under normal ambient conditions, shall be provided with a ventilation system to exhaust such gases or vapours outdoors to an area where they will not return to the building (see Note A-3.2.7.3.(1)(b)).

National Sentence Text: Horizontal concealed spaces, such as crawl spaces and ceiling spaces, shall not be used for the storage of combustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Horizontal concealed spaces, such as crawl spaces and ceiling spaces, shall not be used for the storage of combustible materials.

National Sentence Text: All components of the ventilation system shall be kept free of obstructions that may interfere with its operation.
P/T Sentence Text: All components of the ventilation system shall be kept free of obstructions that may interfere with its operation.

National Sentence Text: Low pressure storage tanks shall be constructed in conformance with API 620-2013 Design and Construction of Large, Welded, Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code
P/T Sentence Text: Low pressure storage tanks shall be constructed in conformance with API 620-2013 Design and Construction of Large, Welded, Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 4.3.1.8.(2), a storage tank shall be prevented from being overfilled by providing continuous supervision of the filling operations by personnel qualified to supervise such operations, or an overfill protection device conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S661-10 Overfill Protection Devices for Flammable and Combustible Liquid Storage Tanks (see Note A-4.3.1.8.(1)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 4.3.1.8.(2), a storage tank shall be prevented from being overfilled by providing continuous supervision of the filling operations by personnel qualified to supervise such operations, or an overfill protection device conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S661-10 Overfill Protection Devices for Flammable and Combustible Liquid Storage Tanks (see Note A-4.3.1.8.(1)(b)).

National Sentence Text: An emergency electrical power supply system for emergency equipment for health care facilities shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with CSA Z32-09 Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities (See Note A-6.5.1.1.(2).) (See Note A-6.5.1.1.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: An emergency electrical power supply system for emergency equipment for health care facilities shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with CSA Z32-09 Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities (See Note A-6.5.1.1.(2).)

National Sentence Text: When any portion of a fire protection system is temporarily shut down during construction, alteration or demolition operations, protection during shutdown shall comply with Article 6.1.1.4.
P/T Sentence Text: When any portion of a fire protection system is temporarily shut down during construction, alteration or demolition operations, protection during shutdown shall comply with Article 6.1.1.4.

National Sentence Text: Pressure regulators for inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(1) shall be provided in the gas line to control the pressure of the gas at the minimum pressure required to force the liquid through the piping system at the required rate.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressure regulators for inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(1) shall be provided in the gas line to control the pressure of the gas at the minimum pressure required to force the liquid through the piping system at the required rate.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.6.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be dispensed into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle, watercraft or floatplane while the engine is running.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.6.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be dispensed into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle, watercraft or floatplane while the engine is running.

National Sentence Text: A device to shut off power to all dispensers and pumps shall be provided at a remote location on the site of the fuel-dispensing station and shielded from any fire that might occur in the dispensing area.
P/T Sentence Text: A device to shut off power to all dispensers and pumps shall be provided at a remote location on the site of the fuel-dispensing station and shielded from any fire that might occur in the dispensing area.

National Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) is permitted to display the international "No Smoking – Ignition Off" symbol not less than 100 mm in diameter.
P/T Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) is permitted to display the international "No Smoking – Ignition Off" symbol not less than 100 mm in diameter.

National Sentence Text: Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
P/T Sentence Text: Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation

National Sentence Text: Hoods, ducts and filters subject to accumulations of combustible deposits shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 7 days, and shall be cleaned if the accumulation of such deposits creates a fire hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: Hoods, ducts and filters subject to accumulations of combustible deposits shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 7 days, and shall be cleaned if the accumulation of such deposits creates a fire hazard.

National Sentence Text: Classes and divisions of dangerous goods referred to in this Code shall mean their primary and first subsidiary classification as defined in Part 2 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) or the categories and subcategories established by the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) for controlled products determined in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations
P/T Sentence Text: Classes and divisions of dangerous goods referred to in this Code shall mean their primary and first subsidiary classification as defined in Part 2 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) or the categories and subcategories established by the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) for controlled products determined in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations

National Sentence Text: Where a storage tank contains Class I liquids, provisions shall be made for the normal operation of valves and for access to the storage tank roof without entering the contained space created by the secondary containment when the average height of the secondary containment exceeds 3.5 m, measured from the ground level of the interior of the contained area, or the distance between the tank shell and the top inside edge of the secondary containment wall is less than the height of this wall. (See Note A-4.3.7.5.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where a storage tank contains Class I liquids, provisions shall be made for the normal operation of valves and for access to the storage tank roof without entering the contained space created by the secondary containment when the average height of the secondary containment exceeds 3.5 m, measured from the ground level of the interior of the contained area, or the distance between the tank shell and the top inside edge of the secondary containment wall is less than the height of this wall.

National Sentence Text: Ducts used in a ventilation system conforming to Article 4.1.7.2. shall not be used for any other ventilation or exhaust system.
P/T Sentence Text: Ducts used in a ventilation system conforming to Article 4.1.7.2. shall not be used for any other ventilation or exhaust system.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be transported in devices designed to provide restraint against movement in any direction.
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be transported in devices designed to provide restraint against movement in any direction.

National Sentence Text: Valves and their connections to a storage tank shall be made of steel, except that when the chemical characteristics of the liquid stored are incompatible with steel, materials other than steel are permitted to be used.
P/T Sentence Text: Valves and their connections to a storage tank shall be made of steel, except that when the chemical characteristics of the liquid stored are incompatible with steel, materials other than steel are permitted to be used.

National Sentence Text: The minimum distance required in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) is permitted to be waived provided the storage tank is in conformance with ULC ULC-S655-98 Aboveground Protected Tank Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: The minimum distance required in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) is permitted to be waived provided the storage tank is in conformance with ULC ULC-S655-98 Aboveground Protected Tank Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Protection against fires or explosions required for a storage tank shall consist of fixed protection systems designed in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 11-2016 Low-, Medium-, and High-Expansion Foam NFPA 15-2012 Water Spray Fixed Systems for Fire Protection and NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Protection against fires or explosions required for a storage tank shall consist of fixed protection systems designed in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 11-2016 Low-, Medium-, and High-Expansion Foam NFPA 15-2012 Water Spray Fixed Systems for Fire Protection and NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems

National Sentence Text: Fire protection equipment shall be provided where there are special hazards of operation, dispensing or storage.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire protection equipment shall be provided where there are special hazards of operation, dispensing or storage.

National Sentence Text: Floor finishing operations involving the use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall conform to Part 4. and this Subsection.
P/T Sentence Text: Floor finishing operations involving the use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall conform to part 4. and this Subsection.

National Sentence Text: Absorbent and neutralizing materials shall be provided in the laboratory and in the dangerous goods storage areas in conformance with Sentence 3.2.7.11.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Absorbent and neutralizing materials shall be provided in the laboratory and in the dangerous goods storage areas in conformance with Sentence 3.2.7.11.(2).

National Sentence Text: Where a construction or demolition site is fenced so as to prevent general entry, provision shall be made for access by fire department equipment and personnel.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a construction or demolition site is fenced so as to prevent general entry, provision shall be made for access by fire department equipment and personnel.

National Sentence Text: The 2-way communication system from each floor area to the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure proper operation.
P/T Sentence Text: The 2-way communication system from each floor area to the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure proper operation.

National Sentence Text: Any method of handling that might result in damage to the protective coating of the tank shall not be used.
P/T Sentence Text: Any method of handling that might result in damage to the protective coating of the tank shall not be used.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be placed in an underground storage tank until the fill pipe and vent line have been installed in the tank, and all other openings have been sealed.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be placed in an underground storage tank until the fill pipe and vent line have been installed in the tank, and all other openings have been sealed.

National Sentence Text: The training of personnel involved in the outdoor storage of dangerous goods shall conform to Article 3.2.7.15.
P/T Sentence Text: The training of personnel involved in the outdoor storage of dangerous goods shall conform to Article 3.2.7.15.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(1), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be kept in containers conforming to Subsection 4.2.3. or in storage tanks conforming to Subsection 4.3.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(1), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be kept in containers conforming to part 4. or in storage tanks conforming to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Stainless steel, monel metal or lined steel bodied valves are permitted to be used when special conditions warrant their use.
P/T Sentence Text: Stainless steel, monel metal or lined steel bodied valves are permitted to be used when special conditions warrant their use.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 2.8.3.2.(2)to 5.5.3.1.(5), a laboratory shall conform to the requirements for emergency planning in Section 2.8. and for a fire safety plan in Subsection 5.1.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 2.8.3.2.(2)to 5.5.3.1.(5), a laboratory shall conform to the requirements for emergency planning in part 2. and for a fire safety plan in part 5.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to systems for dispensing flammable liquids or combustible liquids where such liquids are transferred from bulk storage to individual or multiple dispensers by pumps located elsewhere than at the dispensers.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to systems for dispensing flammable liquids or combustible liquids where such liquids are transferred from bulk storage to individual or multiple dispensers by pumps located elsewhere than at the dispensers.

National Sentence Text: Where a product has multiple classes, the applicable small quantity exemption referred to in Sentence 3.3.4.1.(2) shall be determined using Column A of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Section 2.8 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) Column B of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Table A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b), for controlled products under the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) as classified in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations or when the class having precedence cannot be established, Column C of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the lesser of the two small quantity exemptions. (See Note A-3.2.7.1.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where a product has multiple classes, the applicable small quantity exemption referred to in Sentence 3.3.4.1.(2) shall be determined using Column A of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Section 2.8 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) Column B of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Table A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b), for controlled products under the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) as classified in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations or when the class having precedence cannot be established, Column C of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the lesser of the two small quantity exemptions.

National Sentence Text: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., the required fire safety plan shall include the safety measures described in this Subsection for the safe conducting of hot works.
P/T Sentence Text: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., the required fire safety plan shall include the safety measures described in this Subsection for the safe conducting of hot works.

National Sentence Text: Except for self-contained systems within dwelling units, disconnect switches for mechanical air-conditioning and ventilating systems shall be operated at intervals not greater than 12 months to establish that the system can be shut down in an emergency.
P/T Sentence Text: Except for self-contained systems within dwelling units, disconnect switches for mechanical air-conditioning and ventilating systems shall be operated at intervals not greater than 12 months to establish that the system can be shut down in an emergency.

National Sentence Text: When nonfixed seats are provided in assembly occupancies, except as provided in Sentence 2.7.1.5.(3), the seats shall be arranged in rows having an unobstructed passage of not less than 400 mm between rows measured horizontally between plumb lines from the backs of the seats in one row and the edges of the furthest forward projection of the seats in the next row behind in the unoccupied position, except as provided in Sentence 2.7.1.5.(2), aisles shall be located so that there are not more than 7 seats between every seat and the nearest aisle, except as provided in Sentence 2.7.1.5.(2), the clear width of an aisle in millimetres shall be not less than the greater of 1 100 or the product of the number of seats served by that aisle and 6.1, the width of an aisle is permitted to be reduced to not less than 750 mm when serving 60 seats or fewer, dead-end aisles shall not be longer than 6 m, and except as provided in Sentence 2.7.1.5.(3), when the occupant load exceeds 200 persons, the seats in a row shall be fastened together in units of no fewer than 8 seats, or where there are 7 seats or fewer in a row, all the seats in the row shall be fastened together.

National Sentence Text: Exit lighting, exit signs and emergency lighting shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC. (See Note A-2.7.3.1.(1).)

P/T Sentence Text: Means of egress lighting, emergency lighting, exit signs and the location of exit signs in buildings shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code. (See Note A-2.7.3.1.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Means of egress lighting, emergency lighting, exit signs and the location of exit signs in buildings shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code. (See Note A-2.7.3.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 2.8.3.2.(2), fire drills as described in Sentence 2.8.3.1.(1) shall be held at intervals not greater than 12 months for the supervisory staff, except that in day-care centres and in Group B major occupancies, such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than one month, in schools attended by children, total evacuation fire drills shall be held at least 3 times in each of the fall and spring school terms, and in buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC, such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than 2 months.

National Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank shall be supported in a manner that will prevent the allowable design stress of the tank from being exceeded.
P/T Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank shall be supported in a manner that will prevent the allowable design stress of the tank from being exceeded.

National Sentence Text: Where end failure of horizontal storage tanks may endanger adjacent property, the tanks shall be placed with the longitudinal axis parallel to such property.
P/T Sentence Text: Where end failure of horizontal storage tanks may endanger adjacent property, the tanks shall be placed with the longitudinal axis parallel to such property.

National Sentence Text: Static liquid media testing of sumps shall be performed at the installation stage after all electrical and mechanical work passing through the sump wall has been completed but before any backfilling around the exterior of the sump is completed.
P/T Sentence Text: Static liquid media testing of sumps shall be performed at the installation stage after all electrical and mechanical work passing through the sump wall has been completed but before any backfilling around the exterior of the sump is completed.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.6.3.(2), the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids outside of a cabinet or storage room required in Article 4.2.6.2. is permitted, provided such storage does not exceed 10 L, including not more than 5 L of Class I liquids, in a single room, or 250 L, including not more than 60 L of Class II liquids, or 10 L of Class I liquids, in a single fire compartment with a fire-resistance rating of at least 45 min.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.6.3.(2), the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids outside of a cabinet or storage room required in Article 4.2.6.2. is permitted, provided such storage does not exceed 10 L, including not more than 5 L of Class I liquids, in a single room, or 250 L, including not more than 60 L of Class II liquids, or 10 L of Class I liquids, in a single fire compartment with a fire-resistance rating of at least 45 min.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored in cabinets or storage rooms shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Article 4.2.2.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored in cabinets or storage rooms shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Article 4.2.2.3.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.1.7.6., the exhaust air outlet from a mechanical ventilation system required in Article 4.1.7.2. shall be located outdoors, not less than 3 m from any building opening, and arranged so that the exhaust air does not discharge toward any unprotected opening within 7.5 m of the discharge point.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.1.7.6., the exhaust air outlet from a mechanical ventilation system required in Article 4.1.7.2. shall be located outdoors, not less than 3 m from any building opening, and arranged so that the exhaust air does not discharge toward any unprotected opening within 7.5 m of the discharge point.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.5.7.1.(2)and 4.5.7.1.(3), valves in piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed to accommodate the temperatures and pressures of those systems and shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C842-84 Guide for the Investigation of Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.5.7.1.(2)and 4.5.7.1.(3), valves in piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed to accommodate the temperatures and pressures of those systems and shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C842-84 Guide for the Investigation of Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Containers used for the preservation of animal, human or plant specimens that contain flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be properly sized for the specimens, be stored in a room conforming to Subsection 4.2.9., and be protected against breakage and spillage.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers used for the preservation of animal, human or plant specimens that contain flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be properly sized for the specimens, be stored in a room conforming to part 4., and be protected against breakage and spillage.

National Sentence Text: All packaged flammable liquid and combustible liquid products stored or sold at a fuel-dispensing station shall be in closed containers conforming to Article 4.2.3.1., distinctly marked with the generic name of the liquid they contain.
P/T Sentence Text: All packaged flammable liquid and combustible liquid products stored or sold at a fuel-dispensing station shall be in closed containers conforming to Article 4.2.3.1., distinctly marked with the generic name of the liquid they contain.

National Sentence Text: Commercial cooking equipment exhaust and fire protection systems shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Commercial cooking equipment exhaust and fire protection systems shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Commercial cooking equipment exhaust and fire protection systems shall be designed and installed in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Commercial cooking equipment exhaust and fire protection systems shall be designed and installed in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Unless the use of fuel-fired appliances and electrical heating elements is controlled in a manner such that they will not create a fire or explosion hazard, they shall not be permitted in a storage area for combustible fibres.
P/T Sentence Text: Unless the use of fuel-fired appliances and electrical heating elements is controlled in a manner such that they will not create a fire or explosion hazard, they shall not be permitted in a storage area for combustible fibres.

National Sentence Text: All ashes shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(4) and combustible materials shall not be stored with ashes in the same container.
P/T Sentence Text: All ashes shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(4) and combustible materials shall not be stored with ashes in the same container.

National Sentence Text: Except for Class I commodities, dangerous goods shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with other products listed in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Except for Class I commodities, dangerous goods shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with other products listed in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: Where combustible or reactive deposits can accumulate in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system and create a fire or explosion hazard, provisions shall be made to remove such deposits so they do not create a fire or explosion hazard, or an automatic fire suppression system shall be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Where combustible or reactive deposits can accumulate in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system and create a fire or explosion hazard, provisions shall be made to remove such deposits so they do not create a fire or explosion hazard, or an automatic fire suppression system shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(3), fuel-fired industrial trucks shall be refuelled only at designated locations outside buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(3), fuel-fired industrial trucks shall be refuelled only at designated locations outside buildings.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 2.7.2.1.(2), 2.7.2.1.(3)and 2.7.2.1.(4), all doors forming part of a means of egress shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that they are operable.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 2.7.2.1.(2), 2.7.2.1.(3)and 2.7.2.1.(4), all doors forming part of a means of egress shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that they are operable.

National Sentence Text: Lint traps in laundry equipment shall be cleaned after each use of the equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Lint traps in laundry equipment shall be cleaned after each use of the equipment.

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan required in Sentence 3.3.2.9.(1) shall identify the location and classification of the products currently stored, as described in Sentence 3.3.1.1.(1), the method of storage, including the clear spaces required and the maximum permitted size of individual storage areas, the location of fire alarm systems and firefighting equipment, and the control of fire hazards in and around the outdoor storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire safety plan required in Sentence 3.3.2.9.(1) shall identify the location and classification of the products currently stored, as described in Sentence 3.3.1.1.(1), the method of storage, including the clear spaces required and the maximum permitted size of individual storage areas, the location of fire alarm systems and firefighting equipment, and the control of fire hazards in and around the outdoor storage area.

National Sentence Text: Any building located in an outdoor storage area shall be provided with portable extinguishers.
P/T Sentence Text: Any building located in an outdoor storage area shall be provided with portable extinguishers.

National Sentence Text: Where an emergency power system is installed, instructions shall be provided for switching on essential loads and for starting the generator when this is not done automatically.
P/T Sentence Text: Where an emergency power system is installed, instructions shall be provided for switching on essential loads and for starting the generator when this is not done automatically.

National Sentence Text: Delivery hose shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S612-16 Hose and Hose Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Delivery hose shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S612-16 Hose and Hose Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 6.5.1.8.(2), exit signs shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that the exit signs will be visible upon failure of the primary power supply.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 6.5.1.8.(2), exit signs shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that the exit signs will be visible upon failure of the primary power supply.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of calculating permissible quantities in Sentences 4.2.5.2.(2)and 4.2.5.2.(3), mercantile occupancies of less than 250 m2floor area shall be assumed to be 250 m2 in area.
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of calculating permissible quantities in Sentences 4.2.5.2.(2)and 4.2.5.2.(3), mercantile occupancies of less than 250 m2floor area shall be assumed to be 250 m2 in area.

National Sentence Text: Means of automatically shutting off the gas supply and bleeding the gas pressure in the event of fire shall be provided on all inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Means of automatically shutting off the gas supply and bleeding the gas pressure in the event of fire shall be provided on all inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(1).

National Sentence Text: Care shall be taken that no liquid is discharged on a pier or wharf or overboard during draining and emptying operations.
P/T Sentence Text: Care shall be taken that no liquid is discharged on a pier or wharf or overboard during draining and emptying operations.

National Sentence Text: Connections to storage tanks through which liquid can flow shall be provided with valves located as close as practicable to the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Connections to storage tanks through which liquid can flow shall be provided with valves located as close as practicable to the tank.

National Sentence Text: Where storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are located outside of storage rooms conforming to Subsection 4.3.14., provision shall be made to contain a spill equal to at least 100% of the volume of the largest storage tank, or to drain away spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the area in which the storage tanks are located shall be ventilated (see Note A-4.3.13.9.(1)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: Where storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are located outside of storage rooms conforming to part 4., provision shall be made to contain a spill equal to at least 100% of the volume of the largest storage tank, or to drain away spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the area in which the storage tanks are located shall be ventilated (see Note A-4.3.13.9.(1)(b)).

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to spray coating processes involving the use of combustible dry powders, flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to spray coating processes involving the use of combustible dry powders, flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Electrical equipment, mechanical systems, piping, valves, and automatic and manual control and safety devices shall be inspected, tested and maintained in good operating condition at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical equipment, mechanical systems, piping, valves, and automatic and manual control and safety devices shall be inspected, tested and maintained in good operating condition at all times.

National Sentence Text: Where a dispenser referred to in Sentence 4.7.3.2.(1) is supplied from an aboveground storage tank an automatically operated valve that is designed to open only when the dispenser is being operated shall be provided at the tank outlet, and an emergency valve shall be provided for the dispenser in conformance with Sentence 4.6.6.3.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Where a dispenser referred to in Sentence 4.7.3.2.(1) is supplied from an aboveground storage tank an automatically operated valve that is designed to open only when the dispenser is being operated shall be provided at the tank outlet, and an emergency valve shall be provided for the dispenser in conformance with Sentence 4.6.6.3.(1).

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Code, dangerous goodsclassified as flammable liquids shall mean flammable liquids and combustible liquids as defined in Subsection 4.1.2.
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Code, dangerous goodsclassified as flammable liquids shall mean flammable liquids and combustible liquids as defined in part 4.

National Sentence Text: A pressure decline test performed on a piping system shall conform to Sentences 4.4.3.3.(3)to 4.4.3.3.(9).
P/T Sentence Text: A pressure decline test performed on a piping system shall conform to Sentences 4.4.3.3.(3)to 4.4.3.3.(9).

National Sentence Text: Except for Class I commodities, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with other products listed in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Except for Class I commodities, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with other products listed in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: Control valves referred to in Sentence 4.7.4.4.(1) shall be held open manually, except where automatic devices are provided for shutting off the flow in order to prevent the overfilling of tank vehicle or tank car compartments. (See Note A-4.7.4.4.(2).) (See Note A-4.7.4.5.)
P/T Sentence Text: Control valves referred to in Sentence 4.7.4.4.(1) shall be held open manually, except where automatic devices are provided for shutting off the flow in order to prevent the overfilling of tank vehicle or tank car compartments. (See Note A-4.7.4.4.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Openings that are independent of the fill pipe and are used for measuring the liquid level in storage tanks containing Class I or II liquids shall be equipped with a vapour-tight cap which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.
P/T Sentence Text: Openings that are independent of the fill pipe and are used for measuring the liquid level in storage tanks containing Class I or II liquids shall be equipped with a vapour-tight cap which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.

National Sentence Text: Pipe volumes of 500 L or less shall be pressurized for at least 60 min after stabilization.
P/T Sentence Text: Pipe volumes of 500 L or less shall be pressurized for at least 60 min after stabilization.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure G is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below gradefloor areas that are required by Sentence (6) of Measure G open automatically and remain open, and the mechanical air supply to stairshafts and elevator shafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2), (3) and (4) of Measure G, and closures in openings to the outdoors in stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when the air supply to the stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) of Measure G.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure G is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below gradefloor areas that are required by Sentence (6) of Measure G open automatically and remain open, and the mechanical air supply to stairshafts and elevator shafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2), (3) and (4) of Measure G, and closures in openings to the outdoors in stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when the air supply to the stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) of Measure G.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure N is used to limit smoke movement from one building to another of connected buildings as provided in Measure N of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches to initiate the air supply to the vestibules shall be tested to ensure that the air supply is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure N, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules shall be tested to ensure that they will open as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure N.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure N is used to limit smoke movement from one building to another of connected buildings as provided in Measure N of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches to initiate the air supply to the vestibules shall be tested to ensure that the air supply is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure N, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules shall be tested to ensure that they will open as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure N.

National Sentence Text: Vent piping and connections for filling and emptying storage tanks shall be located in conformance with Section 4.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent piping and connections for filling and emptying storage tanks shall be located in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: The bonding connection required in Sentence 4.7.4.5.(1) shall be fixed to the tank vehicle or storage tank before dome covers are raised and shall remain in place until filling is completed and all dome covers have been closed and secured.
P/T Sentence Text: The bonding connection required in Sentence 4.7.4.5.(1) shall be fixed to the tank vehicle or storage tank before dome covers are raised and shall remain in place until filling is completed and all dome covers have been closed and secured.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging of buildings, including the fumigation of equipment or commodities within structures, tanks or bins or under tarpaulins.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging of buildings, including the fumigation of equipment or commodities within structures, tanks or bins or under tarpaulins.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks installed underground shall be of double-walled construction and shall be built in conformance with the underground storage tank standards identified in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks installed underground shall be of double-walled construction and shall be built in conformance with the underground storage tank standards identified in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1).

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall not be stored on combustible floors or platforms.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall not be stored on combustible floors or platforms.

National Sentence Text: Where fire separations are damaged so as to affect their integrity, they shall be repaired so that the integrity of the fire separation is maintained.
P/T Sentence Text: Where fire separations are damaged so as to affect their integrity, they shall be repaired so that the integrity of the fire separation is maintained.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Part, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be classified in conformance with Sentences 4.1.2.1.(2)and 4.1.2.1.(3).
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Part, flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be classified in conformance with Sentences 4.1.2.1.(2)and 4.1.2.1.(3).

National Sentence Text: Each motorized vehicle operating in an outdoor storage area shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.
P/T Sentence Text: Each motorized vehicle operating in an outdoor storage area shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.

National Sentence Text: Smoking and non-fixed sources of ignition shall not be permitted within 7.5 m of a dispenser at a fuel-dispensing station.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoking and non-fixed sources of ignition shall not be permitted within 7.5 m of a dispenser at a fuel-dispensing station.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.2.2.(6), main access aisles shall have a minimum width of 2.4 m for storage heights of not more than 6 m, and 3.6 m for storage heights of more than 6 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.2.2.(6), main access aisles shall have a minimum width of 2.4 m for storage heights of not more than 6 m, and 3.6 m for storage heights of more than 6 m.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks shall rest on the ground or on foundations, supports or piling made of concrete, masonry or steel.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks shall rest on the ground or on foundations, supports or piling made of concrete, masonry or steel.

National Sentence Text: When changes in the use of buildings or floor areas create a hazard exceeding the criteria for which the fire protection systems were designed, such fire protection systems shall be upgraded to accommodate the increased hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: When changes in the use of buildings or floor areas create a hazard exceeding the criteria for which the fire protection systems were designed, such fire protection systems shall be upgraded to accommodate the increased hazard.

National Sentence Text: Personnel working in a laboratory shall be trained in the safe handling and use of dangerous goods, in conformance with Article 3.2.7.15.
P/T Sentence Text: Personnel working in a laboratory shall be trained in the safe handling and use of dangerous goods, in conformance with Article 3.2.7.15.

National Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank containing unstable liquids and having a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., but not less than 7.5 m, where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or 3 times those in Table 4.3.2.1., but not less than 15 m, where protection referred to in Clause 4.3.2.1.(3)(a) is not provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank containing unstable liquids and having a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., but not less than 7.5 m, where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or 3 times those in Table 4.3.2.1., but not less than 15 m, where protection referred to in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(3) is not provided.

National Sentence Text: Overhead piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be installed close to the ceiling or beams or along walls not less than 1.8 m above the floor to protect it against mechanical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Overhead piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be installed close to the ceiling or beams or along walls not less than 1.8 m above the floor to protect it against mechanical damage.

National Sentence Text: The fire watch described in Clauses 5.2.3.1.(2)(b)and 5.2.3.1.(2)(c) shall be carried out by more than one person if combustible materials are exposed to the hot work operations but cannot be directly observed by the initial person performing the fire watch.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire watch described in Clauses 5.2.3.1.(2)and 5.2.3.1.(2) shall be carried out by more than one person if combustible materials are exposed to the hot work operations but cannot be directly observed by the initial person performing the fire watch.

National Sentence Text: Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified, this Section shall apply to all areas involved in the storage, handling or use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids covered in this Part. (See Note A-4.1.2.1.)
P/T Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified, this Section shall apply to all areas involved in the storage, handling or use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids covered in this Part.

National Sentence Text: Provisions shall be made for removing liquid from the secondary containment in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Provisions shall be made for removing liquid from the secondary containment in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the NBC. (See Note A-4.2.7.5.(2).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules at or near grade level shall be tested by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke in different seasons at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, when the building is pressurized but without venting of the fire floor, to ensure that the direction of air movement is from the building to the outdoors.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules at or near grade level shall be tested by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke in different seasons at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, when the building is pressurized but without venting of the fire floor, to ensure that the direction of air movement is from the building to the outdoors.

National Sentence Text: One person shall be on duty at each entrance to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging to prevent any unauthorized person from entering until such premises have been ventilated.
P/T Sentence Text: One person shall be on duty at each entrance to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging to prevent any unauthorized person from entering until such premises have been ventilated.

National Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be maintained in satisfactory operating condition and be pressure tested, at intervals not greater than 12 months, to 1.5 times the maximum working pressure but not less than 350 kPa (gauge).
P/T Sentence Text: Cargo hose shall be maintained in satisfactory operating condition and be pressure tested, at intervals not greater than 12 months, to 1.5 times the maximum working pressure but not less than 350 kPa (gauge).

National Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies, the refuelling of equipment used to flame meals or drinks, or to warm food, shall be carried out outside the serving area, and away from ignition sources.
P/T Sentence Text: In assembly occupancies, the refuelling of equipment used to flame meals or drinks, or to warm food, shall be carried out outside the serving area, and away from ignition sources.

National Sentence Text: Indoor storage of combustible pallets is permitted in a building that is not sprinklered, provided the height of storage of combustible pallets is not more than 1.2 m, the width of an individual storage area is not more than 7.5 m, and the aggregate area of storage is not more than 100 m2 for wood or solid deck non-expanded polyethylene pallets, or 50 m2 for plastic pallets not designated in subclause 3.2.2.4.(2)(c)(i).
P/T Sentence Text: Indoor storage of combustible pallets is permitted in a building that is not sprinklered, provided the height of storage of combustible pallets is not more than 1.2 m, the width of an individual storage area is not more than 7.5 m, and the aggregate area of storage is not more than 100 m2 for wood or solid deck non-expanded polyethylene pallets, or 50 m2 for plastic pallets not designated in Sentence 3.2.2.4.(2).

National Sentence Text: Main access aisles shall extend the length of the storage area where only one main access aisle is provided, or the length or width of the storage area where 2 or more main access aisles are provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Main access aisles shall extend the length of the storage area where only one main access aisle is provided, or the length or width of the storage area where 2 or more main access aisles are provided.

National Sentence Text: A clearance of not less than 400 mm shall be maintained between stored flammable liquids and combustible liquids and walls, except that where the width of storage adjacent to the wall is not more than 1.5 m, such wall clearance is not required. (See Note A-4.2.7.7.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: A clearance of not less than 400 mm shall be maintained between stored flammable liquids and combustible liquids and walls, except that where the width of storage adjacent to the wall is not more than 1.5 m, such wall clearance is not required. (See Note A-4.2.7.7.(3).)

National Sentence Text: If a water-based fire suppression system is not compatible with the fire suppression requirements for certain types of dangerous goods, a special fire suppression system conforming to one of the standards listed in Sentence 2.1.3.5.(3) is permitted to be installed in lieu of a water-based system.
P/T Sentence Text: If a water-based fire suppression system is not compatible with the fire suppression requirements for certain types of dangerous goods, a special fire suppression system conforming to one of the standards listed in Sentence 2.1.3.5.(3) is permitted to be installed in lieu of a water-based system.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 5.3.1.7., an activity that creates an atmosphere containing significant concentrations of combustible dusts shall be located only in a building provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 5.3.1.7., an activity that creates an atmosphere containing significant concentrations of combustible dusts shall be located only in a building provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.

National Sentence Text: Where access to a roof is provided for firefighting purposes, keys shall be provided for locked roof access doors and kept in a location determined in cooperation with the fire department.
P/T Sentence Text: Where access to a roof is provided for firefighting purposes, keys shall be provided for locked roof access doors and kept in a location determined in cooperation with the fire department.

National Sentence Text: Air moving fans in a system serving more than 2 storeys shall be tested to ensure that they will stop on activation of a switch at the central alarm and control facility.
P/T Sentence Text: Air moving fans in a system serving more than 2 storeys shall be tested to ensure that they will stop on activation of a switch at the central alarm and control facility.

National Sentence Text: Pneumatic leak detection tests using compressed air shall not be performed on storage tanks and piping systems having once contained flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Pneumatic leak detection tests using compressed air shall not be performed on storage tanks and piping systems having once contained flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Except for vent risers and vertical fill piping systems, underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction.
P/T Sentence Text: Except for vent risers and vertical fill piping systems, underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 4.6.5.1.(3)and 4.6.5.1.(4), hose through which flammable liquids or combustible liquids are dispensed at a fuel-dispensing station shall be restricted to a maximum extended length of 4.5 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 4.6.5.1.(3)and 4.6.5.1.(4), hose through which flammable liquids or combustible liquids are dispensed at a fuel-dispensing station shall be restricted to a maximum extended length of 4.5 m.

National Sentence Text: All flames and other sources of ignition shall be eliminated in any part of a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging.
P/T Sentence Text: All flames and other sources of ignition shall be eliminated in any part of a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as flammable gases shall not be used to inflate balloons.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as flammable gases shall not be used to inflate balloons.

National Sentence Text: Access to fire department connections for sprinkler or standpipe systems by firefighters and their equipment shall be maintained free of obstructions at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: Access to fire department connections for sprinkler or standpipe systems by firefighters and their equipment shall be maintained free of obstructions at all times.

National Sentence Text: The test procedures described in Subsections 7.3.2.to 7.3.15., as appropriate to the fire safety measure being used, shall be carried out in addition to those required by Sections 7.1.and 7.2., unless otherwise specified in the fire safety plan. (See Note A-7.3.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The test procedures described in Subsections 7.to 7., as appropriate to the fire safety measure being used, shall be carried out in addition to those required by Sections 7.and 7., unless otherwise specified in the fire safety plan. (See Note A-7.3.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Wetting agents used in conjunction with water-based fire suppression systems shall conform to NFPA 18-2011 Wetting Agents

National Sentence Text: Materials installed to protect combustible sprinkler piping, as is required by the NBC, shall be maintained in accordance with the provisions of the same edition of the NBC used for their installation. (See Note A-2.1.3.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Quantities of loose combustible fibres that exceed 30 m3 shall be stored in an individual room that is sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems that is separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h, and except as provided in Sentence 3.2.6.3.(5), with individual storage areas not exceeding the design area of the sprinkler system.

National Sentence Text: A closure in an opening to the outdoors at the top of a smoke shaft shall be tested to ensure that it will open manually from outside the building, on a signal from the smoke detector in the smoke shaft, and when a closure in an opening between a floor area and the smoke shaft opens.
