National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 4.3.8.3.(2)to 4.3.8.3.(4), underground storage tanks shall be installed with not less than 600 mm of ground cover over the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 4.3.8.3.(2)to 4.3.8.3.(4), underground storage tanks shall be installed with not less than 600 mm of ground cover over the tank.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers in proximity to a fire hazard shall be located so as to be accessible without exposing the operator to undue risk. (See Note A-2.1.5.1.(5).)
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers in proximity to a fire hazard shall be located so as to be accessible without exposing the operator to undue risk. (See Note A-2.1.5.1.(5).)

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers that are subject to corrosion shall not be installed in a corrosive environment unless they are provided with appropriate corrosion protection.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers that are subject to corrosion shall not be installed in a corrosive environment unless they are provided with appropriate corrosion protection.

National Sentence Text: An area used for the storage of dangerous goods shall be secured against unauthorized access.
P/T Sentence Text: An area used for the storage of dangerous goods shall be secured against unauthorized access.

National Sentence Text: Except as otherwise stated in this Code, this Section shall not apply to bulk plants covered in Section 4.7., refineries covered in Section 4.9. and distilleries covered in Section 4.10., liquids in the fuel tank of motors or engines, distilled beverage alcohol in closed containers when stored in conformance with Part 3., food and pharmaceutical products when in closed containers having a capacity of not more than 5 L, or products containing not more than 50% by volume of water-miscible flammable liquids or combustible liquids with the remainder of the solution being non-flammable, when in closed containers having a capacity of not more than 5 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as otherwise stated in this Code, this Section shall not apply to bulk plants covered in part 4., refineries covered in part 4. and distilleries covered in part 4., liquids in the fuel tank of motors or engines, distilled beverage alcohol in closed containers when stored in conformance with part 3., food and pharmaceutical products when in closed containers having a capacity of not more than 5 L, or products containing not more than 50% by volume of water-miscible flammable liquids or combustible liquids with the remainder of the solution being non-flammable, when in closed containers having a capacity of not more than 5 L.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.5.2.(5), the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in mercantile occupancies shall not exceed those in Sentences 4.2.5.2.(2)to 4.2.5.2.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.5.2.(5), the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in mercantile occupancies shall not exceed those in Sentences 4.2.5.2.(2)to 4.2.5.2.(4).

National Sentence Text: Quantities of dangerous goods other than flammable liquids and combustible liquids in excess of those permitted in Sentence 5.5.5.1.(1) shall be stored outside of the laboratory in conformance with Part 3..
P/T Sentence Text: Quantities of dangerous goods other than flammable liquids and combustible liquids in excess of those permitted in Sentence 5.5.5.1.(1) shall be stored outside of the laboratory in conformance with part 3..

National Sentence Text: Materials for piping systems containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be suitable for the maximum anticipated working pressures and operating temperatures and for the chemical properties of the contained liquid.

National Sentence Text: Signs required by the NBC to indicate the occupant load for a floor area shall be posted in conspicuous locations near the principal entrances to the floor area. (See Note A-2.7.1.4.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Closures in fire separations shall not be obstructed, blocked, wedged open, or altered in any way that would prevent the intended operation of the closure.
P/T Sentence Text: Closures in fire separations shall not be obstructed, blocked, wedged open, or altered in any way that would prevent the intended operation of the closure.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings except dwelling units.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings except dwelling units.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 2.6.2., the burning of materials in an outdoor storage area shall be performed only in a burner that is designed, constructed and maintained in conformance with good engineering practice, and located not less than 15 m from a building or stored products.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 2., the burning of materials in an outdoor storage area shall be performed only in a burner that is designed, constructed and maintained in conformance with good engineering practice, and located not less than 15 m from a building or stored products.

National Sentence Text: Ventilation required in Sentence 5.4.4.3.(1) is permitted to be provided by mechanical systems if their use does not constitute a source of ignition.
P/T Sentence Text: Ventilation required in Sentence 5.4.4.3.(1) is permitted to be provided by mechanical systems if their use does not constitute a source of ignition.

National Sentence Text: Facilities shall be provided to enable the watcher referred to in Sentences 5.6.1.14.(1)and 5.6.1.14.(2) to ensure a fire warning is sounded to notify occupants, and communicate with the fire department.
P/T Sentence Text: Facilities shall be provided to enable the watcher referred to in Sentences 5.6.1.14.(1)and 5.6.1.14.(2) to ensure a fire warning is sounded to notify occupants, and communicate with the fire department.

National Sentence Text: Piping between storage tanks located on shore and dispensers at a marine fuel-dispensing station shall conform to Section 4.5., except that where dispensing is from a floating structure, it is permitted to use suitable lengths of flexible hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice between the piping on shore and the piping on the floating structure. (See Note A-4.8.8.1.(1)(a).)
P/T Sentence Text: Piping between storage tanks located on shore and dispensers at a marine fuel-dispensing station shall conform to part 4., except that where dispensing is from a floating structure, it is permitted to use suitable lengths of flexible hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice between the piping on shore and the piping on the floating structure. (See Note A-4.8.8.1.(1)(a).)

National Sentence Text: A membrane providing the level of impermeability required in Clause 4.3.7.2.(1)(b) shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S668-12 Liners Used for Secondary Containment of Aboveground Flammable and Combustible Liquid Tanks and if it is combustible, be covered with a noncombustible material that will prevent the membrane from failing in the event that the secondary containment is exposed to fire.
P/T Sentence Text: A membrane providing the level of impermeability required in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(1) shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S668-12 Liners Used for Secondary Containment of Aboveground Flammable and Combustible Liquid Tanks and if it is combustible, be covered with a noncombustible material that will prevent the membrane from failing in the event that the secondary containment is exposed to fire.

National Sentence Text: Investigative action shall be undertaken if the inventory reconciliation described in Sentence 4.4.2.1.(2) indicates the following inexplicable conditions: a monthly loss of 0.5 percent or more of the throughput from an underground storage tank, or 1.0 percent or more of the throughput from an aboveground storage tank, three consecutive losses greater than 200 L/day, and a water level greater than 50 mm.
P/T Sentence Text: Investigative action shall be undertaken if the inventory reconciliation described in Sentence 4.4.2.1.(2) indicates the following inexplicable conditions: a monthly loss of 0.5 percent or more of the throughput from an underground storage tank, or 1.0 percent or more of the throughput from an aboveground storage tank, three consecutive losses greater than 200 L/day, and a water level greater than 50 mm.

National Sentence Text: Individual storage areas used for the storage of dangerous goodsand laboratories where dangerous goods are used shall be clearly designated as such by posted placards conforming to TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) and Sentences 3.2.7.14.(2)to 3.2.7.14.(4). National Sentence Text: An individual storage area for dangerous goods shall not be greater than 1 000 m2.

National Sentence Text: Ventilation referred to in Clause 4.1.7.2.(1)(b) need not be provided for the storage of Class I liquids if storage consists of only closed containers, and no dispensing operations are performed.
P/T Sentence Text: Ventilation referred to in Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1) need not be provided for the storage of Class I liquids if storage consists of only closed containers, and no dispensing operations are performed.

National Sentence Text: Globe valves shall be arranged so that the packing is on the low pressure side.
P/T Sentence Text: Globe valves shall be arranged so that the packing is on the low pressure side.

National Sentence Text: Supports, foundations and anchorage of storage tanks shall comply with Subsection 4.3.3., except that timber supports shall be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Supports, foundations and anchorage of storage tanks shall comply with part 4., except that timber supports shall be permitted.

National Sentence Text: The pressurized core shall be tested at or near grade in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the pressurized core to the outdoors on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: The pressurized core shall be tested at or near grade in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the pressurized core to the outdoors on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Where piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids is installed within a building, the length of piping shall be as direct and as short as practicable.
P/T Sentence Text: Where piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids is installed within a building, the length of piping shall be as direct and as short as practicable.

National Sentence Text: Gaskets shall be used in all hose joints and pipe couplings to prevent leakage.
P/T Sentence Text: Gaskets shall be used in all hose joints and pipe couplings to prevent leakage.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.5.3.(2), cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as flammable or toxic gases that are stored outdoors shall be not less than 1.5 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is not more than 170 m3, 7.5 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is more than 170 m3 but less than 500 m3, and 15 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is 500 m3 or more. (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.5.3.(2), cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as flammable or toxic gases that are stored outdoors shall be not less than 1.5 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is not more than 170 m3, 7.5 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is more than 170 m3 but less than 500 m3, and 15 m from any building opening, if the aggregate capacity of expanded gas is 500 m3 or more.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.8.2.(2)and 4.2.8.2.(3) and in Article 4.2.8.4., the quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted to be located outside of storage rooms conforming to Subsections 4.2.7., 4.2.9.or 4.3.14., or storage cabinets conforming to Subsection 4.2.10., in any one fire compartment of a building, shall not be more than 600 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in closed containers, of which not more than 100 L shall be Class IA liquids, and 5 000 L of Class IB, IC, II and IIIA liquids in storage tanks or portable tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.8.2.(2)and 4.2.8.2.(3) and in Article 4.2.8.4., the quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids permitted to be located outside of storage rooms conforming to Subsections 4., 4.or 4., or storage cabinets conforming to part 4., in any one fire compartment of a building, shall not be more than 600 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in closed containers, of which not more than 100 L shall be Class IA liquids, and 5 000 L of Class IB, IC, II and IIIA liquids in storage tanks or portable tanks.

National Sentence Text: The clearances required in Sentence 4.2.11.1.(1) do not apply where not more than 5 000 L of flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored adjacent to a building on the same property, provided that either the building is limited to 1 storey in building height and is used primarily for the storage or handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, or the exposed wall has a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h and has no openings within 3 m of such outdoor storage.
P/T Sentence Text: The clearances required in Sentence 4.2.11.1.(1) do not apply where not more than 5 000 L of flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored adjacent to a building on the same property, provided that either the building is limited to 1 storey in building height and is used primarily for the storage or handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, or the exposed wall has a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h and has no openings within 3 m of such outdoor storage.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks are permitted to be buried in piers and wharves of the solid-fill type provided they conform to Subsections 4.3.8.to 4.3.12.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks are permitted to be buried in piers and wharves of the solid-fill type provided they conform to Subsections 4.to 4.

National Sentence Text: Equipment required to have a dust-collecting system shall be interlocked to prevent it from operating if the dust-collecting system is not in operation.
P/T Sentence Text: Equipment required to have a dust-collecting system shall be interlocked to prevent it from operating if the dust-collecting system is not in operation.

National Sentence Text: Operations or machines that generate sparks or combustible vapours shall not be served by exhaust systems connected to woodworking machines referred to in Sentence 5.3.2.1.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Operations or machines that generate sparks or combustible vapours shall not be served by exhaust systems connected to woodworking machines referred to in Sentence 5.3.2.1.(1).

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan for a building or facility within the scope of Sections 3.1., 4.1., and 5.1. shall be kept at the principal entrance to the building or facility.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire safety plan for a building or facility within the scope of Sections 3., 4., and 5. shall be kept at the principal entrance to the building or facility.

National Sentence Text: Windows and panels provided for venting floor areas shall be maintained so as to be openable without the use of keys.
P/T Sentence Text: Windows and panels provided for venting floor areas shall be maintained so as to be openable without the use of keys.

National Sentence Text: A voice communication system or systems integrated with the general fire alarm system shall be provided in buildings as specified in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: A voice communication system or systems integrated with the general fire alarm system shall be provided in buildings as specified in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Identification tags or labels of metal or other material impervious to water and to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids being transferred shall be attached to and maintained on all pipelines and control valves to designate their use.
P/T Sentence Text: Identification tags or labels of metal or other material impervious to water and to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids being transferred shall be attached to and maintained on all pipelines and control valves to designate their use.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.8.7.3.(2), hose connections on piping shall be of the bolted flange type, and all such connections shall be provided with shut-off valves.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.8.7.3.(2), hose connections on piping shall be of the bolted flange type, and all such connections shall be provided with shut-off valves.

National Sentence Text: A clearance of not less than 3 m shall be maintained between containers used for the disposal of combustible refuse and exits.
P/T Sentence Text: A clearance of not less than 3 m shall be maintained between containers used for the disposal of combustible refuse and exits.

National Sentence Text: Where storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are installed inside buildings, tanks, piping and discharge equipment shall be bonded and grounded.
P/T Sentence Text: Where storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are installed inside buildings, tanks, piping and discharge equipment shall be bonded and grounded.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.6.5.2.(3)to 4.6.5.2.(5), a hose nozzle valve shall be constructed so that the valve can be kept open only by the continuous application of manual pressure, or is equipped with a hold-open device that is an integral part of the nozzle and that will allow automatic dispensing, automatically shut off when the vehicle tank is filled, and shut off if the nozzle is dropped or falls from the fill pipe.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to baking and drying processes during which flammable vapours are given off by the products being baked or dried.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to baking and drying processes during which flammable vapours are given off by the products being baked or dried.

National Sentence Text: Chain link fencing referred to in Sentence 3.2.5.6.(1) shall be not lighter than 2.9 mm steel wire woven into a 50 mm diamond mesh.
P/T Sentence Text: Chain link fencing referred to in Sentence 3.2.5.6.(1) shall be not lighter than 2.9 mm steel wire woven into a 50 mm diamond mesh.

National Sentence Text: Only trained and authorized personnel shall be permitted to operate industrial trucks, replace or refuel propane cylinders for fuel-fired industrial trucks, refuel fuel-fired industrial trucks, or charge batteries for battery-powered industrial trucks.
P/T Sentence Text: Only trained and authorized personnel shall be permitted to operate industrial trucks, replace or refuel propane cylinders for fuel-fired industrial trucks, refuel fuel-fired industrial trucks, or charge batteries for battery-powered industrial trucks.

National Sentence Text: Helicopter landing areas on roofs shall be constructed in conformance with the requirements for heliports contained in TC SOR/96-433 Canadian Aviation Regulations – Part III
P/T Sentence Text: Helicopter landing areas on roofs shall be constructed in conformance with the requirements for heliports contained in TC SOR/96-433 Canadian Aviation Regulations – Part III

National Sentence Text: Normal vent pipe outlets for storage tanks of Class I liquids shall be located outside buildings not less than 3.5 m above the adjacent ground level, and 1.5 m from any building opening, and shall discharge so that flammable vapours will not enter the building or be trapped near any part of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Normal vent pipe outlets for storage tanks of Class I liquids shall be located outside buildings not less than 3.5 m above the adjacent ground level, and 1.5 m from any building opening, and shall discharge so that flammable vapours will not enter the building or be trapped near any part of the building.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers for Class B fires shall be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers for Class B fires shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: Where refrigerators are used to store Class I liquids, they shall be designed so that electrical equipment located within the storage compartment, within the outer shell, on the door and on the door frame of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 0 or 1 hazardous locations based on the frequency of occurrence and duration of an explosive gaseous atmosphere, and electrical equipment mounted on the outside surface of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 2 hazardous locations, or located above the top of the storage compartment.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where refrigerators are used to store Class I liquids, they shall be designed so that electrical equipment located within the storage compartment, within the outer shell, on the door and on the door frame of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 0 or 1 hazardous locations based on the frequency of occurrence and duration of an explosive gaseous atmosphere, and electrical equipment mounted on the outside surface of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 2 hazardous locations, or located above the top of the storage compartment.
P/T Sentence Text: Where refrigerators are used to store Class I liquids, they shall be designed so that electrical equipment located within the storage compartment, within the outer shell, on the door and on the door frame of the refrigerator is in conformance with the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation requirments for Class I, Zone 0 or 1 hazardous locations based on the frequency of occurrence and duration of an explosive gaseous atmosphere, and electrical equipment mounted on the outside surface of the refrigerator is in conformance with the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation requirements for Class I, Zone 2 hazardous locations, or located above the top of the storage compartment in an ordinary location and installed in conformance with the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation.
