National Sentence Text: Vestibules and areas of refuge shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the areas of refuge or vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Vestibules and areas of refuge shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the areas of refuge or vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall not be located above roofs except above roofs of impermeable and noncombustible construction, with provision for accidental spillage provided in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall not be located above roofs except above roofs of impermeable and noncombustible construction, with provision for accidental spillage provided in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: A watch, with tours at intervals of not more than 1 h, shall be provided throughout demolition sites when there are occupants in the portion of the building not being demolished.
P/T Sentence Text: A watch, with tours at intervals of not more than 1 h, shall be provided throughout demolition sites when there are occupants in the portion of the building not being demolished.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with Part 4. and in areas inaccessible to children.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be stored in conformance with part 4. and in areas inaccessible to children.

National Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be separated by a horizontal distance of not less than 600 mm from adjacent underground tanks or structures, 1 m from a building foundation or a street line, and 1.5 m from other property lines.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be separated by a horizontal distance of not less than 600 mm from adjacent underground tanks or structures, 1 m from a building foundation or a street line, and 1.5 m from other property lines.

National Sentence Text: Where continuous mechanical ventilation is installed in order to meet the conditions of Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1), it shall be provided with automatic interlocks so that the activity generating flammable vapours cannot be performed when the ventilation system is not in operation, sound an audible alarm in an attended area upon shut-down of the ventilation system, and conform to NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids
P/T Sentence Text: Where continuous mechanical ventilation is installed in order to meet the conditions of Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1), it shall be provided with automatic interlocks so that the activity generating flammable vapours cannot be performed when the ventilation system is not in operation, sound an audible alarm in an attended area upon shut-down of the ventilation system, and conform to NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Section, hot works described in Sentence 5.2.1.1.(1) shall conform to CSA W117.2-12 Safety in Welding, Cutting and Allied Processes
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Section, hot works described in Sentence 5.2.1.1.(1) shall conform to CSA W117.2-12 Safety in Welding, Cutting and Allied Processes

National Sentence Text: Access panels or windows provided to facilitate access for firefighting operations shall be maintained free of obstruction.
P/T Sentence Text: Access panels or windows provided to facilitate access for firefighting operations shall be maintained free of obstruction.

National Sentence Text: Except for portable fire extinguishers, cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall not be stored in any exit or corridor providing access to exits, under any fire escape, outside exit stair, passage or ramp, or within 1 m of any exit. (See Note A-3.1.2.6.)
P/T Sentence Text: Except for portable fire extinguishers, cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall not be stored in any exit or corridor providing access to exits, under any fire escape, outside exit stair, passage or ramp, or within 1 m of any exit.

National Sentence Text: Tests shall be conducted by an individual who has been trained in the proper use of the test device and the operating procedures.
P/T Sentence Text: Tests shall be conducted by an individual who has been trained in the proper use of the test device and the operating procedures.

National Sentence Text: Operating and maintenance instructions for a special fire suppression system shall be posted in proximity to the equipment and, if manual controls are provided, shall be posted near the manual controls.
P/T Sentence Text: Operating and maintenance instructions for a special fire suppression system shall be posted in proximity to the equipment and, if manual controls are provided, shall be posted near the manual controls.

National Sentence Text: Except as otherwise required by this Code, portable extinguishers shall be selected and installed in accordance with NFPA 10-2013 Portable Fire Extinguishers
P/T Sentence Text: Except as otherwise required by this Code, portable extinguishers shall be selected and installed in accordance with NFPA 10-2013 Portable Fire Extinguishers

National Sentence Text: Closed drainage systems shall be equipped with a trap. (See Note A-4.1.6.2.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Closed drainage systems shall be equipped with a trap. (See Note A-4.1.6.2.(2).)

National Sentence Text: This Part includes requirements for the inspection, testing, maintenance, and operation of portable extinguishers, water-based fire protection systems, special extinguishing systems, fire alarm systems, emergency electrical power supply systems, emergency lighting, and exit signs.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part includes requirements for the inspection, testing, maintenance, and operation of portable extinguishers, water-based fire protection systems, special extinguishing systems, fire alarm systems, emergency electrical power supply systems, emergency lighting, and exit signs.

National Sentence Text: The individual capacity of outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations is permitted to exceed the individual capacity limit of 80 000 L required in Sentence 4.6.2.1.(2), provided they conform to ULC ULC-S655-98 Aboveground Protected Tank Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids and their aggregate capacity does not exceed 200 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: The individual capacity of outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations is permitted to exceed the individual capacity limit of 80 000 L required in Sentence 4.6.2.1.(2), provided they conform to ULC ULC-S655-98 Aboveground Protected Tank Assemblies for Flammable and Combustible Liquids and their aggregate capacity does not exceed 200 000 L.

National Sentence Text: When air exhausted by a dust collector described in this Article is returned to a building, the dust-collecting system shall be designed so that returned air will not create an explosion hazard inside the building, and the exhaust fan and ancillary equipment are automatically shut down in the event of a fire or an explosion inside the dust collector.
P/T Sentence Text: When air exhausted by a dust collector described in this Article is returned to a building, the dust-collecting system shall be designed so that returned air will not create an explosion hazard inside the building, and the exhaust fan and ancillary equipment are automatically shut down in the event of a fire or an explosion inside the dust collector.

National Sentence Text: When the products stored include Group A plastics, rubber products, Level 2 or 3 aerosols, or dangerous goods, the fire safety plan shall identify the location and maximum quantity of product that is being stored.
P/T Sentence Text: When the products stored include Group A plastics, rubber products, Level 2 or 3 aerosols, or dangerous goods, the fire safety plan shall identify the location and maximum quantity of product that is being stored.

National Sentence Text: When a liquid having a flash point at or above 37.8°C is being processed, stored, handled or used at a temperature at or above its flash point, it shall be treated as a Class I liquid. (See Note A-4.1.2.3.)
P/T Sentence Text: When a liquid having a flash point at or above 37.8°C is being processed, stored, handled or used at a temperature at or above its flash point, it shall be treated as a Class I liquid.

National Sentence Text: Required aisles and other access paths shall be maintained to permit the unobstructed movement of personnel and fire department apparatus so that firefighting operations can be carried out in any part of an area used for the storage, use or handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Required aisles and other access paths shall be maintained to permit the unobstructed movement of personnel and fire department apparatus so that firefighting operations can be carried out in any part of an area used for the storage, use or handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(6), where steel piping is used, it shall conform to API 5L-2012 Line Pipe ASTM A 53/A 53M-12 Pipe, Steel, Black and Hot-Dipped, Zinc-Coated, Welded and Seamless or CSA Z245.1-14 Steel Pipe
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(6), where steel piping is used, it shall conform to API 5L-2012 Line Pipe ASTM A 53/A 53M-12 Pipe, Steel, Black and Hot-Dipped, Zinc-Coated, Welded and Seamless or CSA Z245.1-14 Steel Pipe

National Sentence Text: An emergency valve conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S651-16 Emergency Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids shall be installed in the supply line so that the shear point of the valve is at a level not higher than the base of the dispenser nor more than 25 mm below it.
P/T Sentence Text: An emergency valve conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S651-16 Emergency Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids shall be installed in the supply line so that the shear point of the valve is at a level not higher than the base of the dispenser nor more than 25 mm below it.

National Sentence Text: Hot work shall not be performed on a totally enclosed container.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot work shall not be performed on a totally enclosed container.

National Sentence Text: Access openings through barricades shall be equipped with gates, which shall be kept closed and locked when the site is unattended, and maintained in place until completion of the construction or demolition activity.
P/T Sentence Text: Access openings through barricades shall be equipped with gates, which shall be kept closed and locked when the site is unattended, and maintained in place until completion of the construction or demolition activity.

National Sentence Text: This Part provides for the safety of the occupants in existing buildings, the elimination or control of fire hazards in and around buildings, the installation and maintenance of certain life safety systems in buildings, the installation and maintenance of posted signs and information, and the establishing of a fire safety plan in those occupancies where it is considered necessary.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part provides for the safety of the occupants in existing buildings, the elimination or control of fire hazards in and around buildings, the installation and maintenance of certain life safety systems in buildings, the installation and maintenance of posted signs and information, and the establishing of a fire safety plan in those occupancies where it is considered necessary.

National Sentence Text: Aboveground piping systems shall be supported such that they are not in direct contact with the surface of the ground.
P/T Sentence Text: Aboveground piping systems shall be supported such that they are not in direct contact with the surface of the ground.

National Sentence Text: Piping supports shall consist of wood having no dimension less than 150 mm, steel, or concrete.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping supports shall consist of wood having no dimension less than 150 mm, steel, or concrete.

National Sentence Text: Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small scale unit chemical processes occur shall conform to Article 3.3.6.8. of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small scale unit chemical processes occur shall conform to Article 3.3.6.8. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small scale unit chemical processes occur shall conform to Article 3.3.6.8. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small scale unit chemical processes occur shall conform to Article 3.3.6.8. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Cargo pumps capable of producing pressures in excess of the safe working pressure of the cargo hose shall be provided with pressure relief devices such as return lines or relief valves.
P/T Sentence Text: Cargo pumps capable of producing pressures in excess of the safe working pressure of the cargo hose shall be provided with pressure relief devices such as return lines or relief valves.

National Sentence Text: A storage tank that has been taken out of service shall not be reused for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids unless it has been refurbished so as to conform to one of the standards listed in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), or refurbished in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.10.(2)or 4.3.1.10.(3).
P/T Sentence Text: A storage tank that has been taken out of service shall not be reused for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids unless it has been refurbished so as to conform to one of the standards listed in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), or refurbished in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.10.(2)or 4.3.1.10.(3).

National Sentence Text: Every hose nozzle valve shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S620-16 Hose Nozzle Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Every hose nozzle valve shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S620-16 Hose Nozzle Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: All mechanical systems, electric motors and other equipment that might be a source of ignition shall be shut down, and smoking and the use of open flames shall be prohibited during the application of Class I liquids and for at least 1 h after such application.
P/T Sentence Text: All mechanical systems, electric motors and other equipment that might be a source of ignition shall be shut down, and smoking and the use of open flames shall be prohibited during the application of Class I liquids and for at least 1 h after such application.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.6.5.(2), tanks and pumps not integral with the dispenser at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be located on the shore or on a pier of the solid-fill type.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.6.5.(2), tanks and pumps not integral with the dispenser at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be located on the shore or on a pier of the solid-fill type.

National Sentence Text: Valves installed to control the filling of tank vehicles or tank cars shall be of the self-closing type.
P/T Sentence Text: Valves installed to control the filling of tank vehicles or tank cars shall be of the self-closing type.

National Sentence Text: Where baled raw pulp is stored in an unsprinklered building, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 500 m2, and the maximum height of storage shall be 6 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Where baled raw pulp is stored in an unsprinklered building, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 500 m2, and the maximum height of storage shall be 6 m.

National Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank containing boil-over liquids shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances 0.75 times those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection referred to in Clause 4.3.2.1.(4)(a) is not provided. (See Note A-4.3.2.1.(4).)
P/T Sentence Text: Every aboveground storage tank containing boil-over liquids shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances 0.75 times those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection referred to in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(4) is not provided.

National Sentence Text: A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the NBC. (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the NBC. (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the BCBC. (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the BCBC. (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to prevent or minimize corrosion or deterioration of shelving, racks, and piping system components due to contact with stored dangerous goods.
P/T Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to prevent or minimize corrosion or deterioration of shelving, racks, and piping system components due to contact with stored dangerous goods.

National Sentence Text: When Class I liquids are dispensed from or into a container or a storage tank, all metallic or electrically conducting material in the transfer system shall be electrically bonded and grounded, or if the container or tank is made of non-electrically conducting material, measures shall be taken to minimize the potential for static electric charge to develop (see Note A-4.1.8.2.(1)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: When Class I liquids are dispensed from or into a container or a storage tank, all metallic or electrically conducting material in the transfer system shall be electrically bonded and grounded, or if the container or tank is made of non-electrically conducting material, measures shall be taken to minimize the potential for static electric charge to develop (see Note A-4.1.8.2.(1)(b)).

National Sentence Text: Where indoor piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids is installed in trenches, a trapped drainage system shall be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Where indoor piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids is installed in trenches, a trapped drainage system shall be provided.

National Sentence Text: A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the NBC, but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the NBC, but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
P/T Sentence Text: A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the British Columbia Building Code, but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the British Columbia Building Code, but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

National Sentence Text: Each connection to an aboveground storage tank through which the liquid can normally flow shall be provided with an internal or external shut-off valve located as close as practical to the shell of the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Each connection to an aboveground storage tank through which the liquid can normally flow shall be provided with an internal or external shut-off valve located as close as practical to the shell of the tank.

National Sentence Text: When aboveground storage tanks are located in an area that is subject to flooding, the tanks shall be securely anchored to prevent floating.
P/T Sentence Text: When aboveground storage tanks are located in an area that is subject to flooding, the tanks shall be securely anchored to prevent floating.

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials, other than those for which the location, room or space is designed, shall not be permitted to accumulate in any part of an elevator shaft, ventilation shaft, means of egress, service room or service space. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials, other than those for which the location, room or space is designed, shall not be permitted to accumulate in any part of an elevator shaft, ventilation shaft, means of egress, service room or service space. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(2).)

National Sentence Text: The contents of flammable liquid and combustible liquid storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be arranged to provide aisle widths of not less than 1 m.
P/T Sentence Text: The contents of flammable liquid and combustible liquid storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be arranged to provide aisle widths of not less than 1 m.

National Sentence Text: Piping passing though the secondary containment walls of an aboveground storage tank shall be designed to prevent excessive stress resulting from settlement or fire exposure.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping passing though the secondary containment walls of an aboveground storage tank shall be designed to prevent excessive stress resulting from settlement or fire exposure.

National Sentence Text: Hot works shall be performed only by personnel trained in the safe use of equipment in conformance with this Section.
P/T Sentence Text: Hot works shall be performed only by personnel trained in the safe use of equipment in conformance with this Section.

National Sentence Text: Where the sprinkler system required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1) does not conform to Sentence 3.2.5.5.(1), the storage of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosol products shall conform to Table 3.2.5.4. for unsprinklered buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the sprinkler system required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1) does not conform to Sentence 3.2.5.5.(1), the storage of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosol products shall conform to Table 3.2.5.4. for unsprinklered buildings.

National Sentence Text: In unsprinklered buildings, a clearance of not less than 1 m between the top of storage and the underside of the floor or roof deck shall be maintained. (See Note A-3.2.2.3.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: In unsprinklered buildings, a clearance of not less than 1 m between the top of storage and the underside of the floor or roof deck shall be maintained. (See Note A-3.2.2.3.(2).)

National Sentence Text: The storage of packaged Level 2 and 3 aerosol products shall conform to Table 3.2.5.4. and Articles 3.2.5.5.to 3.2.5.8.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage of packaged Level 2 and 3 aerosol products shall conform to Table 3.2.5.4. and Articles 3.2.5.5.to 3.2.5.8.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.5.1.(1), this Part applies to the storage of combustible products and dangerous goods, both inside and outside of buildings. (See Note A-3.1.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.5.1.(1), this Part applies to the storage of combustible products and dangerous goods, both inside and outside of buildings. (See Note A-3.1.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The piping system shall be considered to be leaking if the leak rate exceeds 0.38 L/h.
P/T Sentence Text: The piping system shall be considered to be leaking if the leak rate exceeds 0.38 L/h.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements in this Part, the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in laboratories shall be in conformance with Section 5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements in this Part, the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in laboratories shall be in conformance with part 5.

National Sentence Text: Mechanical connections in underground piping systems shall be readily accessible for inspection and maintenance, not be in direct contact with the soil, and be provided within a transition sump.
P/T Sentence Text: Mechanical connections in underground piping systems shall be readily accessible for inspection and maintenance, not be in direct contact with the soil, and be provided within a transition sump.

National Sentence Text: Welding of piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall conform to Section 5.2. and to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such regulations, to API 1104-2013 Welding of Pipelines and Related Facilities
P/T Sentence Text: Welding of piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall conform to part 5. and to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such regulations, to API 1104-2013 Welding of Pipelines and Related Facilities

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(2) and in addition to the device required by Sentence 4.6.4.1.(1), an emergency shut-off switch to simultaneously stop the flow of fuel at all dispensers at self-service outlets shall be located at the central control console described in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(2) so that it is readily accessible to the attendant.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(2) and in addition to the device required by Sentence 4.6.4.1.(1), an emergency shut-off switch to simultaneously stop the flow of fuel at all dispensers at self-service outlets shall be located at the central control console described in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(2) so that it is readily accessible to the attendant.

National Sentence Text: Bonding wires for tank vehicles shall be provided with a pull-off connector attached so as to be in electrical contact with the cargo tank of the tank vehicle.
P/T Sentence Text: Bonding wires for tank vehicles shall be provided with a pull-off connector attached so as to be in electrical contact with the cargo tank of the tank vehicle.

National Sentence Text: Belt conveyors and bucket elevator legs shall be equipped with safety devices to detect excessive misalignment, blockage, slipping or slow-down of the conveying equipment, and prevent conditions described in Clause 5.3.3.2.(1)(a) from creating a fire or explosion hazard by alerting personnel trained in taking appropriate actions, or automatically stopping the conveying equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Belt conveyors and bucket elevator legs shall be equipped with safety devices to detect excessive misalignment, blockage, slipping or slow-down of the conveying equipment, and prevent conditions described in Sentence 5.3.3.2.(1) from creating a fire or explosion hazard by alerting personnel trained in taking appropriate actions, or automatically stopping the conveying equipment.

National Sentence Text: When the secondary containment is designed to prevent the entry of precipitation and water used for firefighting purposes into the contained space, it shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space.
P/T Sentence Text: When the secondary containment is designed to prevent the entry of precipitation and water used for firefighting purposes into the contained space, it shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 2.3.2.3.(3), bed linen, window drapes and cubicle curtains shall conform to CGSB CAN/CGSB-4.162-M80 Hospital Textiles – Flammability Performance Requirements if used in Group B, Division 2 treatment occupancies, and Group B, Division 3 care occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 2.3.2.3.(3), bed linen, window drapes and cubicle curtains shall conform to CGSB CAN/CGSB-4.162-M80 Hospital Textiles – Flammability Performance Requirements if used in Group B, Division 2 treatment occupancies, and Group B, Division 3 care occupancies.

National Sentence Text: The clearance between the top of storage and the lowest structural members shall not be less than 450 mm.
P/T Sentence Text: The clearance between the top of storage and the lowest structural members shall not be less than 450 mm.

National Sentence Text: Used rags and similar materials contaminated with flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Article 2.4.1.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Used rags and similar materials contaminated with flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Article 2.4.1.3.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets required in this Part shall be in closed containers conforming to Article 4.2.3.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets required in this Part shall be in closed containers conforming to Article 4.2.3.1.

National Sentence Text: Pumps located indoors shall be in rooms built in conformance with Subsection 4.2.9. (See Note A-4.5.9.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps located indoors shall be in rooms built in conformance with part 4. (See Note A-4.5.9.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Cargo shall not be transferred to or from the tank of a marine vessel unless sufficient personnel are on board to control the operation.
P/T Sentence Text: Cargo shall not be transferred to or from the tank of a marine vessel unless sufficient personnel are on board to control the operation.

National Sentence Text: Where protection is not provided against fires or explosions in processing equipment, the distances in Sentences 4.9.2.1.(2)and 4.9.2.1.(3) shall be doubled. (See Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where protection is not provided against fires or explosions in processing equipment, the distances in Sentences 4.9.2.1.(2)and 4.9.2.1.(3) shall be doubled. (See Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2).)

National Sentence Text: An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC.)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC.)
P/T Sentence Text: An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7.(1) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7.(1) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.)

National Sentence Text: A drainage system referred to in Clause 4.1.6.1.(1)(b) shall terminate at a location where such spill will not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety, and direct the spill away from the areas identified in Sentence 4.1.6.1.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: A drainage system referred to in Sentence 4.1.6.1.(1) shall terminate at a location where such spill will not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety, and direct the spill away from the areas identified in Sentence 4.1.6.1.(4).

National Sentence Text: When a storage cabinet required in this Part is provided with ventilation openings, the ventilation openings shall be sealed with materials providing a fire protection at least equivalent to that required for the construction of the cabinet, or the cabinet shall be vented outdoors using vent piping providing a fire protection at least equivalent to that required in Clause 4.2.10.6.(1)(a) for seals.
P/T Sentence Text: When a storage cabinet required in this Part is provided with ventilation openings, the ventilation openings shall be sealed with materials providing a fire protection at least equivalent to that required for the construction of the cabinet, or the cabinet shall be vented outdoors using vent piping providing a fire protection at least equivalent to that required in Sentence 4.2.10.6.(1) for seals.

National Sentence Text: A pressure regulator shall be provided in the steam line with a relief valve on the downstream side of the regulator.
P/T Sentence Text: A pressure regulator shall be provided in the steam line with a relief valve on the downstream side of the regulator.

National Sentence Text: The ventilation systems serving a laboratory shall be inspected and cleaned to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits, and the intervals between inspections shall be not greater than 12 months for the ventilation systems of the laboratory and dangerous goods storage areas, and 6 months for the ventilation system of a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2.
P/T Sentence Text: The ventilation systems serving a laboratory shall be inspected and cleaned to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits, and the intervals between inspections shall be not greater than 12 months for the ventilation systems of the laboratory and dangerous goods storage areas, and 6 months for the ventilation system of a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the other requirements of this Code, portable extinguishers shall be provided in unobstructed and easily accessible locations in any areas where hot work operations are carried out, where combustibles are stored, near or on any internal combustion engines, where flammable liquids and combustible liquids or gases are stored or handled, where temporary fuel-fired equipment is used, or that are designated for smoking.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the other requirements of this Code, portable extinguishers shall be provided in unobstructed and easily accessible locations in any areas where hot work operations are carried out, where combustibles are stored, near or on any internal combustion engines, where flammable liquids and combustible liquids or gases are stored or handled, where temporary fuel-fired equipment is used, or that are designated for smoking.

National Sentence Text: Dispensers used by the general public to dispense flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tanks of vehicles shall not be located at a bulk plant unless separated by a fence or equivalent barrier from the area in which the bulk storage operations are conducted.
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensers used by the general public to dispense flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tanks of vehicles shall not be located at a bulk plant unless separated by a fence or equivalent barrier from the area in which the bulk storage operations are conducted.

National Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred from or into railway tank cars, the railway tracks shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with TC SOR/82-1015 Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations
P/T Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred from or into railway tank cars, the railway tracks shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with TC SOR/82-1015 Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations

National Sentence Text: Where practicable, valves referred to in Sentence 4.5.7.2.(1) shall be located outdoors or be immediately accessible from outdoors.
P/T Sentence Text: Where practicable, valves referred to in Sentence 4.5.7.2.(1) shall be located outdoors or be immediately accessible from outdoors.

National Sentence Text: Where the fill point is below the normal liquid level in the storage tank, the fill line shall be equipped with a manual or automatic valve located at the fill point to prevent spillage when the fill cap is removed, and if the storage tank contains flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the fill line drop tube shall be equipped with a method to prevent siphoning of the tank's content should a leak occur in the fill line.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the fill point is below the normal liquid level in the storage tank, the fill line shall be equipped with a manual or automatic valve located at the fill point to prevent spillage when the fill cap is removed, and if the storage tank contains flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the fill line drop tube shall be equipped with a method to prevent siphoning of the tank's content should a leak occur in the fill line.

National Sentence Text: Placards conforming to Article 3.2.7.14., identifying the liquids stored as flammable liquids or combustible liquids and the capacities of the storage tanks, shall be posted in a conspicuous location outside of the room, and that information shall be included in the fire safety plan required in Article 4.1.5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Placards conforming to Article 3.2.7.14., identifying the liquids stored as flammable liquids or combustible liquids and the capacities of the storage tanks, shall be posted in a conspicuous location outside of the room, and that information shall be included in the fire safety plan required in Article 4.1.5.5.

National Sentence Text: Where the total storage area exceeds 6 000 m2, the access route required in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(1) shall be connected with a public thoroughfare in at least 2 locations.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the total storage area exceeds 6 000 m2, the access route required in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(1) shall be connected with a public thoroughfare in at least 2 locations.

National Sentence Text: Rising stem or other indicating valves shall be used where necessary to determine whether the valves are open or shut.
P/T Sentence Text: Rising stem or other indicating valves shall be used where necessary to determine whether the valves are open or shut.

National Sentence Text: Instructions for the operation of dispensers in self-service outlets shall be posted in a conspicuous location.
P/T Sentence Text: Instructions for the operation of dispensers in self-service outlets shall be posted in a conspicuous location.

National Sentence Text: Controls for air-handling systems used for venting in the event of a fire shall be tested to ensure that air is exhausted from each floor area to the outdoors as required in Chapter 3, Sentence (8) of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)
P/T Sentence Text: Controls for air-handling systems used for venting in the event of a fire shall be tested to ensure that air is exhausted from each floor area to the outdoors as required in Chapter 3, Sentence (8) of Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)

National Sentence Text: Each connection to an aboveground storage tank that is below the liquid level and through which liquid does not normally flow shall be provided with a liquid-tight closing device.
P/T Sentence Text: Each connection to an aboveground storage tank that is below the liquid level and through which liquid does not normally flow shall be provided with a liquid-tight closing device.

National Sentence Text: Fill piping and discharge piping shall enter underground storage tanks only through the top of the tank and discharge piping used in suction systems shall be sloped toward the storage tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Fill piping and discharge piping shall enter underground storage tanks only through the top of the tank and discharge piping used in suction systems shall be sloped toward the storage tanks.

National Sentence Text: The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Damaged or leaking packages or containers of dangerous goods shall be moved to a safe location and the product repackaged and labelled as soon as possible.
P/T Sentence Text: Damaged or leaking packages or containers of dangerous goods shall be moved to a safe location and the product repackaged and labelled as soon as possible.

National Sentence Text: This Part applies to all buildings and facilities covered in this Code. (See Article 1.1.1.1..)
P/T Sentence Text: This Part applies to all buildings and facilities covered in this Code. (See Article 1.1.1.1..)

National Sentence Text: All piping, valves and fittings at a fuel-dispensing station shall be protected against corrosion in conformance with Article 4.5.3.1.
P/T Sentence Text: All piping, valves and fittings at a fuel-dispensing station shall be protected against corrosion in conformance with Article 4.5.3.1.

National Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks that are fuelled by replaceable propane cylinders are permitted to have their cylinders replaced indoors provided cylinder replacement is done at a safe location that is at least 7.5 m from ignition sources, open pits and underground entrances, the cylinders’ valves are closed, when an automatic quick-closing coupling that closes in both directions when uncoupled is not provided, the engine is operated until the fuel in the system is consumed, and spare propane cylinders are stored in conformance with Subsection 3.3.5.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Fuel-fired industrial trucks that are fuelled by replaceable propane cylinders are permitted to have their cylinders replaced indoors provided cylinder replacement is done at a safe location that is at least 7.5 m from ignition sources, open pits and underground entrances, the cylinders valves are closed, when an automatic quick-closing coupling that closes in both directions when uncoupled is not provided, the engine is operated until the fuel in the system is consumed, and spare propane cylinders are stored in conformance with part 3.
P/T Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks that are fuelled by replaceable propane cylinders are permitted to have their cylinders replaced indoors provided cylinder replacement is done at a safe location that is at least 7.5 m from ignition sources, open pits and underground entrances, the cylinders’ valves are closed, when an automatic quick-closing coupling that closes in both directions when uncoupled is not provided, the engine is operated until the fuel in the system is consumed, and spare propane cylinders are stored in conformance with part 3. and the British Columbia Gas Safety Regulation.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Fuel-fired industrial trucks that are fuelled by replaceable propane cylinders are permitted to have their cylinders replaced indoors provided cylinder replacement is done at a safe location that is at least 7.5 m from ignition sources, open pits and underground entrances, the cylinders valves are closed, when an automatic quick-closing coupling that closes in both directions when uncoupled is not provided, the engine is operated until the fuel in the system is consumed, and spare propane cylinders are stored in conformance with part 3. and the British Columbia Gas Safety Regulation.

National Sentence Text: Every individual work area in business and personal services occupancies shall be located adjacent to an aisle or subsidiary aisle.
P/T Sentence Text: Every individual work area in business and personal services occupancies shall be located adjacent to an aisle or subsidiary aisle.

National Sentence Text: Storage tanks with an individual capacity exceeding 20 000 L that are used in conformance with Table 4.3.13.4.-B shall conform to Clause 4.3.1.2.(1)(l), and be monitored for leakage in conformance with Sentence 4.4.2.1.(7).
P/T Sentence Text: Storage tanks with an individual capacity exceeding 20 000 L that are used in conformance with Table 4.3.13.4.-B shall conform to Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), and be monitored for leakage in conformance with Sentence 4.4.2.1.(7).

National Sentence Text: Areas in which flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred from one container or storage tank to another, or where they are used in such a way as to release potentially explosive concentrations of flammable vapours, shall be separated from possible sources of ignition by a spatial separation of not less than 6 m, or by a fire separation. (See Note A-4.2.8.3.(1).) (See also Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Areas in which flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred from one container or storage tank to another, or where they are used in such a way as to release potentially explosive concentrations of flammable vapours, shall be separated from possible sources of ignition by a spatial separation of not less than 6 m, or by a fire separation. (See Note A-4.2.8.3.(1).) (See also Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in mercantile occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in mercantile occupancies.

National Sentence Text: All valves shall be closed and gas lines bled when hot work equipment using dangerous goods classified as compressed gases is not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: All valves shall be closed and gas lines bled when hot work equipment using dangerous goods classified as compressed gases is not in use.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Subsection 2.4.2., smoking shall not be permitted in an indoor storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in part 2., smoking shall not be permitted in an indoor storage area.

National Sentence Text: Dispensing systems for Class I liquids shall not be interconnected with dispensing systems for Class II and IIIA liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensing systems for Class I liquids shall not be interconnected with dispensing systems for Class II and IIIA liquids.

National Sentence Text: The termination of fixed piping for loading and unloading flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be not less than 60 m from a bridge or from an entrance to a tunnel.
P/T Sentence Text: The termination of fixed piping for loading and unloading flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be not less than 60 m from a bridge or from an entrance to a tunnel.

National Sentence Text: A control console shall be provided at self-service outlets within 25 m of all dispensers so that the attendant has an unobstructed view of all units at the same time.
P/T Sentence Text: A control console shall be provided at self-service outlets within 25 m of all dispensers so that the attendant has an unobstructed view of all units at the same time.

National Sentence Text: Drip pans shall be placed under hose connections on piers and wharves, except where a sump pit or settling basin is provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Drip pans shall be placed under hose connections on piers and wharves, except where a sump pit or settling basin is provided.

National Sentence Text: Hay, straw, shavings or similar combustible materials other than necessary for the daily feeding and care of animals shall not be permitted within a tent or air-supported structure used for an assembly occupancy, except that sawdust and shavings are permitted to be used if kept damp.
P/T Sentence Text: Hay, straw, shavings or similar combustible materials other than necessary for the daily feeding and care of animals shall not be permitted within a tent or air-supported structure used for an assembly occupancy, except that sawdust and shavings are permitted to be used if kept damp.

National Sentence Text: In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the NBC, and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
Matched National Sentence (Variation): In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the NBC, and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code, and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code, and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Where the diameter of a storage tank exceeds 45 m, the storage tank shall be provided with protection against fires or explosions in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Where the diameter of a storage tank exceeds 45 m, the storage tank shall be provided with protection against fires or explosions in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2).

National Sentence Text: In care, treatment or detention occupancies, the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet.
P/T Sentence Text: In care, treatment or detention occupancies, the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet.

National Sentence Text: A dust collector described in Sentence 5.3.1.4.(1) is permitted to be located inside a building if it is provided with explosion venting to the outdoors as specified in Clause 5.3.1.4.(1)(b), equipped with an automatic explosion prevention system, or located in a room with fire separations having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h and provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.
P/T Sentence Text: A dust collector described in Sentence 5.3.1.4.(1) is permitted to be located inside a building if it is provided with explosion venting to the outdoors as specified in Sentence 5.3.1.4.(1), equipped with an automatic explosion prevention system, or located in a room with fire separations having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h and provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.

National Sentence Text: Fill pipes referred to in Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2) shall be installed in such a way as to minimize vibration of the pipe.
P/T Sentence Text: Fill pipes referred to in Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2) shall be installed in such a way as to minimize vibration of the pipe.

National Sentence Text: Underground piping shall be supported on undisturbed or compacted soil, or not less than 150 mm of clean sand, pea gravel or clean crushed stone, and backfilled on the top and sides with not less than 300 mm of pea gravel or clean crushed stone, or 300 mm of clean sand, free of cinders and stones, and compacted in layers not more than 300 mm thick.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground piping shall be supported on undisturbed or compacted soil, or not less than 150 mm of clean sand, pea gravel or clean crushed stone, and backfilled on the top and sides with not less than 300 mm of pea gravel or clean crushed stone, or 300 mm of clean sand, free of cinders and stones, and compacted in layers not more than 300 mm thick.

National Sentence Text: When explosion venting is required in this Section, it shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage to the building in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)
P/T Sentence Text: When explosion venting is required in this Section, it shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage to the building in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Part, the storage and handling of liquefied petroleum gases shall conform to CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code and CSA B149.2-10 Propane Storage and Handling Code
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in this Part, the storage and handling of liquefied petroleum gases shall conform to CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code and CSA B149.2-10 Propane Storage and Handling Code
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Part, the storage and handling of liquefied petroleum gases shall conform to the British Columbia Gas Safety Regulation.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in this Part, the storage and handling of liquefied petroleum gases shall conform to the British Columbia Gas Safety Regulation.

National Sentence Text: Hydrants on a construction, alteration, or demolition site shall be clearly marked with a sign, be accessible, and have an unobstructed clearance of not less than 2 m at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: Hydrants on a construction, alteration, or demolition site shall be clearly marked with a sign, be accessible, and have an unobstructed clearance of not less than 2 m at all times.

National Sentence Text: Combustible waste materials in and around buildings shall not be permitted to accumulate in quantities or locations that will constitute an undue fire hazard. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible waste materials in and around buildings shall not be permitted to accumulate in quantities or locations that will constitute an undue fire hazard. (See Note A-2.4.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except where they are equipped with hold-open devices conforming to the NBC, doors in fire separations that are required to be equipped with self-closing devices shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 24 h to ensure that they remain in the closed position when not in use.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except where they are equipped with hold-open devices conforming to the NBC, doors in fire separations that are required to be equipped with self-closing devices shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 24 h to ensure that they remain in the closed position when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Except where they are equipped with hold-open devices conforming to the British Columbia Building Code., doors in fire separations that are required to be equipped with self-closing devices shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 24 h to ensure that they remain in the closed position when not in use.

National Sentence Text: It is permitted to dispense or transfer Class I or II liquids in a storage area conforming to Article 4.2.7.5. provided the storage area does not exceed 100 m2, and the dispensing or transfer operations conform to the applicable requirements of Subsection 4.2.9.
P/T Sentence Text: It is permitted to dispense or transfer Class I or II liquids in a storage area conforming to Article 4.2.7.5. provided the storage area does not exceed 100 m2, and the dispensing or transfer operations conform to the applicable requirements of part 4.

National Sentence Text: Pressure vessels shall be constructed in conformance with CSA B51-14 Boiler, Pressure Vessel, and Pressure Piping Code
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Pressure vessels shall be constructed in conformance with CSA B51-14 Boiler, Pressure Vessel, and Pressure Piping Code
P/T Sentence Text: Pressure vessels shall be constructed in conformance with the British Columbia Power Engineers, Boiler, Pressure Vessel and Refrigeration Safety Regulation
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Pressure vessels shall be constructed in conformance with the British Columbia Power Engineers, Boiler, Pressure Vessel and Refrigeration Safety Regulation

National Sentence Text: It is not permitted to use any portion of a piping system in a manner that could damage it or for any purpose other than the transfer of product.
P/T Sentence Text: It is not permitted to use any portion of a piping system in a manner that could damage it or for any purpose other than the transfer of product.

National Sentence Text: Fixed dispensers shall be protected against collision damage by a concrete island not less than 100 mm high, or posts or guardrails.
P/T Sentence Text: Fixed dispensers shall be protected against collision damage by a concrete island not less than 100 mm high, or posts or guardrails.

National Sentence Text: The substructure and deck of a pier or wharf shall be designed for its intended use and shall be constructed of heavy timber or material that will provide adequate flexibility, resistance to shock, durability, strength and fire resistance.
P/T Sentence Text: The substructure and deck of a pier or wharf shall be designed for its intended use and shall be constructed of heavy timber or material that will provide adequate flexibility, resistance to shock, durability, strength and fire resistance.

National Sentence Text: Cylinders and tanks of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be protected against mechanical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Cylinders and tanks of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall be protected against mechanical damage.

National Sentence Text: A record of the measurements for each storage tank and of the computations described in Sentence 4.4.4.1.(3) shall be retained, in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
P/T Sentence Text: A record of the measurements for each storage tank and of the computations described in Sentence 4.4.4.1.(3) shall be retained, in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids in mercantile occupancies shall be kept in closed containers.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids in mercantile occupancies shall be kept in closed containers.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.3.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to the outdoor storage of the following products: Class III and IV commodities, and Group A, B and C plastics, as described in Section 3.2., rubber tires, forest products, including lumber, timber and wood pallets, forest by-products, including wood chips and hogged material (see Note A-3.3.1.1.(1)(d)), manufactured buildings (see Note A-3.3.1.1.(1)(e)), wrecked vehicles in salvage yards, and dangerous goods in packages or containers, as covered in Subsection 3.3.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.3.1.1.(2), this Section shall apply to the outdoor storage of the following products: Class III and IV commodities, and Group A, B and C plastics, as described in part 3., rubber tires, forest products, including lumber, timber and wood pallets, forest by-products, including wood chips and hogged material (see Note A-3.3.1.1.(1)(d)), manufactured buildings (see Note A-3.3.1.1.(1)(e)), wrecked vehicles in salvage yards, and dangerous goods in packages or containers, as covered in part 3.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(2), an access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC shall be provided to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any part of an individual storage area.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(2), an access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC shall be provided to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any part of an individual storage area.

National Sentence Text: Class I liquids in closed containers are permitted to be stored in basements of mercantile occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Class I liquids in closed containers are permitted to be stored in basements of mercantile occupancies.

National Sentence Text: Underground metallic piping systems in contact with the soil or groundwater shall be protected against corrosion in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or NACE SP0169-2013 Control of External Corrosion on Underground or Submerged Metallic Piping Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Underground metallic piping systems in contact with the soil or groundwater shall be protected against corrosion in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or NACE SP0169-2013 Control of External Corrosion on Underground or Submerged Metallic Piping Systems

National Sentence Text: Tanks of marine vessels shall be electrically connected to the shore piping prior to the connection of cargo hose, except when cathodic protection facilities are operating.
P/T Sentence Text: Tanks of marine vessels shall be electrically connected to the shore piping prior to the connection of cargo hose, except when cathodic protection facilities are operating.

National Sentence Text: Underground piping systems referred to in Sentence 4.8.4.8.(1) shall be tested at intervals no greater than 12 months.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground piping systems referred to in Sentence 4.8.4.8.(1) shall be tested at intervals no greater than 12 months.

National Sentence Text: During construction and in addition to the means of access required by Sentences 5.6.1.4.(2)and 5.6.1.4.(3), at least one stairway shall be provided that consists of treads and risers complying with the dimensional requirements of Article 3.4.6.8. of Division B of the NBC, is equipped with one handrail conforming to Sentences 3.4.6.5.(5), (6), (7), (11), (13), and (14) of Division B of the NBC, is not less than 900 mm wide, and is equipped with guards that are not less than 920 mm high when measured vertically to the top of the guard from a line drawn through the outside edges of the stair nosings, and not less than 1070 mm high around landings.
