National Sentence Text: Where Measure C is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure C, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshafts.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure C is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure C, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshafts.

National Sentence Text: Employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the location, function and operation of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves.
P/T Sentence Text: Employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the location, function and operation of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves.

National Sentence Text: Systems through which tank cars or tank vehicles discharge into aboveground storage tanks by means of pumps shall be provided with check valves to prevent backflow and the inadvertent mixing of liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Systems through which tank cars or tank vehicles discharge into aboveground storage tanks by means of pumps shall be provided with check valves to prevent backflow and the inadvertent mixing of liquids.

National Sentence Text: Flanged joints shall be tightly bolted to prevent leakage.
P/T Sentence Text: Flanged joints shall be tightly bolted to prevent leakage.

National Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall not be located on the exterior of walls except on those of noncombustible construction, or above windows.
P/T Sentence Text: Aboveground outdoor piping shall not be located on the exterior of walls except on those of noncombustible construction, or above windows.

National Sentence Text: Where service pressures exceeding 875 kPa (gauge) may occur, piping and fittings shall be designed in conformance with ASME B31.3-2016 Process Piping
P/T Sentence Text: Where service pressures exceeding 875 kPa (gauge) may occur, piping and fittings shall be designed in conformance with ASME B31.3-2016 Process Piping

National Sentence Text: The method of installation and materials used for piping, valves and fittings shall conform to Section 4.5.
P/T Sentence Text: The method of installation and materials used for piping, valves and fittings shall conform to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Where the building is sprinklered in conformance with Article 3.2.5.5., and an enclosure conforming to Articles 3.2.5.6.or 3.2.5.7. is provided, the height of storage of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosols shall be not greater than 6.1 m where products are in solid piles or on pallets, or the height limit determined by the design capacity of the sprinkler system where products are on racks.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the building is sprinklered in conformance with Article 3.2.5.5., and an enclosure conforming to Articles 3.2.5.6.or 3.2.5.7. is provided, the height of storage of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosols shall be not greater than 6.1 m where products are in solid piles or on pallets, or the height limit determined by the design capacity of the sprinkler system where products are on racks.

National Sentence Text: A filling connection described in Sentence 4.3.6.4.(1) is permitted to be located inside a building if this is made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.
P/T Sentence Text: A filling connection described in Sentence 4.3.6.4.(1) is permitted to be located inside a building if this is made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Article 4.2.6.3., flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be kept in closed containers and stored in cabinets conforming to Subsection 4.2.10., except that the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in such cabinets shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet, or in a room having no openings communicating directly with the public portions of the building and conforming to Subsection 4.2.9.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Article 4.2.6.3., flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be kept in closed containers and stored in cabinets conforming to part 4., except that the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in such cabinets shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet, or in a room having no openings communicating directly with the public portions of the building and conforming to part 4.

National Sentence Text: A hazard for which a fire suppression system has been designed is not permitted to be increased unless the level of fire protection is also commensurately increased.
P/T Sentence Text: A hazard for which a fire suppression system has been designed is not permitted to be increased unless the level of fire protection is also commensurately increased.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored in areas where they may be subject to temperature extremes or atmospheric pressure that could cause their containers to become deformed or rupture, or physical impact or temperature extremes that could cause a chemical reaction or chemical instability such that a fire could occur.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be stored in areas where they may be subject to temperature extremes or atmospheric pressure that could cause their containers to become deformed or rupture, or physical impact or temperature extremes that could cause a chemical reaction or chemical instability such that a fire could occur.

National Sentence Text: Piping shall be supported on pipe hangers or other supports so that allowable stresses in the pipe are not exceeded. (See Note A-4.5.6.12.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Piping shall be supported on pipe hangers or other supports so that allowable stresses in the pipe are not exceeded. (See Note A-4.5.6.12.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Where combustible materials, such as packaging materials, are used in a laboratory, their quantity shall not be greater than the supply for one day of normal operation.
P/T Sentence Text: Where combustible materials, such as packaging materials, are used in a laboratory, their quantity shall not be greater than the supply for one day of normal operation.

National Sentence Text: At least 2 portable extinguishers, each having a rating of not less than 80-B:C, shall be provided at hazardous locations in bulk storage plants for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: At least 2 portable extinguishers, each having a rating of not less than 80-B:C, shall be provided at hazardous locations in bulk storage plants for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Emergency procedures conforming to Article 4.1.5.5. shall be established for refineries and process plants.
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency procedures conforming to Article 4.1.5.5. shall be established for refineries and process plants.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Subsection, aerosol products shall be classified as Level 1, 2 or 3 in conformance with NFPA 30B-2015 Manufacture and Storage of Aerosol Products (See Note A-3.2.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Subsection, aerosol products shall be classified as Level 1, 2 or 3 in conformance with NFPA 30B-2015 Manufacture and Storage of Aerosol Products (See Note A-3.2.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Substances classified as miscellaneousdangerous goods shall be stored according to the hazard they present based on their properties as dangerous goods.
P/T Sentence Text: Substances classified as miscellaneousdangerous goods shall be stored according to the hazard they present based on their properties as dangerous goods.

National Sentence Text: A continuous in-tank leak detection system shall conform to good engineering practice and meet the requirements of a precision leak detection test. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(6).)
P/T Sentence Text: A continuous in-tank leak detection system shall conform to good engineering practice and meet the requirements of a precision leak detection test. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(6).)

National Sentence Text: Subject to the provisions in Clause 3.2.8.2.(1)(c), where make-up air for a mechanical ventilation system is taken from within the building, the opening into the room or enclosed space shall be provided with a fire damper.
P/T Sentence Text: Subject to the provisions in Sentence 3.2.8.2.(1), where make-up air for a mechanical ventilation system is taken from within the building, the opening into the room or enclosed space shall be provided with a fire damper.

National Sentence Text: Smoke alarms shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S553-14 Installation of Smoke Alarms
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke alarms shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S553-14 Installation of Smoke Alarms

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 5.5.5.2.(2)and 5.5.5.2.(4), containers used for the storage or dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a laboratory shall conform to Subsection 4.2.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 5.5.5.2.(2)and 5.5.5.2.(4), containers used for the storage or dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a laboratory shall conform to part 4.

National Sentence Text: A telephone or other clearly identified means to notify the fire department shall be provided in a location readily accessible to the user.
P/T Sentence Text: A telephone or other clearly identified means to notify the fire department shall be provided in a location readily accessible to the user.

National Sentence Text: A secondary containment shall permit access to storage tanks, valves and ancillary equipment, egress from the contained space, and access for firefighting as specified in Article 4.3.2.4. (See Note A-4.3.7.5.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: A secondary containment shall permit access to storage tanks, valves and ancillary equipment, egress from the contained space, and access for firefighting as specified in Article 4.3.2.4.

National Sentence Text: Connections for filling or emptying storage tanks described in Sentence 4.3.12.3.(3) shall be kept closed to prevent leakage when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Connections for filling or emptying storage tanks described in Sentence 4.3.12.3.(3) shall be kept closed to prevent leakage when not in use.

National Sentence Text: Packages or containers ofdangerous goods classified as organic peroxides shall not be opened, or the product dispensed, in the same area where it is stored.
P/T Sentence Text: Packages or containers ofdangerous goods classified as organic peroxides shall not be opened, or the product dispensed, in the same area where it is stored.

National Sentence Text: The use, handling and storage of dangerous goods, excluding flammable liquids and combustible liquids, shall conform to Part 3..
P/T Sentence Text: The use, handling and storage of dangerous goods, excluding flammable liquids and combustible liquids, shall conform to part 3..

National Sentence Text: The maintenance of pressurized piping systems shall be carried out in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.5.10.7.(6).) (See Note A-4.6.1.1.)
P/T Sentence Text: The maintenance of pressurized piping systems shall be carried out in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.5.10.7.(6).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.6.8.4. for card- or key-activated equipment, special dispensers including coin-operated, card-operated and preset units, shall not be permitted at self-service outlets unless there is at least one qualified attendant on duty for each 12 hoses that can be operated simultaneously while the outlet is open to the public.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.6.8.4. for card- or key-activated equipment, special dispensers including coin-operated, card-operated and preset units, shall not be permitted at self-service outlets unless there is at least one qualified attendant on duty for each 12 hoses that can be operated simultaneously while the outlet is open to the public.

National Sentence Text: Emergency drainage systems shall be provided to direct any spilled or leaked distilled beverage alcohol to a safe location.
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency drainage systems shall be provided to direct any spilled or leaked distilled beverage alcohol to a safe location.

National Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks that are in the process of being installed shall be inspected, and any damage to the tank shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes shall be repaired before they are lowered into the excavation.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks that are in the process of being installed shall be inspected, and any damage to the tank shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes shall be repaired before they are lowered into the excavation.

National Sentence Text: When a leak detection test required by this Section detects a leak in a single-walled construction underground storage tank or piping system, the leaking components or system shall be replaced in conformance with Articles 4.3.8.1.and 4.5.6.1., or taken out of service in conformance with Subsection 4.3.16.
P/T Sentence Text: When a leak detection test required by this Section detects a leak in a single-walled construction underground storage tank or piping system, the leaking components or system shall be replaced in conformance with Articles 4.3.8.1.and 4.5.6.1., or taken out of service in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: A minimum clear space of 550 mm shall be maintained between the walls of a room described in Article 4.3.14.1. and the sides of any storage tanks within the room.
P/T Sentence Text: A minimum clear space of 550 mm shall be maintained between the walls of a room described in Article 4.3.14.1. and the sides of any storage tanks within the room.

National Sentence Text: Materials or liquids used in the cleanup of spills and leakages of dangerous goods shall be compatible and non-reactive with the dangerous goods being cleaned up, and disposed of in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Materials or liquids used in the cleanup of spills and leakages of dangerous goods shall be compatible and non-reactive with the dangerous goods being cleaned up, and disposed of in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Up to 10 L of Class I liquid is permitted to be stored in basements, provided it is stored in safety containers conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers
P/T Sentence Text: Up to 10 L of Class I liquid is permitted to be stored in basements, provided it is stored in safety containers conforming to ULC ULC/ORD-C30-1995 Safety Containers

National Sentence Text: Where Measure M is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure M, and vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure M.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure M is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure M, and vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure M.

National Sentence Text: Check valves shall be provided for both water and flammable liquid or combustible liquid piping to prevent backflow in hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Check valves shall be provided for both water and flammable liquid or combustible liquid piping to prevent backflow in hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1).

National Sentence Text: During loading and unloading operations, a tank vehicle and its delivery equipment shall be separated from ignition sources by distances conforming to the requirements for dispensers in Articles 4.6.3.3.and 4.6.8.7.
P/T Sentence Text: During loading and unloading operations, a tank vehicle and its delivery equipment shall be separated from ignition sources by distances conforming to the requirements for dispensers in Articles 4.6.3.3.and 4.6.8.7.

National Sentence Text: The use of weak roof-to-side shell seams, designed to rupture before the allowable design stress of the storage tank is reached, shall not be permitted as a means of emergency venting of storage tanks inside buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: The use of weak roof-to-side shell seams, designed to rupture before the allowable design stress of the storage tank is reached, shall not be permitted as a means of emergency venting of storage tanks inside buildings.

National Sentence Text: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h.

National Sentence Text: The storage, handling and use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a container other than one of those listed in Article 4.2.3.1. shall be permitted only if the required purity of the liquid would be affected by containers of the types listed in Article 4.2.3.1. or if the liquid would cause the excessive corrosion of those types of containers, the container not conforming to Article 4.2.3.1. has a capacity of not more than 1 L if used for Class I liquids and not more than 5 L if used for Class II or IIIA liquids, or the container not conforming to Article 4.2.3.1. is a sample container used for quality control purposes or for testing by regulatory officials.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage, handling and use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a container other than one of those listed in Article 4.2.3.1. shall be permitted only if the required purity of the liquid would be affected by containers of the types listed in Article 4.2.3.1. or if the liquid would cause the excessive corrosion of those types of containers, the container not conforming to Article 4.2.3.1. has a capacity of not more than 1 L if used for Class I liquids and not more than 5 L if used for Class II or IIIA liquids, or the container not conforming to Article 4.2.3.1. is a sample container used for quality control purposes or for testing by regulatory officials.

National Sentence Text: Personnel involved in the transfer operations of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in accordance with Article 4.5.10.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Personnel involved in the transfer operations of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in accordance with Article 4.5.10.2.

National Sentence Text: Pits provided in conformance with Sentence 4.5.9.3.(1) shall not be larger than necessary for inspection and maintenance and shall be provided with a cover.
P/T Sentence Text: Pits provided in conformance with Sentence 4.5.9.3.(1) shall not be larger than necessary for inspection and maintenance and shall be provided with a cover.

National Sentence Text: When the flow of liquid can be stopped other than by the hose nozzle valve, a hose nozzle valve with a hold-open device is permitted to be used only if it is provided with a device that will automatically close the hose nozzle valve upon a drop of pressure in the dispensing hose.
P/T Sentence Text: When the flow of liquid can be stopped other than by the hose nozzle valve, a hose nozzle valve with a hold-open device is permitted to be used only if it is provided with a device that will automatically close the hose nozzle valve upon a drop of pressure in the dispensing hose.

National Sentence Text: An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.
P/T Sentence Text: An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.

National Sentence Text: Where it is not possible to fill the connected storage tanks referred to in Sentence 4.3.11.4.(1) simultaneously, or where the connected vents have a vapour recovery system, the vent piping shall be sized to accommodate the maximum vapour flow possible in the system.
P/T Sentence Text: Where it is not possible to fill the connected storage tanks referred to in Sentence 4.3.11.4.(1) simultaneously, or where the connected vents have a vapour recovery system, the vent piping shall be sized to accommodate the maximum vapour flow possible in the system.

National Sentence Text: Shields shall be provided that will prevent stored material from coming within 300 mm of any part of a heating system's heat distribution network.
P/T Sentence Text: Shields shall be provided that will prevent stored material from coming within 300 mm of any part of a heating system's heat distribution network.

National Sentence Text: Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: In buildings being demolished, at least one stairway shall be maintained in usable condition at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: In buildings being demolished, at least one stairway shall be maintained in usable condition at all times.

National Sentence Text: Non-metallic piping systems are permitted to be used for underground installations, provided they conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S660-08 Nonmetallic Underground Piping for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Non-metallic piping systems are permitted to be used for underground installations, provided they conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S660-08 Nonmetallic Underground Piping for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified, this Subsection shall apply to the outdoor storage of any product covered in this Section.
P/T Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified, this Subsection shall apply to the outdoor storage of any product covered in this Section.

National Sentence Text: Make-up air for a natural ventilation system shall be taken from a point outside the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Make-up air for a natural ventilation system shall be taken from a point outside the building.

National Sentence Text: Smoke alarms are permitted to be battery operated.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Smoke alarms are permitted to be battery operated.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke alarms are permitted to be battery operated in a building that is not supplied with electrical power, or locations within a dwelling unit where smoke alarms were not required by the British Columbia Building Code at the time of construction or alteration of the dwelling unit.

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to piping and transfer systems for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to piping and transfer systems for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Floors in areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be constructed in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC, and maintained as an impervious membrane.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Floors in areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be constructed in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC, and maintained as an impervious membrane.

National Sentence Text: Notwithstanding the requirements of Sentence 2.1.5.1.(2), portable extinguishers shall be rated and identified in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S508-02 Rating and Fire Testing of Fire Extinguishers
P/T Sentence Text: Notwithstanding the requirements of Sentence 2.1.5.1.(2), portable extinguishers shall be rated and identified in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S508-02 Rating and Fire Testing of Fire Extinguishers

National Sentence Text: Incompatible dangerous goods that are not allowed in Table 3.2.7.6. to be stored in the same fire compartment are permitted to be separated by a minimum horizontal distance of 3 m in lieu of a fire separation when in an outdoor storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: Incompatible dangerous goods that are not allowed in Table 3.2.7.6. to be stored in the same fire compartment are permitted to be separated by a minimum horizontal distance of 3 m in lieu of a fire separation when in an outdoor storage area.

National Sentence Text: Areas in process plants, where conditions must be addressed by design and operational details specific to the hazard, need not conform to this Part, where alternative protection is provided in conformance with Article 1.2.1.1.. (See Note A-4.1.1.1.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Where lecture bottles of dangerous goods classified as toxic gases or as compressed gases of pyrophoric materials are used in a laboratory, they shall be kept in a dedicated continuously mechanically ventilated hood or other continuously mechanically ventilated enclosure, and all exhaust shall be directed to a treatment system designed to process the accidental release of gas (see Note A-5.5.5.3.(5)(b) and (7)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: Where lecture bottles of dangerous goods classified as toxic gases or as compressed gases of pyrophoric materials are used in a laboratory, they shall be kept in a dedicated continuously mechanically ventilated hood or other continuously mechanically ventilated enclosure, and all exhaust shall be directed to a treatment system designed to process the accidental release of gas (see Note A-5.5.5.3.(5)(b)).

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.9.7.(2), the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a closed piping system by means of compressed air or other non-inert gas pressure shall not be permitted.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.9.7.(2), the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in a closed piping system by means of compressed air or other non-inert gas pressure shall not be permitted.

National Sentence Text: The device required in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(1) shall be clearly identified and readily accessible to attendants and emergency responders.
P/T Sentence Text: The device required in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(1) shall be clearly identified and readily accessible to attendants and emergency responders.

National Sentence Text: Processing equipment shall be designed and arranged to prevent the unintentional escape of liquids and vapours, and minimize the quantity escaping in the event of accidental release.
P/T Sentence Text: Processing equipment shall be designed and arranged to prevent the unintentional escape of liquids and vapours, and minimize the quantity escaping in the event of accidental release.

National Sentence Text: Loose shavings and sawdust shall be collected at frequent intervals and deposited in receptacles described in Article 2.4.1.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Loose shavings and sawdust shall be collected at frequent intervals and deposited in receptacles described in Article 2.4.1.3.

National Sentence Text: The procedure for conducting fire drills shall be determined by the person in responsible charge of the building, taking into consideration the buildingoccupancy and its fire hazards, the safety features provided in the building, the desirable degree of participation of occupants other than supervisory staff, the number and degree of experience of participating supervisory staff, the features of fire emergency systems installed in buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC, and the requirements of the fire department. (See Note A-2.8.3.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as otherwise specified in this Section, the use, handling and storage of dangerous goods, including flammable liquids and combustible liquids, shall conform to Parts 3., 4.and 5..
P/T Sentence Text: Except as otherwise specified in this Section, the use, handling and storage of dangerous goods, including flammable liquids and combustible liquids, shall conform to Parts 3., 4.and 5..

National Sentence Text: Operating pressures shall be controlled by a constant-level float valve or a pressure-regulating valve on the water supply side of the hydraulic transfer system referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Operating pressures shall be controlled by a constant-level float valve or a pressure-regulating valve on the water supply side of the hydraulic transfer system referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1).

National Sentence Text: Dispensers at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be in a location that will prevent watercraft or floatplane impact, or other physical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensers at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be in a location that will prevent watercraft or floatplane impact, or other physical damage.

National Sentence Text: Atmospheric and low pressure storage tanks shall be provided with normal and emergency venting in conformance with API 2000-2009 Venting Atmospheric and Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or the tank design standards listed in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Atmospheric and low pressure storage tanks shall be provided with normal and emergency venting in conformance with API 2000-2009 Venting Atmospheric and Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or the tank design standards listed in Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1).

National Sentence Text: Where it is impracticable to remove tanks, piping or machinery reservoirs from the building prior to demolition, such equipment shall be conspicuously identified and removed as soon as conditions permit.
P/T Sentence Text: Where it is impracticable to remove tanks, piping or machinery reservoirs from the building prior to demolition, such equipment shall be conspicuously identified and removed as soon as conditions permit.

National Sentence Text: The design and installation of the piping system permitting, the piping system's contents shall be drained prior to conducting the pressure decline test procedure.
P/T Sentence Text: The design and installation of the piping system permitting, the piping system's contents shall be drained prior to conducting the pressure decline test procedure.

National Sentence Text: Where a product has multiple classes, the applicable small quantity exemption referred to in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(2) shall be determined using Column A of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Section 2.8 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) Column B of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Table A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b), for controlled products under the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) as classified in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations (see Note A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b)), or when the class having precedence cannot be established, Column C of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the lesser of the two small quantity exemptions. (See Note A-3.2.7.1.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where a product has multiple classes, the applicable small quantity exemption referred to in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(2) shall be determined using Column A of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Section 2.8 of TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) Column B of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the class having precedence, as established in Table A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b), for controlled products under the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS) as classified in Part 7 of HC SOR/2015-17 Hazardous Products Regulations (see Note A-3.2.7.1.(3)(b)), or when the class having precedence cannot be established, Column C of Table 3.2.7.1. based on the lesser of the two small quantity exemptions.

National Sentence Text: Products covered in this Section shall not be stored beneath electrical power lines.
P/T Sentence Text: Products covered in this Section shall not be stored beneath electrical power lines.

National Sentence Text: Private hydrants, fire department connections and private valves controlling water supplies to fire protection systems shall be maintained in conformance with Part 6., and kept accessible to firefighters and their equipment at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: Private hydrants, fire department connections and private valves controlling water supplies to fire protection systems shall be maintained in conformance with part 6., and kept accessible to firefighters and their equipment at all times.

National Sentence Text: The words and terms in italics in Division B shall have the meanings assigned to them in Article 1.4.1.2..
P/T Sentence Text: The words and terms in italics in Division B shall have the meanings assigned to them in Article 1.4.1.2..

National Sentence Text: Openings in fire separations shall be protected with closures in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Openings in fire separations shall be protected with closures in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Openings in fire separations shall be protected with closures in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Openings in fire separations shall be protected with closures in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as oxidizers that are located within mercantile occupancies in quantities not exceeding those permitted by Table 3.2.7.1. shall be separated from ordinary combustible material by a distance of at least 1 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods classified as oxidizers that are located within mercantile occupancies in quantities not exceeding those permitted by Table 3.2.7.1. shall be separated from ordinary combustible material by a distance of at least 1 m.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or by tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or by tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Electrical heating cables including electrical induction heating shall conform to Subsection 4.1.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical heating cables including electrical induction heating shall conform to part 4.

National Sentence Text: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1) shall be designed to prevent water pressure in excess of the design pressure of the tank or piping.
P/T Sentence Text: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.5.(1) shall be designed to prevent water pressure in excess of the design pressure of the tank or piping.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of Part 6., components of fire emergency systems shall be maintained in conformance with Sentences 7.1.1.4.(2)to 7.1.1.4.(5).
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of part 6., components of fire emergency systems shall be maintained in conformance with Sentences 7.1.1.4.(2)to 7.1.1.4.(5).

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Where the secondary containment is not open to the atmosphere, emergency venting shall be provided to relieve any buildup of internal pressure in the contained space when exposed to heat or fire.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the secondary containment is not open to the atmosphere, emergency venting shall be provided to relieve any buildup of internal pressure in the contained space when exposed to heat or fire.

National Sentence Text: Where Class IA or IB liquids are dispensed within a storage room, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where Class IA or IB liquids are dispensed within a storage room, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)

National Sentence Text: Where test pressures exceed the design pressures for pumps or similar components connected to the piping system being tested, such pumps or components shall be isolated from the test procedure.
P/T Sentence Text: Where test pressures exceed the design pressures for pumps or similar components connected to the piping system being tested, such pumps or components shall be isolated from the test procedure.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by pressure sensor or by tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized vestibules shall be tested in different seasons by pressure sensor or by tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that movement of air is from the vestibules to the floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) shall have a minimum dimension of 200 mm, and except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(4), have letters not less than 25 mm high.
P/T Sentence Text: The sign required in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(1) shall have a minimum dimension of 200 mm, and except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.8.8.(4), have letters not less than 25 mm high.

National Sentence Text: Where either of 2 aboveground storage tanks contains unstable liquids, the distance required in Sentences 4.3.2.2.(1)and 4.3.2.2.(2) shall be doubled.
P/T Sentence Text: Where either of 2 aboveground storage tanks contains unstable liquids, the distance required in Sentences 4.3.2.2.(1)and 4.3.2.2.(2) shall be doubled.

National Sentence Text: Controls for the liquid removal system required in Sentence 4.3.7.8.(2) shall be normally closed, accessible under fire exposure conditions, and located so they can be operated from outside the contained space.
P/T Sentence Text: Controls for the liquid removal system required in Sentence 4.3.7.8.(2) shall be normally closed, accessible under fire exposure conditions, and located so they can be operated from outside the contained space.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.10.3.(2)and 4.2.10.3.(3), the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted in Article 4.2.10.2. for 3 cabinets.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.2.10.3.(2)and 4.2.10.3.(3), the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted in Article 4.2.10.2. for 3 cabinets.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure K is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules is initiated as provided in Sentences (11) and (15) of Measure K, and doors to vestibules, if these are normally held open, will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (1) of Measure K, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and in vented vestibules shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentences (11) and (13) of Measure K.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure K is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules is initiated as provided in Sentences (11) and (15) of Measure K, and doors to vestibules, if these are normally held open, will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (1) of Measure K, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and in vented vestibules shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open as provided in Sentences (11) and (13) of Measure K.

National Sentence Text: Indoor piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall either be supported overhead or be located in trenches conforming to Article 4.5.6.10.
P/T Sentence Text: Indoor piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall either be supported overhead or be located in trenches conforming to Article 4.5.6.10.

National Sentence Text: Where perchloric acid is heated above normal ambient temperature, it shall be done in a separate power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 5.5.4.3.and 5.5.4.4., and displaying conspicuously posted instructions specifying that the enclosure is to be used for this application only.
P/T Sentence Text: Where perchloric acid is heated above normal ambient temperature, it shall be done in a separate power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 5.5.4.3.and 5.5.4.4., and displaying conspicuously posted instructions specifying that the enclosure is to be used for this application only.

National Sentence Text: This Part applies to processes and operations that involve a risk from explosion, high flammability or related conditions that create a hazard to life safety.
P/T Sentence Text: This Part applies to processes and operations that involve a risk from explosion, high flammability or related conditions that create a hazard to life safety.

National Sentence Text: Any process or activity that produces flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres in quantities sufficient to create a fire or explosion hazard shall be interrupted and the hazardous conditions shall be removed before any hot work is carried out.
P/T Sentence Text: Any process or activity that produces flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres in quantities sufficient to create a fire or explosion hazard shall be interrupted and the hazardous conditions shall be removed before any hot work is carried out.

National Sentence Text: Vehicles shall not be parked to obstruct access by fire department vehicles and signs shall be posted prohibiting such parking.
P/T Sentence Text: Vehicles shall not be parked to obstruct access by fire department vehicles and signs shall be posted prohibiting such parking.

National Sentence Text: Aisles in conformance with Sentences 2.7.1.2.(2)to 2.7.1.2.(4) shall be provided in every floor area that is not subdivided into rooms or suites served by corridors giving access to exits, and is required by the NBC to have more than one egress doorway.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Aisles in conformance with Sentences 2.7.1.2.(2) to 2.7.1.2.(4) shall be provided in every floor area that is not subdivided into rooms or suites served by corridors giving access to exits, and is required by the NBC to have more than one egress doorway.

National Sentence Text: Where anchors and ground straps are used to resist the uplift forces referred to in Sentence 4.3.8.9.(1), they shall be electrically isolated from the tank, and installed in such a manner that they do not damage the tank's shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes.
P/T Sentence Text: Where anchors and ground straps are used to resist the uplift forces referred to in Sentence 4.3.8.9.(1), they shall be electrically isolated from the tank, and installed in such a manner that they do not damage the tank's shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes.

National Sentence Text: Where a storage tank is suspended, rather than supported on a foundation, supports shall be designed and installed in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.13.11.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Where a storage tank is suspended, rather than supported on a foundation, supports shall be designed and installed in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.13.11.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids, combustible liquidsand dangerous goods classified as corrosives shall not be stored with dangerous goods classified as radioactive materials in quantities or in a manner that would constitute an undue risk in the event of a fire.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids, combustible liquidsand dangerous goods classified as corrosives shall not be stored with dangerous goods classified as radioactive materials in quantities or in a manner that would constitute an undue risk in the event of a fire.

National Sentence Text: A receptacle conforming to Article 2.4.1.3. shall be provided for all waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the contents shall be removed daily and disposed of in a manner that will not create a fire hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: A receptacle conforming to Article 2.4.1.3. shall be provided for all waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the contents shall be removed daily and disposed of in a manner that will not create a fire hazard.

National Sentence Text: Vent piping shall be tested for leaks at the commissioning stage in conformance with Clause 4.4.1.2.(1)(a).
P/T Sentence Text: Vent piping shall be tested for leaks at the commissioning stage in conformance with Sentence 4.4.1.2.(1).

National Sentence Text: Exit signs provided with a battery back-up shall be inspected at intervals not greater than one month to ensure the exit signs will be visible upon failure of the primary power supply, and not greater than 12 months to ensure the exit signs will be visible for a duration equal to the design criterion upon failure of the primary power supply.
P/T Sentence Text: Exit signs provided with a battery back-up shall be inspected at intervals not greater than one month to ensure the exit signs will be visible upon failure of the primary power supply, and not greater than 12 months to ensure the exit signs will be visible for a duration equal to the design criterion upon failure of the primary power supply.

National Sentence Text: The normal operating pressure of a storage tank shall not exceed its design pressure.
P/T Sentence Text: The normal operating pressure of a storage tank shall not exceed its design pressure.

National Sentence Text: Devices capable of producing ignition, internal combustion engines, temporary heating equipment and associated devices shall be kept at a safe distance from combustible material so as not to cause ignition.
P/T Sentence Text: Devices capable of producing ignition, internal combustion engines, temporary heating equipment and associated devices shall be kept at a safe distance from combustible material so as not to cause ignition.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.3.2.4.(2)and 4.3.2.4.(3), storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be spaced so that each storage tank is accessible for firefighting purposes.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.3.2.4.(2)and 4.3.2.4.(3), storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be spaced so that each storage tank is accessible for firefighting purposes.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.3.3.2.(2)to 3.3.3.2.(4), the size and clearances for individual storage areas shall conform to Table 3.3.3.2. (See Note A-3.3.3.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.3.3.2.(2)to 3.3.3.2.(4), the size and clearances for individual storage areas shall conform to Table 3.3.3.2. (See Note A-3.3.3.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Nozzles for standpipe and hose systems shall conform to Sentence 3.2.5.11.(7) of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Electric power supply shall be shut off to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging.
P/T Sentence Text: Electric power supply shall be shut off to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2), no part of a secondary containment wall shall be less than 1.5 m from a storage tank shell.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2), no part of a secondary containment wall shall be less than 1.5 m from a storage tank shell.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.1.3.1.(3)and 4.1.3.1.(4), the flash point of liquids having a kinematic viscosity less than 6 cSt at 37.8°C and a flash point below 93.3°C shall be determined in conformance with ASTM D 56-05 Flash Point by Tag Closed Cup Tester

National Sentence Text: It is permitted to waive the clearance required in Sentence 3.3.3.2.(2) if the stored products do not consist of wood chips, hogged material, rubber tires or combustible pallets, the exposed wall of the building has a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h, and the stored products are separated from any unprotected wall opening by a horizontal distance of not less than 3 m on either side of the opening, and 6 m perpendicularly in front of the opening.

National Sentence Text: Inlets and outlets conforming to Sentence 4.1.7.3.(3)or 4.1.7.3.(4) shall be deemed to have met the requirements of Sentence 4.1.7.3.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Inlets and outlets conforming to Sentence 4.1.7.3.(3)or 4.1.7.3.(4) shall be deemed to have met the requirements of Sentence 4.1.7.3.(1).

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan required by Article 4.1.5.5. shall include measures to be taken to direct the overflow of spilled liquids and firefighting water away from buildings, adjoining properties, means of egress, air intakes or openings that could permit vapour entry into the building, fire alarm control panels, fire department access routes, valves controlling the water supply for firefighting, or fire protection systems, fire department pumper connections or wall hydrants, isolation valves controlling processes, and valves controlling the flow of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentence 5.6.1.9.(3) and except for water supplies for firefighting, building services shall be terminated at a point located outside the building or part thereof being demolished. (See Note A-5.6.1.9.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The contained space created by a secondary containment shall not be used for storage purposes.
P/T Sentence Text: The contained space created by a secondary containment shall not be used for storage purposes.

National Sentence Text: Pumps, dispensers and other auxiliary equipment that are connected to the piping system and cannot withstand the pressure of the test shall be isolated from the test procedure to prevent damage to the equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps, dispensers and other auxiliary equipment that are connected to the piping system and cannot withstand the pressure of the test shall be isolated from the test procedure to prevent damage to the equipment.

National Sentence Text: Fabrics and films used to temporarily enclose buildings shall be securely fastened to prevent them from being blown against heaters or other ignition sources.
P/T Sentence Text: Fabrics and films used to temporarily enclose buildings shall be securely fastened to prevent them from being blown against heaters or other ignition sources.

National Sentence Text: Documentation on the piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, including the tank and pumping arrangements, shall be made available to the fire department upon request.
P/T Sentence Text: Documentation on the piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, including the tank and pumping arrangements, shall be made available to the fire department upon request.

National Sentence Text: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred as a result of displacement by the expansion of nitrogen, carbon dioxide or other inert gases, all pressure vessels involved shall be constructed, installed and tested in conformance with ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code
