National Sentence Text: Pumps shall be securely anchored and protected against damage from vehicles.
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps shall be securely anchored and protected against damage from vehicles.

National Sentence Text: Clearly legible operating instructions, visible at all times, shall be posted at every dispenser island.
P/T Sentence Text: Clearly legible operating instructions, visible at all times, shall be posted at every dispenser island.

National Sentence Text: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code..
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code..

National Sentence Text: Where the contained space created by the secondary containment is not accessible for an internal visual examination, and the secondary containment is not sloped so as to permit liquid to flow to a specific location that can be monitored, a monitoring device shall be provided to indicate the loss of integrity of the secondary containment.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the contained space created by the secondary containment is not accessible for an internal visual examination, and the secondary containment is not sloped so as to permit liquid to flow to a specific location that can be monitored, a monitoring device shall be provided to indicate the loss of integrity of the secondary containment.

National Sentence Text: Class I liquids shall not be used for pressure testing piping systems, except that pressure piping normally containing Class I liquids is permitted to be tested with such liquids at pressures not exceeding their maximum operating pressures.
P/T Sentence Text: Class I liquids shall not be used for pressure testing piping systems, except that pressure piping normally containing Class I liquids is permitted to be tested with such liquids at pressures not exceeding their maximum operating pressures.

National Sentence Text: High-tech secondary containment monitoring referred to in this Section shall include the use of an automatic device that continuously monitors the interstitial space between the inner tank or inner piping and the secondary containment. (See Sentence 4.3.7.7.(1).) (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(7) for low-tech method.)
P/T Sentence Text: High-tech secondary containment monitoring referred to in this Section shall include the use of an automatic device that continuously monitors the interstitial space between the inner tank or inner piping and the secondary containment. (See Sentence 4.3.7.7.(1).) (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(7) for low-tech method.)

National Sentence Text: When a storage area is required by this Article to be protected, it shall be sprinklered or protected with a special fire suppression system, in conformance with Part 2. and good engineering practice with respect to specific dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.2.7.9.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: When a storage area is required by this Article to be protected, it shall be sprinklered or protected with a special fire suppression system, in conformance with part 2. and good engineering practice with respect to specific dangerous goods. (See Note A-3.2.7.9.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Fuel-dispensing operations shall not be carried out in buildings where ammonium nitrate is stored.
P/T Sentence Text: Fuel-dispensing operations shall not be carried out in buildings where ammonium nitrate is stored.

National Sentence Text: Pressurized stair and elevator shafts shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the stair or elevator shafts to the floor areas on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: Pressurized stair and elevator shafts shall be tested in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the stair or elevator shafts to the floor areas on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to prevent access to the laboratory by unauthorized persons.
P/T Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to prevent access to the laboratory by unauthorized persons.

National Sentence Text: After completion of the test required in Clause 6.5.1.6.(2)(b), the charging conditions for voltage and current and the recovery period shall be tested to ensure that the charging system is functioning in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications.
P/T Sentence Text: After completion of the test required in Sentence 6.5.1.6.(2), the charging conditions for voltage and current and the recovery period shall be tested to ensure that the charging system is functioning in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications.

National Sentence Text: Where more than 25 000 L of distilled beverage alcohol in storage tanks, drums or barrels are stored inside buildings, such buildings shall be sprinklered.
P/T Sentence Text: Where more than 25 000 L of distilled beverage alcohol in storage tanks, drums or barrels are stored inside buildings, such buildings shall be sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: In Group B, Divisions 2 and 3 care and treatment occupancies, flaming meals or drinks shall not be served.
P/T Sentence Text: In Group B, Divisions 2 and 3 care and treatment occupancies, flaming meals or drinks shall not be served.

National Sentence Text: Materials subject to spontaneous ignition, such as oily rags, shall be deposited in a receptacle conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(4) or be removed from the premises. (See Note A-2.4.1.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Materials subject to spontaneous ignition, such as oily rags, shall be deposited in a receptacle conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(4) or be removed from the premises. (See Note A-2.4.1.3.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Where cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases are stored outdoors, they shall be supported on raised concrete or other noncombustible platforms, and located in an enclosure fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Where cylinders of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases are stored outdoors, they shall be supported on raised concrete or other noncombustible platforms, and located in an enclosure fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure E is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules and firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentences (4) and (9) of Measure E will open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (4) and (7) of Measure E, closures in vent openings to the outdoors at the top of firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (9) of Measure E shall be tested to ensure that they will operate as required, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentences (6) and (10) of Measure E shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they will open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshafts as required by Sentence (7) of Measure E.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure E is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules and firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentences (4) and (9) of Measure E will open automatically and remain open, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentences (4) and (7) of Measure E, closures in vent openings to the outdoors at the top of firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentence (9) of Measure E shall be tested to ensure that they will operate as required, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts that are required by Sentences (6) and (10) of Measure E shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and will remain open, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they will open automatically, if such means is provided, and remain open when air is being injected into the stairshafts as required by Sentence (7) of Measure E.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Section, the storage and dispensing ofdangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations shall conform to CSA B108-14 Compressed Natural Gas Fuelling Stations Installation Code CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code and CSA B149.2-10 Propane Storage and Handling Code
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in this Section, the storage and dispensing ofdangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations shall conform to CSA B108-14 Compressed Natural Gas Fuelling Stations Installation Code CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code and CSA B149.2-10 Propane Storage and Handling Code

National Sentence Text: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored outdoors shall be stored in conformance with Subsection 4.2.11., except that the distance between the piles and property lines and the distance between piles need not apply when the containers are stored in an area that does not present a hazard to neighbouring property.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored outdoors shall be stored in conformance with part 4., except that the distance between the piles and property lines and the distance between piles need not apply when the containers are stored in an area that does not present a hazard to neighbouring property.

National Sentence Text: The maximum permissible occupant load for any room shall be calculated on the basis of the lesser of 0.4 m2 of net floor space per occupant, or the occupant load for which means of egress are provided. (See Note A-2.7.1.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum permissible occupant load for any room shall be calculated on the basis of the lesser of 0.4 m2 of net floor space per occupant, or the occupant load for which means of egress are provided.

National Sentence Text: Fire drills in a laboratory shall be held at intervals not greater than 3 months.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire drills in a laboratory shall be held at intervals not greater than 3 months.

National Sentence Text: Test devices and methods shall conform to the performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping
P/T Sentence Text: Test devices and methods shall conform to the performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping

National Sentence Text: Containers and storage tanks shall not be filled beyond their safe filling level.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers and storage tanks shall not be filled beyond their safe filling level.

National Sentence Text: Hot works shall be performed in conformance with Section 5.2. (See Note A-4.1.5.8.)
P/T Sentence Text: Hot works shall be performed in conformance with part 5.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) and in Articles 4.2.4.5.and 4.2.4.6., the maximum quantity of flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored in a fire compartment with a fire-resistance rating of at least 1 h shall conform to Sentences 4.2.4.2.(2)and 4.2.4.2.(3).
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) and in Articles 4.2.4.5.and 4.2.4.6., the maximum quantity of flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored in a fire compartment with a fire-resistance rating of at least 1 h shall conform to Sentences 4.2.4.2.(2)and 4.2.4.2.(3).

National Sentence Text: The maximum quantities of Class I liquids in an unprotected storage room with a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h shall not exceed those specified for unprotected storage in Table 4.2.7.5.-A, and comply with Sentences 4.2.7.5.(3)and 4.2.7.5.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: The maximum quantities of Class I liquids in an unprotected storage room with a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h shall not exceed those specified for unprotected storage in Table 4.2.7.5.-A, and comply with Sentences 4.2.7.5.(3)and 4.2.7.5.(4).

National Sentence Text: Smoke alarms within dwelling units shall be installed between each sleeping area and the remainder of the dwelling unit, and where the sleeping areas are served by hallways, the smoke alarms shall be installed in the hallways.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke alarms within dwelling units shall be installed between each sleeping area and the remainder of the dwelling unit, and where the sleeping areas are served by hallways, the smoke alarms shall be installed in the hallways.

National Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks shall be stored in detached buildings, in areas separated from the remainder of the storage area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less that 1 h, or in areas where the vehicles will not create a fire hazard to the storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: Fuel-fired industrial trucks shall be stored in detached buildings, in areas separated from the remainder of the storage area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less that 1 h, or in areas where the vehicles will not create a fire hazard to the storage area.

National Sentence Text: Where equipment is provided to melt snow or ice on exterior passageways and exterior exit stairs serving an occupied building, such equipment shall be maintained in working order or alternative measures shall be taken to comply with Sentence 2.7.1.7.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Where equipment is provided to melt snow or ice on exterior passageways and exterior exit stairs serving an occupied building, such equipment shall be maintained in working order or alternative measures shall be taken to comply with Sentence 2.7.1.7.(1).

National Sentence Text: Aboveground storage tanks shall be protected by posts or guardrails where they are exposed to potential collision damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Aboveground storage tanks shall be protected by posts or guardrails where they are exposed to potential collision damage.

National Sentence Text: A receptacle required by Sentences 2.4.1.3.(1)and 2.4.1.3.(2) shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, have a close-fitting, self-closing metal cover, and if the flooring material upon which it is placed is combustible, have a flanged bottom or legs not less than 50 mm high.
P/T Sentence Text: A receptacle required by Sentences 2.4.1.3.(1)and 2.4.1.3.(2) shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, have a close-fitting, self-closing metal cover, and if the flooring material upon which it is placed is combustible, have a flanged bottom or legs not less than 50 mm high.

National Sentence Text: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored indoors shall be stored in conformance with Subsection 4.2.7.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored indoors shall be stored in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Battery-charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.
P/T Sentence Text: Battery-charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.2.3.(2), used lubricating oil drained from motor vehicles shall be classified as a Class IIIA liquid.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.2.3.(2), used lubricating oil drained from motor vehicles shall be classified as a Class IIIA liquid.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.1.7.2.(2), a room or enclosed space referred to in Article 4.1.7.1. shall be provided with one of the following ventilation systems: continuous mechanical ventilation where Class I liquids are processed, dispensed or used in a manner that releases flammable vapours into the room or enclosed space, either natural or continuous mechanical ventilation where Class I liquids are stored, processed, dispensed or used in a manner that does not release flammable vapours into the room or enclosed space, or Class II liquids are processed, dispensed or used.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.1.7.2.(2), a room or enclosed space referred to in Article 4.1.7.1. shall be provided with one of the following ventilation systems: continuous mechanical ventilation where Class I liquids are processed, dispensed or used in a manner that releases flammable vapours into the room or enclosed space, either natural or continuous mechanical ventilation where Class I liquids are stored, processed, dispensed or used in a manner that does not release flammable vapours into the room or enclosed space, or Class II liquids are processed, dispensed or used.

National Sentence Text: Containers of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.

National Sentence Text: A sign identifying the civic address of the construction or demolition site shall be visible from the access route at the entrance to the site at all times.
P/T Sentence Text: A sign identifying the civic address of the construction or demolition site shall be visible from the access route at the entrance to the site at all times.

National Sentence Text: Waste receptacles shall be made of noncombustible materials.
P/T Sentence Text: Waste receptacles shall be made of noncombustible materials.

National Sentence Text: Openings for measuring liquid levels in underground storage tanks if independent of the fill pipe shall be equipped with a vapour-tight cap or cover which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.
P/T Sentence Text: Openings for measuring liquid levels in underground storage tanks if independent of the fill pipe shall be equipped with a vapour-tight cap or cover which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.

National Sentence Text: The power-ventilated enclosure required by Sentence 5.5.5.6.(1) as well as its exhaust duct system shall be washed after each use to prevent the accumulation of highly unstable deposits. (See Note A-5.5.5.6.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: The power-ventilated enclosure required by Sentence 5.5.5.6.(1) as well as its exhaust duct system shall be washed after each use to prevent the accumulation of highly unstable deposits. (See Note A-5.5.5.6.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be used in conformance with Part 5.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be used in conformance with Part 5.

National Sentence Text: Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Where the amount of stored dangerous goods referred to in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(1) does not exceed the amount stated in Column C of Table 3.2.7.1., it shall be exempted from the requirements of this Subsection.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the amount of stored dangerous goods referred to in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(1) does not exceed the amount stated in Column C of Table 3.2.7.1., it shall be exempted from the requirements of this Subsection.

National Sentence Text: Outdoor storage areas for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed to accommodate possible spillage in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Outdoor storage areas for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be designed to accommodate possible spillage in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure I is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (8) of Measure I, closures in openings in the walls and roof of the central core and in shafts within the core will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure I, return air fans are stopped and supply fans will provide air to the central core as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure I, closures in vent openings to the outdoors and into smoke shafts from each floor area will open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure I, air movement is initiated in an exhaust system used for venting as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure I, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces outside the central core that are required by Sentence (6) of Measure I will open automatically and remain open.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure I is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (8) of Measure I, closures in openings in the walls and roof of the central core and in shafts within the core will close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (3) of Measure I, return air fans are stopped and supply fans will provide air to the central core as provided in Sentence (2) of Measure I, closures in vent openings to the outdoors and into smoke shafts from each floor area will open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure I, air movement is initiated in an exhaust system used for venting as provided in Sentence (4) of Measure I, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces outside the central core that are required by Sentence (6) of Measure I will open automatically and remain open.

National Sentence Text: High rack storage warehouses with storage heights greater than 13 m, where conditions exist that must be addressed by design and operational details specific to the hazard, need not conform to this Section, where alternative protection is provided in conformance with Article 1.2.1.1..
P/T Sentence Text: High rack storage warehouses with storage heights greater than 13 m, where conditions exist that must be addressed by design and operational details specific to the hazard, need not conform to this Section, where alternative protection is provided in conformance with Article 1.2.1.1..

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.5.3.(2), 2 or more storage tanks are permitted to be connected to a common vent pipe for normal relief venting provided the vent pipe size is designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.5.3.(2), 2 or more storage tanks are permitted to be connected to a common vent pipe for normal relief venting provided the vent pipe size is designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks.

National Sentence Text: A storage tank is permitted to be refurbished for underground use in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in ULC CAN/ULC-S669-14 Internal Retrofit Systems for Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids (See Note A-4.3.1.10.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: A storage tank is permitted to be refurbished for underground use in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in ULC CAN/ULC-S669-14 Internal Retrofit Systems for Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids (See Note A-4.3.1.10.(3).)

National Sentence Text: Where piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.8.(1) passes through a wall that would restrict the expansion or contraction of the piping, pipe sleeves shall be provided at the wall penetration to facilitate such movement.
P/T Sentence Text: Where piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.8.(1) passes through a wall that would restrict the expansion or contraction of the piping, pipe sleeves shall be provided at the wall penetration to facilitate such movement.

National Sentence Text: Where pipe is supported more than 1.2 m above the pier deck, piping supports shall have a minimum fire-resistance rating of 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Where pipe is supported more than 1.2 m above the pier deck, piping supports shall have a minimum fire-resistance rating of 2 h.

National Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be protected against hydrostatic forces which can cause the uplift of the tanks once they are empty. (See Note A-4.3.8.9.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall be protected against hydrostatic forces which can cause the uplift of the tanks once they are empty. (See Note A-4.3.8.9.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Pumps, including associated control equipment, shall be designed so that the system will not be subject to pressures above the design working pressure.
P/T Sentence Text: Pumps, including associated control equipment, shall be designed so that the system will not be subject to pressures above the design working pressure.

National Sentence Text: In areas where general cargo is handled or where piping might be subject to physical damage from vehicles, watercraft or floatplanes, the piping shall be protected by means of guarding devices.
P/T Sentence Text: In areas where general cargo is handled or where piping might be subject to physical damage from vehicles, watercraft or floatplanes, the piping shall be protected by means of guarding devices.

National Sentence Text: A subsidiary aisle with only a single direction of travel to an aisle described in Sentence 2.7.1.2.(2) is permitted provided it has a clear width not less than 900 mm and a length not greater than 7.5 m in business and personal services, mercantile and high-hazard industrial occupancies, 10 m in medium-hazard industrial occupancies, or 15 m in low-hazard industrial occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: A subsidiary aisle with only a single direction of travel to an aisle described in Sentence 2.7.1.2.(2) is permitted provided it has a clear width not less than 900 mm and a length not greater than 7.5 m in business and personal services, mercantile and high-hazard industrial occupancies, 10 m in medium-hazard industrial occupancies, or 15 m in low-hazard industrial occupancies.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Code, unstable dangerous goods shall be considered as reactive materials based on their reactive properties.
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of this Code, unstable dangerous goods shall be considered as reactive materials based on their reactive properties.

National Sentence Text: A storage tank conforming to Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2) shall be considered as conforming to this Subsection provided it is used and maintained in conformance with Articles 4.3.7.8.and 4.3.7.9.
P/T Sentence Text: A storage tank conforming to Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2) shall be considered as conforming to this Subsection provided it is used and maintained in conformance with Articles 4.3.7.8.and 4.3.7.9.

National Sentence Text: Spill containment sumps shall conform to the construction and performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C58.19-1992 Spill Containment Devices for Underground Flammable Liquid Storage Tanks
P/T Sentence Text: Spill containment sumps shall conform to the construction and performance requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C58.19-1992 Spill Containment Devices for Underground Flammable Liquid Storage Tanks

National Sentence Text: A filling connection described in Sentence 4.3.12.3.(3) is permitted to be located inside a building if this is made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the storage tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.
P/T Sentence Text: A filling connection described in Sentence 4.3.12.3.(3) is permitted to be located inside a building if this is made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the storage tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall not be stored to a height greater than 6 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall not be stored to a height greater than 6 m.

National Sentence Text: Smoke alarms conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Smoke alarms conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke alarms conforming to shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Smoke alarms conforming to shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.

National Sentence Text: Ventilation shall be provided in areas where floor finishing operations are done to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.
P/T Sentence Text: Ventilation shall be provided in areas where floor finishing operations are done to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.

National Sentence Text: The transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids between tanks of marine vessels and piers or wharves shall be through flexible cargo hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice (see Note A-4.8.8.1.(1)(a)), or jointed tubing or piping suitable for the cargo to be transferred, and designed to withstand the maximum design working pressure.
P/T Sentence Text: The transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids between tanks of marine vessels and piers or wharves shall be through flexible cargo hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice (see Note A-4.8.8.1.(1)(a)), or jointed tubing or piping suitable for the cargo to be transferred, and designed to withstand the maximum design working pressure.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage of combustible fibres inside buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage of combustible fibres inside buildings.

National Sentence Text: Flammable cleaning materials or solvents shall not be used for the cleaning of exhaust systems.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable cleaning materials or solvents shall not be used for the cleaning of exhaust systems.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.1.3.1.(2)and 3.1.3.1.(3), the designation, use, maintenance and operation of industrial trucks shall conform to NFPA 505-2013 Powered Industrial Trucks Including Type Designations, Areas of Use, Conversions, Maintenance, and Operations
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.1.3.1.(2)and 3.1.3.1.(3), the designation, use, maintenance and operation of industrial trucks shall conform to NFPA 505-2013 Powered Industrial Trucks Including Type Designations, Areas of Use, Conversions, Maintenance, and Operations

National Sentence Text: Where the situation for which posting is required is of a temporary nature, permanent mounting need not be provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the situation for which posting is required is of a temporary nature, permanent mounting need not be provided.

National Sentence Text: Where Measure D is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules, vertical service spaces and elevator shafts open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentences (6), (10), (12) and (13) of Measure D, and dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (16) of Measure D, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (5) of Measure D, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces or at the top of elevator shafts as required by Sentences (10), (12) and (13) of Measure D shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and remain open as provided in Sentences (7) and (11) of Measure D, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, when air is being injected into the stairshafts as required by Sentence (8) of Measure D.
P/T Sentence Text: Where Measure D is used to limit smoke movement as provided in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3), switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vestibules, vertical service spaces and elevator shafts open automatically and remain open as provided in Sentences (6), (10), (12) and (13) of Measure D, and dampers in air-handling systems that serve more than 2 storeys close automatically and remain closed as provided in Sentence (16) of Measure D, switches at the central alarm and control facility shall be tested to ensure that the mechanical air supply to vestibules and below grade stairshafts is initiated as provided in Sentence (5) of Measure D, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in vertical service spaces or at the top of elevator shafts as required by Sentences (10), (12) and (13) of Measure D shall be tested at intervals conforming to Article 7.2.1.1. to ensure that they will operate as required, closures in vent openings to the outdoors in above grade stairshafts and at the street entrance floor of firefighters’ elevator shafts shall be tested to ensure that they can be opened manually and remain open as provided in Sentences (7) and (11) of Measure D, and closures in vent openings to the outdoors in below grade stairshafts shall be tested to ensure that they open automatically, if such means is provided, when air is being injected into the stairshafts as required by Sentence (8) of Measure D.

National Sentence Text: All valves shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification
P/T Sentence Text: All valves shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.3.5.(3), electrical equipment located in areas where the concentration of flammable vapours is sufficient to create a hazard shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for the hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.5.3.4.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.3.5.(3), electrical equipment located in areas where the concentration of flammable vapours is sufficient to create a hazard shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for the hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.5.3.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.3.5.(3), electrical equipment located in areas where the concentration of flammable vapours is sufficient to create a hazard shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation requirements for hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.5.3.4.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.3.5.(3), electrical equipment located in areas where the concentration of flammable vapours is sufficient to create a hazard shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation requirements for hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.5.3.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the NBC.)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the NBC.)
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code.)

National Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall not be placed in direct contact with reinforced concrete slabs but shall be separated by not less than 150 mm of sand or other suitable material to evenly distribute the weight of the tank on the supporting base.
P/T Sentence Text: Underground storage tanks shall not be placed in direct contact with reinforced concrete slabs but shall be separated by not less than 150 mm of sand or other suitable material to evenly distribute the weight of the tank on the supporting base.

National Sentence Text: The sides of baled storage piles shall be inclined back from the base of the pile with a slope of not less than 1 m for each 10 m of height.
P/T Sentence Text: The sides of baled storage piles shall be inclined back from the base of the pile with a slope of not less than 1 m for each 10 m of height.

National Sentence Text: Storage cabinets required in this Part shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C1275-84 Guide for the Investigation of Storage Cabinets for Flammable Liquid Containers
P/T Sentence Text: Storage cabinets required in this Part shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C1275-84 Guide for the Investigation of Storage Cabinets for Flammable Liquid Containers

National Sentence Text: Piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.8.(1) shall be provided with inside and outside shut-off valves.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.8.(1) shall be provided with inside and outside shut-off valves.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to processes in which products or materials are immersed in a dip tank containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the unatomized application of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, such as by flow coating or roll coating processes.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to processes in which products or materials are immersed in a dip tank containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the unatomized application of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, such as by flow coating or roll coating processes.

National Sentence Text: Protection shall be provided for adjacent buildings and facilities that would be exposed to fire originating from buildings, parts of buildings, facilities and associated areas undergoing construction, alteration or demolition operations. (See Note A-5.6.1.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Protection shall be provided for adjacent buildings and facilities that would be exposed to fire originating from buildings, parts of buildings, facilities and associated areas undergoing construction, alteration or demolition operations. (See Note A-5.6.1.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Access openings for inspection purposes below deck shall be provided for valves required in Article 4.8.4.5. and for connections to pipelines, and suitable signs shall be posted indicating their locations.
P/T Sentence Text: Access openings for inspection purposes below deck shall be provided for valves required in Article 4.8.4.5. and for connections to pipelines, and suitable signs shall be posted indicating their locations.

National Sentence Text: A sign identifying the floor level, stair location and civic address shall be posted at each floor in a stairway required by Sentence 5.6.3.7.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: A sign identifying the floor level, stair location and civic address shall be posted at each floor in a stairway required by Sentence 5.6.3.7.(1).

National Sentence Text: When a covered mall having a width of not less than 9 m has been provided for the purpose of considering each portion of the building separated by the mall as a separate building, merchandising or public activities are permitted within the required 9 m width provided alternative protection is installed in conformance with Article 1.2.1.1..
P/T Sentence Text: When a covered mall having a width of not less than 9 m has been provided for the purpose of considering each portion of the building separated by the mall as a separate building, merchandising or public activities are permitted within the required 9 m width provided alternative protection is installed in conformance with Article 1.2.1.1..

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.16.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.16.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of multiple products within the same class, the individual class and division placard shall be posted.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of multiple products within the same class, the individual class and division placard shall be posted.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.2.1.(3), outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations shall have an individual capacity of not more than 80 000 L, and their aggregate capacity shall not exceed 200 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.6.2.1.(3), outside aboveground storage tanks at fuel-dispensing stations shall have an individual capacity of not more than 80 000 L, and their aggregate capacity shall not exceed 200 000 L.

National Sentence Text: When an outside pump location is impractical, pumps are permitted to be installed inside buildings or in pits as provided in Article 4.6.2.6.
P/T Sentence Text: When an outside pump location is impractical, pumps are permitted to be installed inside buildings or in pits as provided in Article 4.6.2.6.

National Sentence Text: The manufacturing, handling, transportation, sale and use of dangerous goodsclassified as explosives shall be in conformance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations.
P/T Sentence Text: The manufacturing, handling, transportation, sale and use of dangerous goodsclassified as explosives shall be in conformance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the information required in Section 2.8., where dangerous goods are stored or handled, the fire safety plan shall include the names, addresses and telephone numbers of persons to be contacted in case of fire during non-operating hours.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the information required in part 2., where dangerous goods are stored or handled, the fire safety plan shall include the names, addresses and telephone numbers of persons to be contacted in case of fire during non-operating hours.

National Sentence Text: Battery-charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be located at least 1.5 m from combustible materials, when serving more than 2 trucks, in well ventilated areas, in areas where flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are not present in hazardous quantities, and in areas where precautions are taken to prevent ignition sources, such as open flames, sparks or electric arcs.
P/T Sentence Text: Battery-charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be located at least 1.5 m from combustible materials, when serving more than 2 trucks, in well ventilated areas, in areas where flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are not present in hazardous quantities, and in areas where precautions are taken to prevent ignition sources, such as open flames, sparks or electric arcs.

National Sentence Text: The storage of dangerous goodsclassified as explosives shall be in conformance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations. (See Note A-3.1.1.4.)
P/T Sentence Text: The storage of dangerous goodsclassified as explosives shall be in conformance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations.

National Sentence Text: Doors in fire separations shall be operated at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that they are properly maintained in accordance with Sentence 2.2.2.4.(1), as specified in the fire safety plan prepared in conformance with Section 2.8.
P/T Sentence Text: Doors in fire separations shall be operated at intervals not greater than one month to ensure that they are properly maintained in accordance with Sentence 2.2.2.4.(1), as specified in the fire safety plan prepared in conformance with part 2.

National Sentence Text: Industrial trucks used for the transportation of ammonium nitrate shall be cleaned of remaining material following use.
P/T Sentence Text: Industrial trucks used for the transportation of ammonium nitrate shall be cleaned of remaining material following use.

National Sentence Text: The clearance between the top of storage and the ceiling sprinkler deflectors or other overhead fire protection systems shall be in accordance with the standard used for the design of the respective system.
P/T Sentence Text: The clearance between the top of storage and the ceiling sprinkler deflectors or other overhead fire protection systems shall be in accordance with the standard used for the design of the respective system.

National Sentence Text: In a general storage area covered in Subsection 3.2.3., quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids are permitted to exceed those in Sentence 4.2.8.2.(1) provided the storage area is in conformance with Sentences 4.2.8.4.(2)to 4.2.8.4.(6).
P/T Sentence Text: In a general storage area covered in part 3., quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids are permitted to exceed those in Sentence 4.2.8.2.(1) provided the storage area is in conformance with Sentences 4.2.8.4.(2)to 4.2.8.4.(6).

National Sentence Text: The height of storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be not more than that permitted for unprotected storage in Table 4.2.7.5.-A.
P/T Sentence Text: The height of storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be not more than that permitted for unprotected storage in Table 4.2.7.5.-A.

National Sentence Text: Two persons knowledgeable in the use of firefighting equipment shall be in attendance on the roof deck at each landing area when it is in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Two persons knowledgeable in the use of firefighting equipment shall be in attendance on the roof deck at each landing area when it is in use.

National Sentence Text: The static head imposed on a storage tank inside a building shall not exceed 70 kPa (gauge) at the bottom of the tank when the vent or fill pipe is filled with liquid unless the tank is designed for greater pressures.
P/T Sentence Text: The static head imposed on a storage tank inside a building shall not exceed 70 kPa (gauge) at the bottom of the tank when the vent or fill pipe is filled with liquid unless the tank is designed for greater pressures.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.2.8.2.(2)and 3.2.8.2.(3), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the NBC, is located on an exterior wall of the building, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the NBC, is designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (see Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d)), is provided with natural or mechanical ventilation in conformance with Subsection 4.1.7., does not contain fuel-fired appliances or high-temperature heating elements, and is used for no purpose other than the storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Sentences 3.2.8.2.(2) and 3.2.8.2.(3), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the NBC, is located on an exterior wall of the building, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the NBC, is designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (see Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d)), is provided with natural or mechanical ventilation in conformance with part 4., does not contain fuel-fired appliances or high-temperature heating elements, and is used for no purpose other than the storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.

Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Except as provided in Sentences 3.2.8.2.(2)and 3.2.8.2.(3), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code, is located on an exterior wall of the building, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(1) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code, is designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (see Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d)), is provided with natural or mechanical ventilation in conformance with part 4., does not contain fuel-fired appliances or high-temperature heating elements, and is used for no purpose other than the storage of dangerous goods classified as compressed gases.

National Sentence Text: Dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from containers having a capacity of more than 30 L shall be by pumps or through self-closing valves, designed in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.1.8.3.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from containers having a capacity of more than 30 L shall be by pumps or through self-closing valves, designed in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.1.8.3.(1).)

National Sentence Text: A record shall be kept of all testing of smoke alarms installed in hotels and motels and shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
P/T Sentence Text: A record shall be kept of all testing of smoke alarms installed in hotels and motels and shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

National Sentence Text: Tags shall be attached to all valves on piping systems that are shut off for maintenance purposes to indicate that such valves are not to be opened.
P/T Sentence Text: Tags shall be attached to all valves on piping systems that are shut off for maintenance purposes to indicate that such valves are not to be opened.

National Sentence Text: This Section shall apply to that portion of a property where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are received in bulk quantities and are stored or handled for the purpose of being distributed.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section shall apply to that portion of a property where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are received in bulk quantities and are stored or handled for the purpose of being distributed.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.4.1.3.(2), when a leak detection test required by this Section detects a leak in a storage tank, piping system or sump, the leaking components or system shall be repaired and tested, replaced, or removed.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.4.1.3.(2), when a leak detection test required by this Section detects a leak in a storage tank, piping system or sump, the leaking components or system shall be repaired and tested, replaced, or removed.

National Sentence Text: Pipe leak detection referred to in this Section shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping (See also Articles 4.4.3.3.and 4.4.3.4.)
P/T Sentence Text: Pipe leak detection referred to in this Section shall conform to ULC ULC/ORD-C107.12-1992 Line Leak Detection Devices for Flammable Liquid Piping (See also Articles 4.4.3.3.and 4.4.3.4.)

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to flammable liquid and combustible liquid installations on piers and wharves, but does not include marine fuel-dispensing stations.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to flammable liquid and combustible liquid installations on piers and wharves, but does not include marine fuel-dispensing stations.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers on a tank vehicle shall be readily accessible.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers on a tank vehicle shall be readily accessible.

National Sentence Text: A turbine sump shall be provided for all turbine pump assemblies located below grade or above grade where they are not readily visible.
P/T Sentence Text: A turbine sump shall be provided for all turbine pump assemblies located below grade or above grade where they are not readily visible.

National Sentence Text: Visual inspection referred to in this Section shall, in the case of an exposed piping system, conform to Article 4.5.10.5., and in the case of an aboveground storage tank, consist of a visual examination of the tank shell, or if the bottom of the tank is not amenable to a visual examination, testing the bottom of the tank (see Note A-4.4.2.1.(8)(b)(ii)).
P/T Sentence Text: Visual inspection referred to in this Section shall, in the case of an exposed piping system, conform to Article 4.5.10.5., and in the case of an aboveground storage tank, consist of a visual examination of the tank shell, or if the bottom of the tank is not amenable to a visual examination, testing the bottom of the tank (see Note A-4.4.2.1.(8)(b)(ii)).

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in Sections 2.14., 3.4., 4.12., 5.7., 6.9. and 7.4. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in Sections 2.14., 3.4., 4.12., 5.7., 6.9. and 7.4.(See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in Sections 2., 3., 4., 5., 6. and 7. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in Sections Sections 2.16., 3.4., 4.12., 5.7., 6.9. and 7.4.(See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(3), the use of the following materials for piping systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(1) shall not be permitted: materials that are subject to failure from internal stress or rupture by mechanical damage, or combustible or low-melting-point materials that are subject to failure even in moderate fires.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(3), the use of the following materials for piping systems referred to in Sentence 4.5.2.1.(1) shall not be permitted: materials that are subject to failure from internal stress or rupture by mechanical damage, or combustible or low-melting-point materials that are subject to failure even in moderate fires.

National Sentence Text: Storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols, packaging materials and empty bottles, drums, barrels and pallets shall be in conformance with Part 3..
P/T Sentence Text: Storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols, packaging materials and empty bottles, drums, barrels and pallets shall be in conformance with part 3..

National Sentence Text: Where a fire alarm system has been installed with no provisions to transmit a signal to the fire department, a sign shall be posted at each manually actuated signalling box requesting that the fire department be notified, and including the telephone number of that department.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a fire alarm system has been installed with no provisions to transmit a signal to the fire department, a sign shall be posted at each manually actuated signalling box requesting that the fire department be notified, and including the telephone number of that department.

National Sentence Text: Measures to control spilled liquid or solid dangerous goods shall be provided in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Measures to control spilled liquid or solid dangerous goods shall be provided in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Not more than 50 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 30 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in a garage or shed attached to a dwelling unit.
P/T Sentence Text: Not more than 50 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 30 L shall be Class I liquids, are permitted to be stored in a garage or shed attached to a dwelling unit.

National Sentence Text: Smoking shall be permitted only under the conditions stated in Subsection 2.4.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoking shall be permitted only under the conditions stated in part 2.

National Sentence Text: In the design of the piping system, provisions shall be made for the expansion, contraction, vibration, settling and temperature changes of piping in accordance with Article 4.5.6.14.
P/T Sentence Text: In the design of the piping system, provisions shall be made for the expansion, contraction, vibration, settling and temperature changes of piping in accordance with Article 4.5.6.14.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of Article 4.3.9.2., the sumps referred to in Sentences 4.3.9.1.(1)to 4.3.9.1.(4) shall be installed in conformance with the sump manufacturer's instructions.
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of Article 4.3.9.2., the sumps referred to in Sentences 4.3.9.1.(1)to 4.3.9.1.(4) shall be installed in conformance with the sump manufacturer's instructions.

National Sentence Text: Absorbent materials shall be available in the storage area for use in clean-up of spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Absorbent materials shall be available in the storage area for use in clean-up of spilled flammable liquids or combustible liquids in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3.

National Sentence Text: Portable tanks having a capacity greater than 2 500 L shall be installed in conformance with Section 4.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable tanks having a capacity greater than 2 500 L shall be installed in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs referred to in Sentences 5.6.1.11.(1), 5.6.1.11.(2)and 5.6.1.11.(3) that once contained combustible liquids, flammable liquids or flammable gases shall be purged with inert materials prior to demolition to prevent an explosion. (See Note A-5.6.1.11.(4).)
P/T Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs referred to in Sentences 5.6.1.11.(1), 5.6.1.11.(2)and 5.6.1.11.(3) that once contained combustible liquids, flammable liquids or flammable gases shall be purged with inert materials prior to demolition to prevent an explosion. (See Note A-5.6.1.11.(4).)

National Sentence Text: A person employed to watch for fires as described in Sentence 2.9.3.4.(1) shall be familiar with all fire safety features, including the fire safety plan as provided in conformance with Section 2.8. and the condition of exits, and patrol the area to ensure that the means of egress are kept clear and that requirements of the authority having jurisdiction are enforced.
P/T Sentence Text: A person employed to watch for fires as described in Sentence 2.9.3.4.(1) shall be familiar with all fire safety features, including the fire safety plan as provided in conformance with part 2. and the condition of exits, and patrol the area to ensure that the means of egress are kept clear and that requirements of the authority having jurisdiction are enforced.

National Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall be kept in the building for reference by the fire department, supervisory staff and other personnel.
P/T Sentence Text: The fire safety plan shall be kept in the building for reference by the fire department, supervisory staff and other personnel.

National Sentence Text: The area surrounding a storage tank or group of storage tanks shall be designed to accommodate accidental spillage in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: The area surrounding a storage tank or group of storage tanks shall be designed to accommodate accidental spillage in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: The fill point of an underground storage tank shall not be located higher than the discharge point of the tank's vent.
P/T Sentence Text: The fill point of an underground storage tank shall not be located higher than the discharge point of the tank's vent.

National Sentence Text: Heating appliances shall not be permitted in a fire compartment used for the storage of dangerous goodsclassified as flammable gases, flammable liquids, flammable solids, pyrophoric materials, water-reactive substances, oxidizers or organic peroxides, unless they are installed in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard.
P/T Sentence Text: Heating appliances shall not be permitted in a fire compartment used for the storage of dangerous goodsclassified as flammable gases, flammable liquids, flammable solids, pyrophoric materials, water-reactive substances, oxidizers or organic peroxides, unless they are installed in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard.

National Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of Part 2, pressurized water portable fire extinguishers having a rating of 2-A or larger shall be installed. (See Note A-3.2.9.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: In addition to the requirements of Part 2, pressurized water portable fire extinguishers having a rating of 2-A or larger shall be installed. (See Note A-3.2.9.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.2.3.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Sections 3.2.and 3.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.2.2.3.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Sections 3.and 3.

National Sentence Text: Where the flammable vapour being removed is heavier than air, at least one air inlet shall be located at a point near a wall, and no higher than 300 mm from the floor, and at least one air outlet shall be located near the opposite wall, no higher than 300 mm from the floor.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the flammable vapour being removed is heavier than air, at least one air inlet shall be located at a point near a wall, and no higher than 300 mm from the floor, and at least one air outlet shall be located near the opposite wall, no higher than 300 mm from the floor.

National Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying this Subsection, ethanol concentrations greater than or equal to 20% by volume of ethanol in water shall be considered as a flammable liquid.
P/T Sentence Text: For the purpose of applying this Subsection, ethanol concentrations greater than or equal to 20% by volume of ethanol in water shall be considered as a flammable liquid.

National Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be located aboveground where the piping enters a building.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be located aboveground where the piping enters a building.

National Sentence Text: Pits for subsurface pumps or for piping connected to submersed pumps shall conform to Article 4.5.9.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Pits for subsurface pumps or for piping connected to submersed pumps shall conform to Article 4.5.9.3.

National Sentence Text: Spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids within buildings shall be removed in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids within buildings shall be removed in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Quantities of loose combustible fibres exceeding 15 m3 but not exceeding 30 m3 shall be stored in rooms separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Quantities of loose combustible fibres exceeding 15 m3 but not exceeding 30 m3 shall be stored in rooms separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.

National Sentence Text: The installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the NBC.

P/T Sentence Text: The installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: This Article applies to mercantile occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: This Article applies to mercantile occupancies.

National Sentence Text: Liquid fuel storage tanks shall be drained and refilled with fresh fuel at intervals not greater than 12 months. (See Note A-6.5.1.5.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Liquid fuel storage tanks shall be drained and refilled with fresh fuel at intervals not greater than 12 months. (See Note A-6.5.1.5.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Materials for valves and their connections to a storage tank shall be suitable for the pressures, stresses and temperatures that may be expected, including those of possible fire exposure.
P/T Sentence Text: Materials for valves and their connections to a storage tank shall be suitable for the pressures, stresses and temperatures that may be expected, including those of possible fire exposure.

National Sentence Text: The minimum distance between any 2 storage tanks, neither of which has a capacity of more than 250 000 L, shall be 1 m.
P/T Sentence Text: The minimum distance between any 2 storage tanks, neither of which has a capacity of more than 250 000 L, shall be 1 m.

National Sentence Text: The storage of dangerous goods in quantities exceeding the maximum exempted amounts stated in Table 3.2.7.1., in a single individual storage area, shall conform to this Subsection.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage of dangerous goods in quantities exceeding the maximum exempted amounts stated in Table 3.2.7.1., in a single individual storage area, shall conform to this Subsection.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in self-service storage buildings within the scope of Section 3.9. of Division B of the NBC.

P/T Sentence Text: Fire protection for marinas and boatyards shall conform to NFPA 303, "Fire Protection Standard for Marinas and Boatyards."
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Fire protection for marinas and boatyards shall conform to NFPA 303, "Fire Protection Standard for Marinas and Boatyards."

National Sentence Text: Storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be liquid-tight where the walls join the floor.
P/T Sentence Text: Storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be liquid-tight where the walls join the floor.

National Sentence Text: Piping adjacent to railway tracks shall be installed in conformance with TC General Order No. O-32, C.R.C., c1148 Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations
P/T Sentence Text: Piping adjacent to railway tracks shall be installed in conformance with TC General Order No. O-32, C.R.C., c1148 Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations

National Sentence Text: When 2 or more classes of liquid are stored in the same individual storage area, the maximum quantity permitted in the individual storage area shall be that permitted for the liquid with the lowest limit listed in Sentence 4.2.8.4.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: When 2 or more classes of liquid are stored in the same individual storage area, the maximum quantity permitted in the individual storage area shall be that permitted for the liquid with the lowest limit listed in Sentence 4.2.8.4.(4).

National Sentence Text: Pump houses shall be of noncombustible construction with floors that are chemically resistant to the liquid being handled, liquid-tight and equipped with curbs or flashings around the base of the wall not less than 100 mm in height to contain any spilled liquid.
P/T Sentence Text: Pump houses shall be of noncombustible construction with floors that are chemically resistant to the liquid being handled, liquid-tight and equipped with curbs or flashings around the base of the wall not less than 100 mm in height to contain any spilled liquid.

National Sentence Text: The storage method and maximum height of storage as described in Clauses 3.2.2.5.(2)(b)and 3.2.2.5.(2)(c) shall be posted in the storage area.
P/T Sentence Text: The storage method and maximum height of storage as described in Clauses 3.2.2.5.(2)and 3.2.2.5.(2) shall be posted in the storage area.

National Sentence Text: Deficiencies noted during the testing described in Sentences 7.1.1.2.(1)and 7.1.1.2.(2) shall be corrected.
P/T Sentence Text: Deficiencies noted during the testing described in Sentences 7.1.1.2.(1)and 7.1.1.2.(2) shall be corrected.

National Sentence Text: A stabilization period of up to 30 min is required after pressurization.
P/T Sentence Text: A stabilization period of up to 30 min is required after pressurization.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.5.8.(2), the height of storage of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosols shall be not greater than 1.75 m where products are in solid piles or on pallets, or 6.1 m where products are on racks.

National Sentence Text: The safety features of revolving doors shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.
P/T Sentence Text: The safety features of revolving doors shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in business and personal services, care, treatment or detention occupancies and shall include nonresidential schools, universities and colleges.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in business and personal services, care, treatment or detention occupancies and shall include nonresidential schools, universities and colleges.

National Sentence Text: When piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.10.(1) contains Class I liquids, the trench shall be provided with ventilation designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours in accordance with Sentence 6.9.1.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 6.5.1.6., emergency lights shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that they are functional. (See Note A-6.5.1.8.)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 6.5.1.6., emergency lights shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 12 months to ensure that they are functional.

National Sentence Text: Open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used for leakage detection referred to in Sentence 4.5.10.5.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used for leakage detection referred to in Sentence 4.5.10.5.(2).

P/T Sentence Text: Every machine that produces wood dust, particles or shavings shall be provided with a blower and exhaust system installed in conformance with NFPA 664-2012 Prevention of Fires and Explosions in Wood Processing and Woodworking Facilities

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.2.4.(2)and 3.2.2.4.(3), combustible pallets shall be stored outdoors in conformance with Section 3.3.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.2.4.(2)and 3.2.2.4.(3), combustible pallets shall be stored outdoors in conformance with part 3.

National Sentence Text: In a building regulated by this Subsection, at least one person shall be trained in conformance with Sentence 3.2.7.15.(2), in responsible charge during operating hours, and available to respond to a day or night emergency.

National Sentence Text: A copy of the fire emergency procedures and other duties for supervisory staff, as laid down in the fire safety plan, shall be given to all supervisory staff.
