National Sentence Text: Open flames whose quantity and method of use create a fire hazard shall not be permitted in processions in assembly occupancies, or in dining areas in Group B, Divisions 2 and 3 care and treatment occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Open flames whose quantity and method of use create a fire hazard shall not be permitted in processions in assembly occupancies, or in dining areas in Group B, Divisions 2 and 3 care and treatment occupancies.

National Sentence Text: Heating, ventilating and air-conditioning systems, including appliances, chimneys and flue pipes, shall be operated and maintained so as not to create a hazardous condition.
P/T Sentence Text: Heating, ventilating and air-conditioning systems, including appliances, chimneys and flue pipes, shall be operated and maintained so as not to create a hazardous condition.

P/T Sentence Text: Underground reinforced plastic storage tanks shall be installed in conformance with Appendix A of ULC CAN/ULC-S615-14 Fibre Reinforced Plastic Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Test pressures exceeding 700 kPa (gauge) shall not be permitted unless the piping system is designed for such pressures.

National Sentence Text: It is permitted to use movable tanks for dispensing flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tanks of vehicles or other motorized equipment provided such movable tanks are used in conformance with the requirements of this Part for storage tanks.

National Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted in a laboratory and signs shall be posted in conformance with Article 2.4.2.2.

National Sentence Text: Provision shall be made to prevent spillage resulting from the disconnection of hoses.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be stored in stable piles such that they will not collapse under normal operating conditions.

National Sentence Text: A non-inert gas pressure is permitted to be used in a closed piping system referred to in Sentence 4.5.9.7.(1) provided it is the vapour or gas of the flammable liquid or combustible liquid being transferred, or it is a vapour or gas that will not support combustion reaction and is non-reactive with the flammable liquid or combustible liquid being transferred.

P/T Sentence Text: Any keys or special devices needed to operate the fire alarm system or provide access to any fire protection systems or equipment shall be readily available to on-duty supervisory staff.

National Sentence Text: Reactive materials that ignite spontaneously in air shall be stored in a liquid that is inert to the material, in an inert atmosphere or in sealed containers.
P/T Sentence Text: Reactive materials that ignite spontaneously in air shall be stored in a liquid that is inert to the material, in an inert atmosphere or in sealed containers.

National Sentence Text: Where subsurface conditions make it impracticable to install a storage tank totally below adjacent ground level, an underground storage tank shall be installed so that at least 75% of its mass is below adjacent ground level provided there is not less than 600 mm of ground cover over the portion of the tank above adjacent ground level, or 50% of its mass is below adjacent ground level provided there is not less than 1 m of ground cover over the portion of the tank above adjacent ground level.

P/T Sentence Text: Smoking shall not be permitted in areas where conditions are such as to make smoking a fire or explosion hazard.

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to fire safety for buildings, parts of buildings, facilities, adjacent buildings or facilities, and associated areas undergoing construction, alteration or demolition operations.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to fire safety for buildings, parts of buildings, facilities, adjacent buildings or facilities, and associated areas undergoing construction, alteration or demolition operations.

National Sentence Text: Areas where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are dispensed shall be designed to be able to handle accidental spillage in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6., and control a spill of not less than 1 000 L.
P/T Sentence Text: Areas where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are dispensed shall be designed to be able to handle accidental spillage in conformance with part 4., and control a spill of not less than 1 000 L.

National Sentence Text: During loading and unloading of a tank vehicle, measures shall be taken against static electric charges in conformance with Articles 4.1.8.2.and 4.7.4.5.
P/T Sentence Text: During loading and unloading of a tank vehicle, measures shall be taken against static electric charges in conformance with Articles 4.1.8.2.and 4.7.4.5.

National Sentence Text: The flash points of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be determined in conformance with Subsection 4.1.3.
P/T Sentence Text: The flash points of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall be determined in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of a single product, only the UN number need be posted.
P/T Sentence Text: Where the dangerous goods identified in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) consist of a single product, only the UN number need be posted.

National Sentence Text: The air temperature in the part of a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging shall be kept sufficiently low to prevent the actuation of any sprinkler or fire alarm system.
P/T Sentence Text: The air temperature in the part of a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging shall be kept sufficiently low to prevent the actuation of any sprinkler or fire alarm system.

National Sentence Text: Buildings described in Sentence 3.2.7.9.(1) need not be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system provided that the sum of individual storage areas in the building used for the storage of dangerous goods, other than substances classified as miscellaneous dangerous goods with no other class and those covered in Part 4., does not exceed 100 m2, and the dangerous goods are separated in conformance with Table 3.2.7.6., and stored in fire compartments separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Buildings described in Sentence 3.2.7.9.(1) need not be equipped throughout with a sprinkler system or other fire suppression system provided that the sum of individual storage areas in the building used for the storage of dangerous goods, other than substances classified as miscellaneous dangerous goods with no other class and those covered in part 4., does not exceed 100 m2, and the dangerous goods are separated in conformance with Table 3.2.7.6., and stored in fire compartments separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.

National Sentence Text: Combustible materials shall not be stored on a roof or adjacent to any building so as to create a fire hazard to the building or its occupants.
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible materials shall not be stored on a roof or adjacent to any building so as to create a fire hazard to the building or its occupants.

National Sentence Text: Individual storage areas described in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) shall be identified in the fire safety plan as required in Article 3.2.2.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Individual storage areas described in Sentence 3.2.7.14.(1) shall be identified in the fire safety plan as required in Article 3.2.2.5.

National Sentence Text: Where a mechanical ventilation system is installed in conformance with Article 4.1.7.2., and where exhaust air is recirculated, a fail-safe vapour detection and alarm system shall be provided to continuously monitor the flammable vapour concentration in the exhaust air, and if the vapour concentration in Clause 4.1.7.6.(1)(a) exceeds 25% of the lower explosive limit of the vapour, to sound an alarm in an attended area, stop the recirculation of air, and redirect the exhaust air to an outdoor location.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a mechanical ventilation system is installed in conformance with Article 4.1.7.2., and where exhaust air is recirculated, a fail-safe vapour detection and alarm system shall be provided to continuously monitor the flammable vapour concentration in the exhaust air, and if the vapour concentration in Sentence 4.1.7.6.(1) exceeds 25% of the lower explosive limit of the vapour, to sound an alarm in an attended area, stop the recirculation of air, and redirect the exhaust air to an outdoor location.

National Sentence Text: Every emergency valve shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S651-16 Emergency Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Every emergency valve shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S651-16 Emergency Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Any part of a building where floor finishing operations are done shall not be open to the public.
P/T Sentence Text: Any part of a building where floor finishing operations are done shall not be open to the public.

National Sentence Text: Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the NBC shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the NBC shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.
P/T Sentence Text: Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the British Columbia Building Code shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.7.2.(4), steel shut-off valves shall be provided at connections to all aboveground storage tanks, on supply piping where it enters buildings or structures, on branch lines from the main supply line, on supply lines at dispensing locations, to isolate one part of a piping system from another, and to isolate meters and air eliminators.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.5.7.2.(4), steel shut-off valves shall be provided at connections to all aboveground storage tanks, on supply piping where it enters buildings or structures, on branch lines from the main supply line, on supply lines at dispensing locations, to isolate one part of a piping system from another, and to isolate meters and air eliminators.

National Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall be provided with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 80-B:C.
P/T Sentence Text: A tank vehicle shall be provided with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 80-B:C.

National Sentence Text: Vent pipes from underground storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be obstructed by any device that may cause excessive back pressure, except that vent pipes from underground storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids are permitted to be fitted with return bends, coarse screens or other devices to minimize the entry of foreign material.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent pipes from underground storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall not be obstructed by any device that may cause excessive back pressure, except that vent pipes from underground storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids are permitted to be fitted with return bends, coarse screens or other devices to minimize the entry of foreign material.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.2.5.4.(2), in mercantile occupancies, the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from or into containers shall only be permitted in a storage room conforming to Subsection 4.2.9. (See Note A-4.2.5.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 4.2.5.4.(2), in mercantile occupancies, the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from or into containers shall only be permitted in a storage room conforming to part 4. (See Note A-4.2.5.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2) shall not apply when the storage tank vapour space cannot exceed 25% of the lower explosive limit or is filled with an inert gas that prevents the ignition of the vapour mixture, or the liquid being transferred has a minimum conductivity that prevents the accumulation of static electricity (see Note A-4.1.8.2.(3)(b)).
P/T Sentence Text: Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2) shall not apply when the storage tank vapour space cannot exceed 25% of the lower explosive limit or is filled with an inert gas that prevents the ignition of the vapour mixture, or the liquid being transferred has a minimum conductivity that prevents the accumulation of static electricity (see Note A-4.1.8.2.(3)(b)).

National Sentence Text: Where 2 or more liquids with different flash points are stored outdoors in containers that form a single pile, the maximum total quantity permitted in the pile shall be equal to that permitted for the liquid with the lowest flash point.
P/T Sentence Text: Where 2 or more liquids with different flash points are stored outdoors in containers that form a single pile, the maximum total quantity permitted in the pile shall be equal to that permitted for the liquid with the lowest flash point.

National Sentence Text: Tanks built in conformance with Clause 4.3.1.2.(1)(a), 4.3.1.2.(1)(b)or 4.3.1.2.(1)(c) shall be used only for the storage of crude petroleum and oil field production liquids, and provided with emergency venting that (see Note A-4.3.1.2.(2)(b)) conforms to API 2000-2009 Venting Atmospheric and Low-Pressure Storage Tanks and is compatible with the design features of the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: Tanks built in conformance with Sentence 4.3.1.2.(1), 4.3.1.2.(1)or 4.3.1.2.(1) shall be used only for the storage of crude petroleum and oil field production liquids, and provided with emergency venting that (see Note A-4.3.1.2.(2)(b)) conforms to API 2000-2009 Venting Atmospheric and Low-Pressure Storage Tanks and is compatible with the design features of the tank.

National Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be identified in conformance with Article 3.2.7.13.
P/T Sentence Text: Dangerous goods shall be identified in conformance with Article 3.2.7.13.

National Sentence Text: Electrical equipment located inside a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Sentence 5.5.3.4.(1), and be designed and maintained to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical equipment located inside a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Sentence 5.5.3.4.(1), and be designed and maintained to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits.

National Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs at a demolition site shall be taken out of service in conformance with Subsection 4.3.16.
P/T Sentence Text: Tanks, piping and machinery reservoirs at a demolition site shall be taken out of service in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Water-based fire protection systems shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with NFPA 25-2017 Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance of Water-Based Fire Protection Systems (See Note A-6.4.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Water-based fire protection systems shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with NFPA 25-2017 Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance of Water-Based Fire Protection Systems (See Note A-6.4.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: The location of outdoor processing equipment in process plants shall be based on its flammable liquid or combustible liquid capacity as described in Sentences 4.9.2.1.(2)to 4.9.2.1.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: The location of outdoor processing equipment in process plants shall be based on its flammable liquid or combustible liquid capacity as described in Sentences 4.9.2.1.(2)to 4.9.2.1.(4).

National Sentence Text: Instructions for manually operating the fire protection systems shall be posted conspicuously in the kitchen as part of the fire safety plan.
P/T Sentence Text: Instructions for manually operating the fire protection systems shall be posted conspicuously in the kitchen as part of the fire safety plan.

National Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a 2-A rating shall be installed on each storey of a building described in Article 2.11.1.1.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a 2-A rating shall be installed on each storey of a building described in Article 2.11.1.1.

National Sentence Text: The precision leak detection test for underground storage tanks that is referred to in this Section shall be capable of detecting a storage tank leak rate as small as 0.38 L/h within 24 h with a probability of detection of 0.95 or greater and a probability of false alarm of 0.05 or less (see Note A-4.4.2.1.(10)(a)), and be conducted by an individual who has been trained in the proper care and use of the test equipment and the operating procedures. (See also Sentences 4.4.3.1.(2) and 4.4.3.1.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: The precision leak detection test for underground storage tanks that is referred to in this Section shall be capable of detecting a storage tank leak rate as small as 0.38 L/h within 24 h with a probability of detection of 0.95 or greater and a probability of false alarm of 0.05 or less (see Note A-4.4.2.1.(10)(a)), and be conducted by an individual who has been trained in the proper care and use of the test equipment and the operating procedures.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.3.2.1.(6)and 4.3.2.1.(7), every aboveground storage tank containing stable liquids and having a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances half those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection referred to in Clause 4.3.2.1.(2)(a) is not provided.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.3.2.1.(6)and 4.3.2.1.(7), every aboveground storage tank containing stable liquids and having a working pressure of not more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from a property line or a building on the same property by distances half those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection is provided against fire or explosion in the tank in conformance with Sentence 4.3.2.5.(2), or equal to those in Table 4.3.2.1., where protection referred to in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) is not provided.

National Sentence Text: Where documents are referenced in this Code, they shall be the editions designated in Table 1.3.1.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Where documents are referenced in this Code, they shall be the editions designated in Table 1.3.1.2.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 4.3.2.2.(2)and 4.3.2.2.(3) and in Article 4.3.2.3., the minimum distance between every combination of 2 aboveground storage tanks shall be 0.25 times the sum of their diameters, but shall be not less than 1 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 4.3.2.2.(2)and 4.3.2.2.(3) and in Article 4.3.2.3., the minimum distance between every combination of 2 aboveground storage tanks shall be 0.25 times the sum of their diameters, but shall be not less than 1 m.

National Sentence Text: The pressurized core shall be tested at or near grade in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the pressurized core to the outdoors on all storeys.
P/T Sentence Text: The pressurized core shall be tested at or near grade in different seasons by a pressure sensor or tracer smoke at intervals not greater than 2 years and after any alteration to the building, to ensure that the movement of air is from the pressurized core to the outdoors on all storeys.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with NFPA 10-2013 Portable Fire Extinguishers
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with NFPA 10-2013 Portable Fire Extinguishers

National Sentence Text: Aisles separating racks, shelves, or piles of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosol products shall be not less than 2.4 m wide.
P/T Sentence Text: Aisles separating racks, shelves, or piles of packaged Level 2 or 3 aerosol products shall be not less than 2.4 m wide.

National Sentence Text: Where a leak is detected as described in Sentence 4.4.1.3.(1)or 4.4.1.3.(2), the escaped liquid shall be removed in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a leak is detected as described in Sentence 4.4.1.3.(1)or 4.4.1.3.(2), the escaped liquid shall be removed in conformance with part 4.

National Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified in this Code, a storage tank shall be installed and used in conformance with the applicable installation and use provisions of the design document to which the storage tank was built as required by this Section.
P/T Sentence Text: Unless otherwise specified in this Code, a storage tank shall be installed and used in conformance with the applicable installation and use provisions of the design document to which the storage tank was built as required by this Section.

National Sentence Text: Refrigerators described in Sentence 4.1.4.1.(2) shall be identified in conformance with Article 3.2.7.14.
P/T Sentence Text: Refrigerators described in Sentence 4.1.4.1.(2) shall be identified in conformance with Article 3.2.7.14.

National Sentence Text: Pits for subsurface pumps for piping systems or for piping connected to submersible pumps shall be designed to withstand the forces to which they may be subjected without causing damage to the system.
P/T Sentence Text: Pits for subsurface pumps for piping systems or for piping connected to submersible pumps shall be designed to withstand the forces to which they may be subjected without causing damage to the system.

National Sentence Text: Electrically conducting parts of conveying systems, dust collectors, dust-producing machines and any equipment capable of accumulating static electricity located in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall be electrically bonded and grounded.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrically conducting parts of conveying systems, dust collectors, dust-producing machines and any equipment capable of accumulating static electricity located in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall be electrically bonded and grounded.

National Sentence Text: Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: A dispenser sump shall be provided under a dispenser, unless the dispenser is located on top of an aboveground storage tank.
P/T Sentence Text: A dispenser sump shall be provided under a dispenser, unless the dispenser is located on top of an aboveground storage tank.

National Sentence Text: The design and installation of a special fire suppression system that is not water-based shall conform to one of the following standards: NFPA 11-2016 Low-, Medium-, and High-Expansion Foam NFPA 12-2015 Carbon Dioxide Extinguishing Systems NFPA 12A-2015 Halon 1301 Fire Extinguishing Systems (see Note A-2.1.3.5.(3)(c) and (d)), NFPA 12B-1990 Halon 1211 Fire Extinguishing Systems (see Note A-2.1.3.5.(3)(c) and (d)), NFPA 17-2013 Dry Chemical Extinguishing Systems or NFPA 17A-2013 Wet Chemical Extinguishing Systems
P/T Sentence Text: The design and installation of a special fire suppression system that is not water-based shall conform to one of the following standards: NFPA 11-2016 Low-, Medium-, and High-Expansion Foam NFPA 12-2015 Carbon Dioxide Extinguishing Systems NFPA 12A-2015 Halon 1301 Fire Extinguishing Systems (see Note A-2.1.3.5.(3)(c)), NFPA 12B-1990 Halon 1211 Fire Extinguishing Systems (see Note A-2.1.3.5.(3)(c)), NFPA 17-2013 Dry Chemical Extinguishing Systems or NFPA 17A-2013 Wet Chemical Extinguishing Systems

National Sentence Text: Mops that have been used for spreading bitumen shall be kept outside the building in a safe location when not in use. (See Note A-5.6.1.8.)
P/T Sentence Text: Mops that have been used for spreading bitumen shall be kept outside the building in a safe location when not in use.

National Sentence Text: Card- or key-activated dispensers are permitted at unattended self-service outlets and fuel-dispensing stations that are not open to the general public, in conformance with Sentences 4.6.8.4.(2)to 4.6.8.4.(6). (See Note A-4.6.8.4.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Card- or key-activated dispensers are permitted at unattended self-service outlets and fuel-dispensing stations that are not open to the general public, in conformance with Sentences 4.6.8.4.(2)to 4.6.8.4.(6). (See Note A-4.6.8.4.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.1.1.(2), this Section applies to process plants, including refineries, that contain industrial processes involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.1.1.(2), this Section applies to process plants, including refineries, that contain industrial processes involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be kept in the pump house or other suitable location where they will be accessible in the event of an emergency, but not accessible to the public.
P/T Sentence Text: Portable extinguishers shall be kept in the pump house or other suitable location where they will be accessible in the event of an emergency, but not accessible to the public.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the leak detection testing and monitoring methods referred to in this Section.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to the leak detection testing and monitoring methods referred to in this Section.

National Sentence Text: Where specific references to the inspection, maintenance and testing of fire safety devices and building fire safety features are not made in this Code, such devices and features shall be maintained to ensure they operate as per their design or function according to their original intent.
P/T Sentence Text: Where specific references to the inspection, maintenance and testing of fire safety devices and building fire safety features are not made in this Code, such devices and features shall be maintained to ensure they operate as per their design or function according to their original intent.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.3.4.3.(2)and 3.3.4.8.(1), dangerous goods shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Article 3.2.7.6.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 3.3.4.3.(2)and 3.3.4.8.(1), dangerous goods shall be separated from other dangerous goods in conformance with Article 3.2.7.6.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.1.1.1.(2)and 4.1.1.1.(3), this Part applies to the storage, handling, use and processing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in buildings, structures and open areas, and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations. (See Note A-4.1.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.1.1.1.(2)and 4.1.1.1.(3), this Part applies to the storage, handling, use and processing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in buildings, structures and open areas, and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases at fuel-dispensing stations.

National Sentence Text: Every outside aboveground storage tank for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be located in conformance with Sentences 4.3.2.1.(2)to 4.3.2.1.(5) with respect to a property line or a building on the same property.
P/T Sentence Text: Every outside aboveground storage tank for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be located in conformance with Sentences 4.3.2.1.(2)to 4.3.2.1.(5) with respect to a property line or a building on the same property.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.6.4.(4), where baled combustible fibres are stored in sprinkleredbuildings, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 500 m2.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.6.4.(4), where baled combustible fibres are stored in sprinkleredbuildings, the maximum area of any individual storage area shall be 500 m2.

National Sentence Text: Vent piping for storage tanks for Class I liquids shall not be connected to vent piping for storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids unless an effective arrangement is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquids from entering the other tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Vent piping for storage tanks for Class I liquids shall not be connected to vent piping for storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids unless an effective arrangement is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquids from entering the other tanks.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(4), openings shall not be permitted in a secondary containment.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.7.2.(4), openings shall not be permitted in a secondary containment.

National Sentence Text: Except at distilleries covered in Section 4.10., vent piping materials and construction shall conform to Subsections 4.5.2., Subsection 4.5.3.and 4.5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Except at distilleries covered in part 4., vent piping materials and construction shall conform to Subsections 4., part 4.and 4.

National Sentence Text: Barricades shall have a reasonably smooth surface facing the outside, and no openings other than those required for access.
P/T Sentence Text: Barricades shall have a reasonably smooth surface facing the outside, and no openings other than those required for access.

National Sentence Text: The outdoor area occupied by aboveground storage tanks, container storage, ancillary equipment and unloading facilities shall be fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.
P/T Sentence Text: The outdoor area occupied by aboveground storage tanks, container storage, ancillary equipment and unloading facilities shall be fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.

National Sentence Text: Permanently open vent stacks are permitted to be used for the ventilation of storage bins where mechanical dust-collecting systems are not practical provided that the vent stacks have a cross-sectional area not less than twice that of all spouts discharging into the bin, are installed not more than 30° from the vertical, extend from the top of the bin to a point not less than 1.2 m above the roof, and are designed to prevent the entry of snow and rain.
P/T Sentence Text: Permanently open vent stacks are permitted to be used for the ventilation of storage bins where mechanical dust-collecting systems are not practical provided that the vent stacks have a cross-sectional area not less than twice that of all spouts discharging into the bin, are installed not more than 30° from the vertical, extend from the top of the bin to a point not less than 1.2 m above the roof, and are designed to prevent the entry of snow and rain.

National Sentence Text: Clearance between stored products and ducts of exhaust ventilation systems shall be maintained in conformance with NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids (See Note A-3.2.2.3.(5).)
P/T Sentence Text: Clearance between stored products and ducts of exhaust ventilation systems shall be maintained in conformance with NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids (See Note A-3.2.2.3.(5).)

National Sentence Text: At intervals not greater than 12 months, the building emergency power systems shall be operated and all elevators supplied with emergency power shall be tested as provided in Sentence 7.2.2.1.(1) with no other source of electrical power.
P/T Sentence Text: At intervals not greater than 12 months, the building emergency power systems shall be operated and all elevators supplied with emergency power shall be tested as provided in Sentence 7.2.2.1.(1) with no other source of electrical power.

National Sentence Text: Flammable liquids, combustible liquids and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases shall not be used or displayed in a covered mall.
P/T Sentence Text: Flammable liquids, combustible liquids and dangerous goods classified as flammable gases shall not be used or displayed in a covered mall.

National Sentence Text: Where a covered mall is used for the display of fuelled equipment, batteries shall be disconnected and caps for fuel tanks shall be locked or secured against tampering.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a covered mall is used for the display of fuelled equipment, batteries shall be disconnected and caps for fuel tanks shall be locked or secured against tampering.

National Sentence Text: A spill containment sump shall be provided at every underground storage tank fill point.
P/T Sentence Text: A spill containment sump shall be provided at every underground storage tank fill point.

National Sentence Text: During a leak detection test on a storage tank, the pressure at the bottom of the tank shall not exceed the tank manufacturer's specifications.
P/T Sentence Text: During a leak detection test on a storage tank, the pressure at the bottom of the tank shall not exceed the tank manufacturer's specifications.

National Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to guard against the hazards associated with pneumatic leak detection testing in areas where explosive mixtures of flammable liquid or combustible liquid vapours and air may be present in the vicinity of a storage tank that has been in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Measures shall be taken to guard against the hazards associated with pneumatic leak detection testing in areas where explosive mixtures of flammable liquid or combustible liquid vapours and air may be present in the vicinity of a storage tank that has been in use.

National Sentence Text: In buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1), access openings to each storey provided in conformance with the NBC shall be not less than 750 mm wide by 1 100 mm high. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(3).)
Matched National Sentence (Variation): In buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1), access openings to each storey provided in conformance with the NBC shall be not less than 750 mm wide by 1 100 mm high. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: In buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1), access openings to each storey provided in conformance with the British Columbia Building Code shall be not less than 750 mm wide by 1 100 mm high. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(3).)

National Sentence Text: Where marine vessels are loading or unloading flammable liquids or combustible liquids or are being refuelled, portable extinguishers with a rating of not less than 40-B:C shall be placed on the pier or wharf in the vicinity of loading or unloading operations so that they are accessible in the event of a fire emergency.

National Sentence Text: Documents referred to in Sentence 4.5.4.2.(1) shall be kept at two separate locations so that one copy remains readily available in the event the other is inaccessible due to fire.

National Sentence Text: Duties of attendants and fuel-dispensing procedures, as stated in Articles 4.6.8.5.and 4.6.8.6., shall be posted at every fuel-dispensing station.
P/T Sentence Text: Duties of attendants and fuel-dispensing procedures, as stated in Articles 4.6.8.5.and 4.6.8.6., shall be posted at every fuel-dispensing station.

National Sentence Text: Except as required in Sentences 2.6.1.9.(3)to 2.6.1.9.(5), the use, inspection and maintenance of commercial cooking equipment exhaust and fire protection systems shall be in conformance with NFPA 96-2014 Ventilation Control and Fire Protection of Commercial Cooking Operations

National Sentence Text: Electrical equipment vaults shall not be used for storage purposes.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical equipment vaults shall not be used for storage purposes.

National Sentence Text: Except as otherwise noted in this Part, this Subsection applies to industrial occupancies where the use, storage and handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids is secondary to the principal activity. (See Note A-4.2.8.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as otherwise noted in this Part, this Subsection applies to industrial occupancies where the use, storage and handling of flammable liquids or combustible liquids is secondary to the principal activity. (See Note A-4.2.8.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in buildings classified as assembly or residential occupancies, except that it shall not apply to nonresidential schools, universities or colleges covered in Subsection 4.2.6.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in buildings classified as assembly or residential occupancies, except that it shall not apply to nonresidential schools, universities or colleges covered in part 4.

National Sentence Text: Where the process warrants protection, process plants shall be supplied with water supplies of adequate pressure and quantity to meet the probable fire demands, hydrants, hoses connected to a permanent water supply and located so that all equipment containing flammable liquids or combustible liquids, including pumps, can be reached with at least one hose stream, and fire protection systems conforming to Part 2.

National Sentence Text: Ammonium nitrate classified as oxidizers and dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall not be stored in an area where the ambient air temperature is higher than 52°C.
P/T Sentence Text: Ammonium nitrate classified as oxidizers and dangerous goods classified as compressed gases shall not be stored in an area where the ambient air temperature is higher than 52°C.

National Sentence Text: Except for perimeter sealing material, floating roof assemblies or internal floating covers installed in storage tanks shall be constructed of metal or other materials and designed in conformance with one of the tank construction standards listed in this Subsection.
P/T Sentence Text: Except for perimeter sealing material, floating roof assemblies or internal floating covers installed in storage tanks shall be constructed of metal or other materials and designed in conformance with one of the tank construction standards listed in this Subsection.

National Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to spray coating processes shall conform to NFPA 33-2016 Spray Application Using Flammable or Combustible Materials
P/T Sentence Text: The design, operation and maintenance requirements relating to spray coating processes shall conform to NFPA 33-2016 Spray Application Using Flammable or Combustible Materials

National Sentence Text: Each fuel-fired industrial truck shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.
P/T Sentence Text: Each fuel-fired industrial truck shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2-A:30-B:C.

National Sentence Text: It is permitted to waive the clearance required in Sentence 3.3.3.2.(2) if an individual storage area has a base area not greater than 5 m2.
P/T Sentence Text: It is permitted to waive the clearance required in Sentence 3.3.3.2.(2) if an individual storage area has a base area not greater than 5 m2.

National Sentence Text: Quantities of flammable liquids or combustible liquids exceeding those permitted in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(1) are permitted, provided they are kept in storage cabinets conforming to Subsection 4.2.10., except that the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in such cabinets shall not exceed the quantity permitted for one cabinet, or in a storage room conforming to Subsection 4.2.9. and having no openings that communicate directly with the public portions of the building.

National Sentence Text: Low pressure storage tanks and pressure vessels are permitted to be used as atmospheric storage tanks.
P/T Sentence Text: Low pressure storage tanks and pressure vessels are permitted to be used as atmospheric storage tanks.

National Sentence Text: Piers and wharves where cargos of flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred in bulk quantities to or from tanks of marine vessels shall be not less than 30 m from any bridge over a navigable waterway, and an entrance to a superstructure of any vehicular or railroad tunnel under a waterway.
P/T Sentence Text: Piers and wharves where cargos of flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred in bulk quantities to or from tanks of marine vessels shall be not less than 30 m from any bridge over a navigable waterway, and an entrance to a superstructure of any vehicular or railroad tunnel under a waterway.

National Sentence Text: Piping shall be properly supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration or strain on equipment connected to it.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping shall be properly supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration or strain on equipment connected to it.

National Sentence Text: Heating, ventilating and air-conditioning appliances and equipment shall be installed in conformance with the NBC.

National Sentence Text: Except as specifically prescribed in this Part, all tests specified in this Section and Section 7.3. shall be carried out at intervals not greater than 3 months, except that longer intervals between tests are permitted in conformance with Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b). (See Note A-7.2.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Reactive materials that may react with water or humidity shall be stored in sealed containers in a dry location.
P/T Sentence Text: Reactive materials that may react with water or humidity shall be stored in sealed containers in a dry location.

National Sentence Text: The method of storage of dangerous goods shall be determined to ensure the physical and chemical stability of the stored products, except as provided in Sentences 3.2.7.5.(2)and 3.2.7.5.(5), not exceed the maximum heights of storage shown in Table 3.2.7.5., and not exceed the maximum base areas for individual storage areas shown in Table 3.2.3.2.(see Note A-3.2.7.5.(1)(c)).
P/T Sentence Text: The method of storage of dangerous goods shall be determined to ensure the physical and chemical stability of the stored products, except as provided in Sentences 3.2.7.5.(2)and 3.2.7.5.(5), not exceed the maximum heights of storage shown in Table 3.2.7.5., and not exceed the maximum base areas for individual storage areas shown in Table 3.2.3.2.(see Note A-3.2.7.5.(1)(c)).

National Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be arranged such that there is a clear space of not less than 30 m between stored products and brush or forested areas, and 6 m between stored products and uncontrolled grass or weeds.
P/T Sentence Text: An outdoor storage area shall be arranged such that there is a clear space of not less than 30 m between stored products and brush or forested areas, and 6 m between stored products and uncontrolled grass or weeds.

National Sentence Text: Access aisles not less than 1.0 m wide shall be provided to fire department access panels and to fire protection equipment.
P/T Sentence Text: Access aisles not less than 1.0 m wide shall be provided to fire department access panels and to fire protection equipment.

National Sentence Text: Every required egress doorway shall be served by an aisle that has a clear width not less than 1 100 mm, has access to at least one additional egress doorway, and at every point on the aisle, provides a choice of 2 opposite directions by which to reach an egress doorway.
P/T Sentence Text: Every required egress doorway shall be served by an aisle that has a clear width not less than 1 100 mm, has access to at least one additional egress doorway, and at every point on the aisle, provides a choice of 2 opposite directions by which to reach an egress doorway.

National Sentence Text: Cables on the ground in areas used by the public in a tent or air-supported structure shall be placed in trenches or protected by covers to prevent damage from traffic.
P/T Sentence Text: Cables on the ground in areas used by the public in a tent or air-supported structure shall be placed in trenches or protected by covers to prevent damage from traffic.

National Sentence Text: Where a storage tank is to be permanently disposed of, sufficient openings shall be cut in the tank to render it unfit for further use.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a storage tank is to be permanently disposed of, sufficient openings shall be cut in the tank to render it unfit for further use.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Table 3.2.7.6., solid and liquid dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(1) of Division B of the NBC.

National Sentence Text: ASTM D 3828-16a Flash Point by Small Scale Closed Cup Tester is permitted to be used for testing aviation turbine fuels within the scope of this procedure.

National Sentence Text: This Section applies to storage tanks for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: This Section applies to storage tanks for flammable liquids and combustible liquids.

National Sentence Text: Decorative materials used for merchandising or public activities in a covered mall shall conform to Subsection 2.3.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Decorative materials used for merchandising or public activities in a covered mall shall conform to part 2.

National Sentence Text: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground storage tank shall be in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground storage tank shall be in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Ventilation air inlets and outlets within a room or enclosed space referred to in Article 4.1.7.1. shall be arranged so as to provide air movement in all portions of the room to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours in conformance with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(3).

National Sentence Text: Roofing operations and other surface applications that involve heat sources and hot processes shall be considered hot works and shall conform to the requirements in Sentences 5.6.1.7.(2)and 5.6.1.7.(3) and Section 5.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Roofing operations and other surface applications that involve heat sources and hot processes shall be considered hot works and shall conform to the requirements in Sentences 5.6.1.7.(2)and 5.6.1.7.(3) and part 5.

National Sentence Text: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with the manufacturer's instructions.
P/T Sentence Text: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be inspected, tested and maintained in conformance with the manufacturer's instructions.

National Sentence Text: During loading and unloading of a tank vehicle, trained personnel shall be in a position to shut off the flow of liquid in an emergency.

P/T Sentence Text: The design and installation of oxygen-fuel gas equipment shall conform to NFPA 51-2018 Design and Installation of Oxygen-Fuel Gas Systems for Welding, Cutting, and Allied Processes

P/T Sentence Text: For closed containers of distilled beverage alcohol, the sprinkler system referred to in Sentence 3.2.3.3.(1) shall be designed in conformance with good engineering practice. (See Note A-3.2.3.3.(2).)

National Sentence Text: Class I liquids shall be drawn from or transferred into containers or storage tanks within a building through a piping or transfer system conforming to Section 4.5., by means of a pump designed in conformance with good engineering practice on top of the container or storage tank, or by gravity through a self-closing valve designed in conformance with good engineering practice. National Sentence Text: A riveted storage tank shall not be relocated.
P/T Sentence Text: A riveted storage tank shall not be relocated.

National Sentence Text: All penetrations into a sump shall be situated at least 50 mm from the bottom of the sump. (See Note A-4.5.5.7.(1).)

P/T Sentence Text: Except where a building is provided with a fire alarm system or similar equipment, a watch, with tours at intervals of not more than 1 h, shall be provided when a portion of the building is occupied while construction operations are taking place.

National Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 30-B:C shall be located on each industrial lift truck.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one portable extinguisher having a rating of 30-B:C shall be located on each industrial lift truck.

National Sentence Text: When it is not practicable to undertake hot work in an area described in Sentence 5.2.3.1.(1), combustible and flammable materials within a 15 m distance from the hot work shall be protected against ignition in conformance with Article 5.2.3.2., a continuous fire watch shall be provided during the hot work and for a period of not less than 60 min after its completion in conformance with Article 5.2.3.3., and a final inspection of the hot work area and adjacent exposed areas shall be conducted 4 h after completion of the work, or after completion of the fire watch required in Clause 5.2.3.1.(2)(b), in which case, a more comprehensive inspection shall be conducted (see Note A-5.2.3.1.(2)(c)(ii)).
P/T Sentence Text: When it is not practicable to undertake hot work in an area described in Sentence 5.2.3.1.(1), combustible and flammable materials within a 15 m distance from the hot work shall be protected against ignition in conformance with Article 5.2.3.2., a continuous fire watch shall be provided during the hot work and for a period of not less than 60 min after its completion in conformance with Article 5.2.3.3., and a final inspection of the hot work area and adjacent exposed areas shall be conducted 4 h after completion of the work, or after completion of the fire watch required in Sentence 5.2.3.1.(2), in which case, a more comprehensive inspection shall be conducted (see Note A-5.2.3.1.(2)(c)(ii)).

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.3.13.11.(2), where storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids are installed inside buildings, the supports, foundations and anchorage for such storage tanks shall be in conformance with Subsection 4.3.3.

National Sentence Text: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in a building under construction or alteration, the system shall be installed progressively in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC in areas permitted to be occupied.

P/T Sentence Text: The emergency valve required in Sentence 4.6.6.3.(1) shall be maintained in operating condition and serviced at intervals not greater than 12 months.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.6.8.4.(3)to 4.6.8.4.(6), the installation of card- or key-activated dispensers shall conform to the requirements for self-service outlets and fuel-dispensing stations in this Section.

National Sentence Text: Combustible liquids shall be Class II or Class IIIA liquids, and shall be subdivided into: Class II liquids, which shall include those having a flash point at or above 37.8°C and below 60°C, and Class IIIA liquids, which shall include those having a flash point at or above 60°C and below 93.3°C (see Note A-4.1.2.1.(3)(b)).

National Sentence Text: Make-up air for a natural or mechanical ventilation system shall be taken from a point remote from any exhaust air discharge described in Article 4.1.7.4.
P/T Sentence Text: Make-up air for a natural or mechanical ventilation system shall be taken from a point remote from any exhaust air discharge described in Article 4.1.7.4.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.9.4.2., where Class IA liquids or unstable liquids are processed within a room or a building, the room or building shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 4.9.4.2., where Class IA liquids or unstable liquids are processed within a room or a building, the room or building shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)

National Sentence Text: Packaged Level 1 aerosol products shall be protected as required for Class III commodities, in both palletized and rack storage, in conformance with Article 3.2.3.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Packaged Level 1 aerosol products shall be protected as required for Class III commodities, in both palletized and rack storage, in conformance with Article 3.2.3.2.

National Sentence Text: Any fire emergency system required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC that does not conform to a specific measure outlined in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide – NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)shall be tested to ensure that it operates as intended.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Any fire emergency system required by Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC that does not conform to a specific measure outlined in Commentary C of the CCBFC NRCC 40383 User's Guide NBC 1995 Fire Protection, Occupant Safety and Accessibility (Part 3)shall be tested to ensure that it operates as intended.

National Sentence Text: Piping systems serving oil-burning equipment, diesel-engine-driven emergency generators and fire pumps shall conform to CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment
P/T Sentence Text: Piping systems serving oil-burning equipment, diesel-engine-driven emergency generators and fire pumps shall conform to CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment

National Sentence Text: Where a special fire suppression system is required by this Code or installed through application of good engineering practices, the system shall conform to one of the standards listed in Sentences 2.1.3.5.(3)and 2.1.3.5.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: Where a special fire suppression system is required by this Code or installed through application of good engineering practices, the system shall conform to one of the standards listed in Sentences 2.1.3.5.(3)and 2.1.3.5.(4).

National Sentence Text: Fuel-dispensing stations that do not serve the general public do not require an attendant.
P/T Sentence Text: Fuel-dispensing stations that do not serve the general public do not require an attendant.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.4.3.4.(6)and 4.4.3.4.(7), test pressure shall be the greater of 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, and not exceed the piping manufacturer's test specifications.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences 4.4.3.4.(6)and 4.4.3.4.(7), test pressure shall be the greater of 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, and not exceed the piping manufacturer's test specifications.

National Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Containers and storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.
P/T Sentence Text: Containers and storage tanks for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.

National Sentence Text: The service company whose service connections will be affected shall be notified before any action mentioned in Sentence 5.6.1.9.(1) is taken and, if it is necessary to maintain any service, it shall be relocated as necessary, and protected from damage.
P/T Sentence Text: The service company whose service connections will be affected shall be notified before any action mentioned in Sentence 5.6.1.9.(1) is taken and, if it is necessary to maintain any service, it shall be relocated as necessary, and protected from damage.

National Sentence Text: When Class I or II liquids are added to the used oils described in Sentence 4.1.2.3.(1), the resulting mixture shall be classified through tests conforming to Subsection 4.1.3., or in the absence of the tests referred to in Clause 4.1.2.3.(2)(a), as a Class IC liquid if Class I liquids are added, or as a Class II liquid if only Class II liquids are added. (See Note A-4.1.3.1.)
P/T Sentence Text: When Class I or II liquids are added to the used oils described in Sentence 4.1.2.3.(1), the resulting mixture shall be classified through tests conforming to part 4., or in the absence of the tests referred to in Sentence 4.1.2.3.(2), as a Class IC liquid if Class I liquids are added, or as a Class II liquid if only Class II liquids are added.

National Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted in an area described in Article 4.1.1.1. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, a device, operation or activity that produces open flames, sparks or heat shall not be permitted in an area described in Article 4.1.1.1. (See Note A-4.1.5.2.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Voice communication or public address systems that are part of the building evacuation plan and are not electrically supervised shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month in conformance with Sentences 6.3.1.4.(3)and 6.3.1.4.(4). (See Note A-6.3.1.4.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Voice communication or public address systems that are part of the building evacuation plan and are not electrically supervised shall be tested at intervals not greater than one month in conformance with Sentences 6.3.1.4.(3)and 6.3.1.4.(4). (See Note A-6.3.1.4.(2).)

National Sentence Text: A relief valve with a slightly higher setting than the pressure required in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(2) shall be provided on the downstream side of the regulator or on the tank.
P/T Sentence Text: A relief valve with a slightly higher setting than the pressure required in Sentence 4.5.9.6.(2) shall be provided on the downstream side of the regulator or on the tank.

National Sentence Text: Piping shall be firmly supported and protected by means of guarding devices where necessary to prevent vehicular, watercraft or floatplane impact damage, or other physical damage.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping shall be firmly supported and protected by means of guarding devices where necessary to prevent vehicular, watercraft or floatplane impact damage, or other physical damage.

National Sentence Text: If the vents of the receiving or delivery tank are obstructed, the transfer of liquid shall be stopped.
P/T Sentence Text: If the vents of the receiving or delivery tank are obstructed, the transfer of liquid shall be stopped.

National Sentence Text: Where a sprinkler system is required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), the sprinkler system shall be designed and installed in conformance with Article 3.2.3.3., with additional sprinkler protection provided in conformance with NFPA 30B-2015 Manufacture and Storage of Aerosol Products for areas in which packaged aerosol products are stored.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a sprinkler system is required to accommodate the storage limits in Sentence 3.2.5.4.(1), the sprinkler system shall be designed and installed in conformance with Article 3.2.3.3., with additional sprinkler protection provided in conformance with NFPA 30B-2015 Manufacture and Storage of Aerosol Products for areas in which packaged aerosol products are stored.

National Sentence Text: Signs required in Sentence 3.2.2.5.(3) shall have a minimum dimension of 200 mm, and letters not less than 25 mm high.
P/T Sentence Text: Signs required in Sentence 3.2.2.5.(3) shall have a minimum dimension of 200 mm, and letters not less than 25 mm high.

National Sentence Text: Openings for measuring liquid levels in storage tanks for Class I liquids shall be equipped with caps or covers which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.
P/T Sentence Text: Openings for measuring liquid levels in storage tanks for Class I liquids shall be equipped with caps or covers which shall be opened only when measuring the liquid level.

National Sentence Text: Where a storage tank referred to in Sentence 4.3.16.2.(1) contains flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the liquid level in the tank shall be measured and compared with subsequent readings taken at intervals not greater than one month.
P/T Sentence Text: Where a storage tank referred to in Sentence 4.3.16.2.(1) contains flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the liquid level in the tank shall be measured and compared with subsequent readings taken at intervals not greater than one month.

National Sentence Text: Where dispenser sumps, transition sumps and turbine sumps are provided with electronic monitoring devices in accordance with Sentence 4.3.9.3.(1), the devices shall be interlocked with the dispenser or pump to shut it down upon detection of either product or a high liquid level.
P/T Sentence Text: Where dispenser sumps, transition sumps and turbine sumps are provided with electronic monitoring devices in accordance with Sentence 4.3.9.3.(1), the devices shall be interlocked with the dispenser or pump to shut it down upon detection of either product or a high liquid level.

National Sentence Text: A single vertical check valve referred to in this Section shall consist of a vertical check valve located immediately under the pump, be installed with no other check valve between the suction pump and the storage tank, and be part of an installation where lines must be sufficiently sloped so that any liquid in the line will drain back into the storage tank should a leak occur in the piping system. (See Note A-4.4.2.1.(12).)
P/T Sentence Text: A single vertical check valve referred to in this Section shall consist of a vertical check valve located immediately under the pump, be installed with no other check valve between the suction pump and the storage tank, and be part of an installation where lines must be sufficiently sloped so that any liquid in the line will drain back into the storage tank should a leak occur in the piping system.

National Sentence Text: Where a pneumatic leak detection test is conducted before an underground storage tank is backfilled, in the case of a new tank, or after the tank is uncovered, in the case of a previously installed tank, the test pressure shall be in conformance with the production testing requirements of ULC CAN/ULC-S603-14 Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or ULC CAN/ULC-S615-14 Fibre Reinforced Plastic Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
P/T Sentence Text: Where a pneumatic leak detection test is conducted before an underground storage tank is backfilled, in the case of a new tank, or after the tank is uncovered, in the case of a previously installed tank, the test pressure shall be in conformance with the production testing requirements of ULC CAN/ULC-S603-14 Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids or ULC CAN/ULC-S615-14 Fibre Reinforced Plastic Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

National Sentence Text: Threaded joints in piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be made using joint compound or polytetrafluoroethylene tape conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S642-16 Compounds and Tapes for Threaded Pipe Joints
P/T Sentence Text: Threaded joints in piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be made using joint compound or polytetrafluoroethylene tape conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S642-16 Compounds and Tapes for Threaded Pipe Joints

National Sentence Text: Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the NBC.
Matched National Sentence (Variation): Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the NBC.
P/T Sentence Text: Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the British Columbia Building Code.

National Sentence Text: A strongly constructed fence, boarding or barricade not less than 1.8 m high shall be erected around the perimeter of the construction or demolition site.
P/T Sentence Text: A strongly constructed fence, boarding or barricade not less than 1.8 m high shall be erected around the perimeter of the construction or demolition site.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage of ammonium nitrate mixtures (Class 5.1 oxidizing in quantities exceeding 1 000 kg inside buildings. (See Note A-3.2.9.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection shall apply to the storage of ammonium nitrate mixtures (Class 5.1 oxidizing in quantities exceeding 1 000 kg inside buildings. (See Note A-3.2.9.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: Interconnections between fire protection and life safety systems shall be tested and maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S1001-11 Integrated Systems Testing of Fire Protection and Life Safety Systems (See Note A-6.8.1.1.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Interconnections between fire protection and life safety systems shall be tested and maintained in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S1001-11 Integrated Systems Testing of Fire Protection and Life Safety Systems (See Note A-6.8.1.1.(1).)

National Sentence Text: No unauthorized person shall be permitted to enter a premise undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging until the premise has been ventilated and is safe.
P/T Sentence Text: No unauthorized person shall be permitted to enter a premise undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging until the premise has been ventilated and is safe.

National Sentence Text: The design, construction, installation, alteration and maintenance of outdoor incinerators shall conform to NFPA 82-2014 Incinerators and Waste and Linen Handling Systems and Equipment except that the flue venting an incinerator shall not serve as the chute conveying waste material to the incinerator.
P/T Sentence Text: The design, construction, installation, alteration and maintenance of outdoor incinerators shall conform to NFPA 82-2014 Incinerators and Waste and Linen Handling Systems and Equipment except that the flue venting an incinerator shall not serve as the chute conveying waste material to the incinerator.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(2) andPart 4. and except as otherwise specified in this Code, this Subsection applies to buildings or parts of buildings where dangerous goods in packages or containers are stored in a single fire compartment.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.7.1.(2) andpart 4. and except as otherwise specified in this Code, this Subsection applies to buildings or parts of buildings where dangerous goods in packages or containers are stored in a single fire compartment.

National Sentence Text: The person in responsible charge specified in Sentence 3.2.7.15.(1) shall be trained in the correct procedures for the handling, storing and offering for transport of dangerous goods in accordance with the appropriate federal, provincial, or territorial occupational safety and health regulations, or in the absence of regulations mentioned in Clause 3.2.7.15.(2)(a), TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) or the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS)
P/T Sentence Text: The person in responsible charge specified in Sentence 3.2.7.15.(1) shall be trained in the correct procedures for the handling, storing and offering for transport of dangerous goods in accordance with the appropriate federal, provincial, or territorial occupational safety and health regulations, or in the absence of regulations mentioned in Sentence 3.2.7.15.(2), TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) or the HC Hazardous Products Act, Part II Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System (WHMIS)

National Sentence Text: No major occupancy of Group F, Division 1 shall be contained within a building with any occupancy classified as an assembly, care, treatment, detention or residential occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: No major occupancy of Group F, Division 1 shall be contained within a building with any occupancy classified as an assembly, care, treatment, detention or residential occupancy.

National Sentence Text: Provision shall be made for the use of existing elevators, hoists or lifts to assist firefighting personnel in reaching all levels of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Provision shall be made for the use of existing elevators, hoists or lifts to assist firefighting personnel in reaching all levels of the building.

National Sentence Text: Intermodal shipping containers used for the transportation of dangerous goods, as well as their contents, shall be stored in conformance with the segregation requirements stated in IMO 2012 International Maritime Dangerous Goods Code (See Note A-3.3.1.1.(2)(c).)
P/T Sentence Text: Intermodal shipping containers used for the transportation of dangerous goods, as well as their contents, shall be stored in conformance with the segregation requirements stated in IMO 2012 International Maritime Dangerous Goods Code (See Note A-3.3.1.1.(2)(c).)

National Sentence Text: Where part of a building continues to be occupied, the occupied part shall be separated from the part being demolished or constructed by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Where part of a building continues to be occupied, the occupied part shall be separated from the part being demolished or constructed by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

National Sentence Text: Standard procedures for normal operation and for emergencies shall be given in printed form to all employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids and shall be posted for convenient reference.
P/T Sentence Text: Standard procedures for normal operation and for emergencies shall be given in printed form to all employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids and shall be posted for convenient reference.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.2.1.(4), outdoor processing equipment having emergency relief venting and a working pressure more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from property lines and buildings on the same property by distances 1.5 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for stable liquids, and 4 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for unstable liquids.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 4.9.2.1.(4), outdoor processing equipment having emergency relief venting and a working pressure more than 17 kPa (gauge) shall be separated from property lines and buildings on the same property by distances 1.5 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for stable liquids, and 4 times those in Table 4.3.2.1. for unstable liquids.

National Sentence Text: When an explosion prevention system is required in this Section, it shall be designed in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems
P/T Sentence Text: When an explosion prevention system is required in this Section, it shall be designed in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 69-2014 Explosion Prevention Systems

National Sentence Text: Dust-collecting systems shall be provided to prevent the accumulation of dust and keep suspended dusts at a safe concentration inside a building.
P/T Sentence Text: Dust-collecting systems shall be provided to prevent the accumulation of dust and keep suspended dusts at a safe concentration inside a building.

National Sentence Text: Smoking and open flame devices shall not be permitted in a tent or air-supported structure while it is occupied by the public.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoking and open flame devices shall not be permitted in a tent or air-supported structure while it is occupied by the public.

National Sentence Text: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.

National Sentence Text: Abandoned optical fibre cables and electrical wires and cables with combustible insulation, jackets, or sheathes, and nonmetallic raceways shall be removed from a plenum unless they are permanently enclosed by the structure or finish of the building, their removal would disturb the structure or finish of the building, their removal could affect the performance of cables in use, or the plenum space is sprinklered.
P/T Sentence Text: Abandoned optical fibre cables and electrical wires and cables with combustible insulation, jackets, or sheathes, and nonmetallic raceways shall be removed from a plenum unless they are permanently enclosed by the structure or finish of the building, their removal would disturb the structure or finish of the building, their removal could affect the performance of cables in use, or the plenum space is sprinklered.
Rubber washers that are made to fit the standard female fire-hose coupling shall be 3 1/4 inches outside diameter, 2 9/16 inches inside diameter and 1 1/4 inches in thickness.

P/T Sentence Text: The fire protection systems required by Sentence (3) shall be installed in conformance with Subsection 2.1.3.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): The fire protection systems required by Sentence (3) shall be installed in conformance with Subsection 2.1.3.

P/T Sentence Text: Thread form shall be calculated as follows: Thread Form, 60° truncated vee, N = number of threads per inch P = pitch of thread D = depth of thread F = flat or truncation of thread

P/T Sentence Text: Fire-hydrant-operating spindle nuts and port cap nuts shall be pentagonal in shape, and their dimensions shall be as follows: the diameter of the outside circumscribed circle shall be 1 3/4 inches, and the nut shall measure not more than 1 1/4 inches in height.

P/T Sentence Text: Fire protection for construction camps shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.
Matched P/T Sentence (Variation): Fire protection for construction camps shall conform to the British Columbia Building Code.

P/T Sentence Text: Every door used as a closure with a fire-protection rating shall have a permanent sign, clearly displaying the words "FIRE DOOR KEEP CLOSED", posted on the visible side of the door when it is in the open position, except where the door is located between a corridor and an adjacent sleeping room in a hospital or a nursing home, located between a corridor and an adjacent classroom, located between a public corridor and a suite of Group C or D occupancy (See Note A-2.2.2.5.(1)(c).), or fitted with an acceptable hold-open device designed to be released by a signal from a fire detector, fire alarm system or sprinkler system.
